  86  type struct_gsv
  87    ! This is the derived type of the statevector object
  88
  89    ! These are the main data storage arrays
  90    logical, private          :: allocated=.false.
  91    real(8), pointer, private :: gd_r8(:,:,:,:) => null()
  92    real(8), pointer, private :: gd3d_r8(:,:,:) => null()
  93    real(4), pointer, private :: gd_r4(:,:,:,:) => null()
  94    real(4), pointer, private :: gd3d_r4(:,:,:) => null()
  95    type(struct_ocm)    :: oceanMask
  96    logical             :: heightSfcPresent = .false.
  97    real(8), pointer, private :: heightSfc(:,:) => null()  ! for VarsLevs, heightSfc only on proc 0
  98
  99    ! These are used when distribution is VarLevs to keep corresponding UV
 100    ! components together on each mpi task to facilitate horizontal interpolation
 101    logical             :: UVComponentPresent = .false.  ! wind component present on this mpi task
 102    logical             :: extraUVallocated = .false.    ! extra winds (gdUV) are allocated
 103    integer             :: myUVkBeg, myUVkEnd, myUVkCount
 104    type(struct_gdUV), pointer, private :: gdUV(:) => null()
 105
 106    ! All the remaining extra information
 107    integer             :: dataKind = 8 ! default value
 108    integer             :: ni, nj, nk, numStep, anltime
 109    integer             :: latPerPE, latPerPEmax, myLatBeg, myLatEnd
 110    integer             :: lonPerPE, lonPerPEmax, myLonBeg, myLonEnd
 111    integer             :: mykCount, mykBeg, mykEnd
 112    integer, pointer    :: allLatBeg(:), allLatEnd(:), allLatPerPE(:)
 113    integer, pointer    :: allLonBeg(:), allLonEnd(:), allLonPerPE(:)
 114    integer, pointer    :: allkCount(:), allkBeg(:), allkEnd(:)
 115    integer, pointer    :: allUVkCount(:), allUVkBeg(:), allUVkEnd(:)
 116    integer, pointer    :: dateStampList(:) => null()
 117    integer, pointer    :: dateStamp3d
 118    integer, pointer    :: dateOriginList(:)
 119    integer, pointer    :: npasList(:), ip2List(:)
 120    integer             :: deet
 121    character(len=12)   :: etiket
 122    type(struct_vco), pointer :: vco => null()
 123    type(struct_hco), pointer :: hco => null()
 124    type(struct_hco), pointer :: hco_physics => null()
 125    integer, pointer    :: varOffset(:), varNumLev(:)
 126    logical, pointer    :: onPhysicsGrid(:)
 127    logical             :: mpi_local=.false.
 128    character(len=8)    :: mpi_distribution='None'  ! or 'Tiles' or 'VarsLevs'
 129    integer             :: horizSubSample
 130    logical             :: varExistList(vnl_numVarMax)
 131    character(len=12)   :: hInterpolateDegree='UNSPECIFIED' ! or 'LINEAR' or 'CUBIC' or 'NEAREST'
 132    character(len=12)   :: hExtrapolateDegree='MAXIMUM' ! or 'VALUE' or 'MINIMUM' or 'NEUTRAL'
 133    logical             :: addHeightSfcOffset = .false.
 134  end type struct_gsv
 135
 136  logical :: varExistList(vnl_numVarMax)

 138  ! public variables
 139  real(8) :: gsv_rhumin

 142  ! namelist variables:

 144  logical :: addHeightSfcOffset                  ! choose to add non-zero height offset to diagnostic (sfc) levels
 145  logical :: abortOnMpiImbalance                 ! choose to abort program when MPI imbalance is too large
 146  real(8) :: minValVarKindCH(vnl_numVarMax)      ! variable-dependent minimum value applied to chemistry variables
 147  logical :: gsv_conversionVarKindCHtoMicrograms ! activate unit conversion for CH variables

 149  ! arrays used for transpose VarsLevs <-> Tiles
 150  real(4), allocatable :: gd_send_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,:), gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,:)
 151  real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,:), gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,:)
 152
 153  ! initialized 
 154  logical :: initialized = .false.

 158  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 159  ! gsv_getOffsetFromVarName
 160  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 161  function gsv_getOffsetFromVarName(statevector,varName) result(offset)
 162    !
 163    !:Purpose: Returns the offset for the given variable provided it exists
 164    !
 165    implicit none
 166
 167    ! Arguments:
 168    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)  :: statevector
 169    character(len=*), intent(in)  :: varName
 170    integer                       :: offset
 171
 172    ! Locals:
 173    integer :: varIndex
 174
 175    varIndex = vnl_varListIndex(varName)
 176    if (.not. statevector%varExistList(varIndex)) then
 177      call utl_abort('gsv_getOffsetFromVarName: specified varName does not exist in stateVector: ' // trim(varName))
 178    end if
 179    offset=statevector%varOffset(varIndex)
 180
 181  end function gsv_getOffsetFromVarName
 182
 183  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 184  ! gsv_getVarNameFromK
 185  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 186  function gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector,kIndex) result(varName)
 187    !
 188    !:Purpose: Returns the variable name from a given kIndex
 189    !
 190    implicit none
 191
 192    ! Arguments
 193    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)  :: statevector
 194    integer,          intent(in)  :: kIndex
 195    character(len=4)              :: varName
 196
 197    ! Locals:
 198    integer :: varIndex
 199
 200    do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 201      if (statevector%varExistList(varIndex)) then
 202        if ((kIndex >= (statevector%varOffset(varIndex) + 1)) .and.  &
 203            (kIndex <= (statevector%varOffset(varIndex) + statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)))) then
 204          varName = vnl_varNameList(varIndex)
 205          return
 206        end if
 207      end if
 208    end do
 209
 210    call utl_abort('gsv_getVarNameFromK: kIndex out of range: '//str(kIndex))
 211
 212  end function gsv_getVarNameFromK
 213
 214  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 215  ! gsv_getLevFromK
 216  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 217  function gsv_getLevFromK(statevector,kIndex) result(levIndex)
 218    !
 219    !:Purpose: Returns level index from a given kIndex
 220    !
 221    implicit none
 222
 223    ! Arguments
 224    type(struct_gsv), intent(in) :: statevector
 225    integer,          intent(in) :: kIndex
 226    integer                      :: levIndex
 227
 228    ! Locals
 229    integer             :: varIndex
 230
 231    do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 232      if (statevector%varExistList(varIndex)) then
 233        if ((kIndex >= (statevector%varOffset(varIndex) + 1)) .and.  &
 234            (kIndex <= (statevector%varOffset(varIndex) + statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)))) then
 235          levIndex = kIndex - statevector%varOffset(varIndex)
 236          return
 237        end if
 238      end if
 239    end do
 240
 241    call utl_abort('gsv_getLevFromK: kIndex out of range: '//str(kIndex))
 242
 243  end function gsv_getLevFromK
 244
 245  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 246  ! gsv_getMpiIdFromK
 247  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 248  function gsv_getMpiIdFromK(statevector,kIndex) result(MpiId)
 249    !
 250    !:Purpose: Returns MPI id from the given kIndex
 251    !
 252    implicit none
 253
 254    ! Arguments:
 255    type(struct_gsv), intent(in) :: statevector
 256    integer,          intent(in) :: kIndex
 257    integer                      :: MpiId
 258    
 259    ! Locals:
 260    integer             :: procIndex
 261
 262    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
 263      if ((kIndex >= statevector%allKBeg(procIndex)) .and.  &
 264          (kIndex <= statevector%allKEnd(procIndex))) then
 265          MpiId = procIndex - 1
 266          return
 267      end if
 268    end do
 269
 270    call utl_abort('gsv_getMpiIdFromK: kIndex out of range: '//str(kIndex))
 271
 272  end function gsv_getMpiIdFromK
 273
 274  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 275  ! gsv_varExist
 276  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 277  recursive function gsv_varExist(statevector_opt,varName) result(varExist)
 278    !
 279    !:Purpose: Boolean fonction returning .true. if the queried variable
 280    !           exists in the statevector if provided or in the global variable
 281    !           list otherwise.
 282    !           For 'Z_*' and 'P_*' variables, the statevector argument is
 283    !           mandatory.
 284    !
 285    implicit none
 286
 287    ! Arguments:
 288    type(struct_gsv), optional, intent(in)  :: statevector_opt
 289    character(len=*),           intent(in)  :: varName
 290    logical                                 :: varExist 
 291
 292    if (varName == 'Z_*') then
 293      varExist =  gsv_varExist(statevector_opt, 'Z_T') .and. &
 294                  gsv_varExist(statevector_opt, 'Z_M')
 295    else if (varName == 'P_*') then
 296      varExist =  gsv_varExist(statevector_opt, 'P_T') .and. &
 297                  gsv_varExist(statevector_opt, 'P_M')
 298    else
 299      if (present(statevector_opt)) then
 300        if (statevector_opt%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex(varName))) then
 301          varExist = .true.
 302        else
 303          varExist = .false.
 304        end if
 305      else
 306        if (varExistList(vnl_varListIndex(varName))) then
 307          varExist = .true.
 308        else
 309          varExist = .false.
 310        end if
 311      end if
 312    end if
 313
 314  end function gsv_varExist
 315
 316  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 317  ! gsv_varNamesList
 318  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 319  subroutine gsv_varNamesList(varNames,statevector)
 320    !
 321    !:Purpose: Lists all variables present in the statevector 
 322    !
 323    implicit none
 324    
 325    ! Arguments:
 326    character(len=4), pointer,  intent(inout) :: varNames(:)
 327    type(struct_gsv), optional, intent(in)    :: statevector
 328    
 329    ! Locals:
 330    integer :: varLevIndex, varNumberIndex, varIndex, numFound
 331    character(len=4) :: varName
 332
 333    if (associated(varNames)) then
 334      call utl_abort('gsv_varNamesList: varNames must be NULL pointer on input')
 335    end if
 336 
 337    !
 338    !- 1. How many variables do we have?
 339    !
 340    numFound = 0
 341    if (present(statevector)) then
 342      do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 343        if (gsv_varExist(statevector,vnl_varNameList(varIndex))) numFound = numFound + 1
 344      end do
 345    else
 346      do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 347        if (varExistList(varIndex)) numFound = numFound + 1
 348      end do
 349    end if
 350
 351    !
 352    !- 2. List the variables
 353    !
 354    allocate(varNames(numFound))
 355    varNames(:) = ''
 356
 357    varNumberIndex = 0
 358    if (present(statevector)) then
 359      !- 2.1 List the variables based on the varLevIndex ordering
 360      do varLevIndex = 1, statevector%nk
 361        varName = gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector,varLevIndex)
 362        if (.not. ANY(varNames(:) == varName)) then
 363          varNumberIndex = varNumberIndex + 1
 364          varNames(varNumberIndex) = varName
 365        end if
 366      end do
 367    else
 368      !- 2.2 List the variables based on the varnamelist_mod ordering
 369      do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 370        if (varExistList(varIndex)) then
 371          varName = vnl_varNameList(varIndex)
 372          if (.not. ANY(varNames(:) == varName)) then
 373            varNumberIndex = varNumberIndex + 1
 374            varNames(varNumberIndex) = varName
 375          end if
 376        end if
 377      end do
 378    end if
 379
 380  end subroutine gsv_varNamesList
 381
 382  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 383  ! gsv_msgVarNames
 384  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 385  function gsv_msgVarNames(statevector) result(string)
 386    !
 387    !:Purpose: Return a string of all variables present in the statevector
 388    !
 389    implicit none
 390
 391    ! Arguments:
 392    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)  :: statevector ! stateVector for which variable names extracted
 393    character(len=:), allocatable :: string      ! allocated string with list of variable names
 394
 395    ! Locals:
 396    character(len=4), pointer     :: varNames(:)
 397
 398    call gsv_varNamesList(varNames, statevector)
 399    string = str(varNames)
 400    nullify(varNames)
 401
 402  end function gsv_msgVarNames
 403
 404  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 405  ! gsv_msgFldExtremum
 406  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 407  function gsv_msgFldExtremum(statevector, varName) result(string)
 408    !
 409    !:Purpose: Return a string describing span of values (min/max) for the specified field
 410    !
 411    implicit none
 412
 413    ! Arguments
 414    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)  :: statevector ! stateVector for which values provided
 415    character(len=*), intent(in)  :: varName     ! specified variable name for the calculation
 416    character(len=:), allocatable :: string      ! allocated string with min/max values
 417
 418    ! Locals
 419    real(8), pointer :: ptr_r8(:,:,:,:)
 420    real(4), pointer :: ptr_r4(:,:,:,:)
 421
 422    if (statevector%datakind == 4) then
 423      call gsv_getField(statevector, ptr_r4, varName)
 424      string = trim(varName)//' (real('//str(statevector%datakind) &
 425           //')) in ['//str(minval(ptr_r4))//', ' &
 426           //str(maxval(ptr_r4))//']'
 427    else
 428      call gsv_getField(statevector, ptr_r8, varName)
 429      string = trim(varName)//' (real('//str(statevector%datakind) &
 430           //')) in ['//str(minval(ptr_r8))//', ' &
 431           //str(maxval(ptr_r8))//']'
 432    end if
 433
 434  end function gsv_msgFldExtremum
 435
 436  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 437  ! gsv_getNumLev
 438  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 439  function gsv_getNumLev(statevector,varLevel,varName_opt) result(nlev)
 440    !
 441    !:Purpose: Returns the number of levels for a given type of variable;
 442    !           varLevel can be one of 'TH', 'MM', 'SF', 'SFMM', 'SFTH', 'DP',
 443    !           'SS' or 'OT'.
 444    !
 445    implicit none
 446
 447    ! Arguments:
 448    type(struct_gsv),           intent(in) :: statevector ! Input statevector
 449    character(len=*),           intent(in) :: varLevel    ! Variable type in 'TH', 'MM', 'SF', 'SFMM', 'SFTH', 'DP', 'SS' or 'OT'
 450    character(len=*), optional, intent(in) :: varName_opt ! Variable name when varLevel='OT'
 451
 452    ! Locals:
 453    integer                       :: nlev
 454
 455    nlev = vco_getNumLev(statevector%vco,varLevel,varName_opt)
 456
 457  end function gsv_getNumLev
 458
 459  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 460  ! gsv_getNumK
 461  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 462  function gsv_getNumK(statevector) result(numK)
 463    !
 464    !:Purpose: Returns the number of k indexes on the current MPI process
 465    !
 466    implicit none
 467
 468    ! Arguments:
 469    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)  :: statevector
 470    integer                       :: numK
 471
 472    numK = 1 + statevector%mykEnd - statevector%mykBeg
 473
 474  end function gsv_getNumK

 512  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 513  ! gsv_setup
 514  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 515  subroutine gsv_setup
 516    !
 517    !:Purpose: Initialises the gridstatevector module global structure.
 518    !
 519    implicit none
 520
 521    ! Locals:
 522    integer           :: varIndex, fnom, fclos, nulnam, ierr, loopIndex
 523
 524    ! namelist variables:
 525    character(len=4)  :: anlvar(vnl_numVarMax)           ! list of state variable names
 526    logical           :: conversionVarKindCHtoMicrograms ! apply chemistry unit conversions when writing to file
 527    real(8)           :: rhumin                          ! minimum value imposed on humidity
 528
 529    NAMELIST /NAMSTATE/anlvar, rhumin, anlTime_bin, addHeightSfcOffset, &
 530                       conversionVarKindCHtoMicrograms, minValVarKindCH, &
 531                       abortOnMpiImbalance
 532
 533    if (initialized) return
 534
 535    call msg('gsv_setup', 'List of known (valid) variable names', mpiAll_opt=.false.)
 536    call msg('gsv_setup', 'varNameList3D   ='//str(vnl_varNameList3D(:)), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
 537    call msg('gsv_setup', 'varNameList3D   ='//str(vnl_varNameList3D(:)), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
 538    call msg('gsv_setup', 'varNameListOther='//str(vnl_varNameListOther(:)), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
 539
 540    ! Read namelist NAMSTATE to find which fields are needed
 541
 542    anlvar(:) = '    '
 543    rhumin = mpc_minimum_hu_r8
 544    anltime_bin = 'MIDDLE'
 545    addHeightSfcOffset = .false.
 546    conversionVarKindCHtoMicrograms = .false.
 547    minValVarKindCH(:) = mpc_missingValue_r8
 548    abortOnMpiImbalance = .true.
 549
 550    nulnam=0
 551    ierr=fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 552    read(nulnam,nml=namstate,iostat=ierr)
 553    if (ierr.ne.0) call utl_abort('gsv_setup: Error reading namelist NAMSTATE')
 554    if (mmpi_myid.eq.0) write(*,nml=namstate)
 555    ierr=fclos(nulnam)
 556
 557    gsv_rhumin = rhumin
 558    gsv_conversionVarKindCHtoMicrograms = conversionVarKindCHtoMicrograms
 559
 560    if (varneed('Z_T') .or. varneed('Z_M')) call utl_abort('gsv_setup: height can not be specified as analysis variable in namelist!')
 561    if (varneed('P_T') .or. varneed('P_M')) call utl_abort('gsv_setup: pressure can not be specified as analysis variable in namelist!')
 562
 563    do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax3D
 564      if (varneed(vnl_varNameList3D(varIndex))) then
 565        varExistList(varIndex) = .true.
 566      else
 567        varExistList(varIndex) = .false.
 568      end if
 569    end do
 570
 571    do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax2D
 572      if (varneed(vnl_varNameList2D(varIndex))) then
 573        varExistList(varIndex+vnl_numVarMax3D) = .true.
 574      else
 575        varExistList(varIndex+vnl_numVarMax3D) = .false.
 576      end if
 577    end do
 578
 579    do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmaxOther
 580      if (varneed(vnl_varNameListOther(varIndex))) then
 581        varExistList(varIndex+vnl_numVarMax3D+vnl_numVarMax2D) = .true.
 582      else
 583        varExistList(varIndex+vnl_numVarMax3D+vnl_numVarMax2D) = .false.
 584      end if
 585    end do
 586
 587    ! Setup to assign min values to apply
 588    
 589    ! Check for input values only for variables of CH kind
 590    do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 591      if (trim(AnlVar(varIndex)) == '') exit
 592      if (vnl_varKindFromVarname(AnlVar(varIndex)) == 'CH') then
 593        if (minValVarKindCH(varIndex) < 0.99d0 * mpc_missingValue_r8) then
 594          if (trim(AnlVar(varIndex)) == 'AF' .or. trim(AnlVar(varIndex)) == 'AC') then
 595            ! Set for particulate matter in micrograms/cm^3
 596            minValVarKindCH(varIndex) = mpc_minimum_pm_r8
 597          else
 598            ! Set for concentrations in micrograms/kg
 599            minValVarKindCH(varIndex) = mpc_minimum_ch_r8
 600          end if
 601        end if
 602      end if
 603    end do
 604
 605    ! Assign min values to apply
 606    gsv_minValVarKindCH(:) = mpc_missingValue_r8
 607    do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 608      if (varExistList(varIndex)) then
 609        do loopIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
 610          if (trim(AnlVar(loopIndex)) == '') exit
 611          if (trim(vnl_varNameList(varIndex)) == trim(AnlVar(loopIndex))) &
 612             gsv_minValVarKindCH(varIndex) = minValVarKindCH(loopIndex)
 613        end do
 614      end if
 615    end do
 616
 617    call msg('gsv_setup','global varExistList ='//str(varExistList), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
 618
 619    ! Check value for ANLTIME_BIN
 620    if (ANLTIME_BIN .ne. 'MIDDLE' .and. ANLTIME_BIN .ne. 'FIRST' .and.  ANLTIME_BIN .ne. 'LAST') then
 621      call utl_abort('gsv_setup: Problem setting ANLTIME_BIN. Verify NAMSTATE namelist')
 622    end if
 623
 624    initialized = .true.
 625
 626    return
 627
 628    contains
 629
 630      logical function varneed(varName)
 631        character(len=*) :: varName
 632        integer :: varIndex
 633 
 634        varneed=.false.
 635        do varIndex=1,VNL_NUMVARMAX
 636          if (trim(varName) == trim(anlvar(varIndex))) then
 637            varneed=.true.
 638         end if
 639        end do
 640
 641      end function varneed
 642
 643  end subroutine gsv_setup
 644
 645  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 646  ! gsv_isInitialized
 647  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 648  function gsv_isInitialized() result(gsvInitialized)
 649    !
 650    !:Purpose: To verify gsv_setup has already run.
 651    !
 652    implicit none
 653
 654    ! Argument:
 655    logical :: gsvInitialized
 656
 657    gsvInitialized = .false.
 658
 659    if (initialized) gsvInitialized = .true.
 660
 661  end function gsv_isInitialized
 662
 663  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 664  ! gsv_isAllocated
 665  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 666  function gsv_isAllocated(stateVector) result(isAllocated)
 667    !
 668    !:Purpose: To verify if a stateVector is allocated.
 669    !
 670    implicit none
 671
 672    ! Arguments:
 673    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)  :: stateVector
 674    logical                       :: isAllocated
 675
 676    isAllocated = stateVector%allocated
 677
 678  end function gsv_isAllocated
 679
 680  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 681  ! gsv_allocate
 682  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 683  subroutine gsv_allocate(statevector, numStep, hco_ptr, vco_ptr, dateStamp_opt, dateStampList_opt,  &
 684                          mpi_local_opt, mpi_distribution_opt, horizSubSample_opt,                   &
 685                          varNames_opt, dataKind_opt, allocHeightSfc_opt, hInterpolateDegree_opt,    &
 686                          hExtrapolateDegree_opt, allocHeight_opt, allocPressure_opt, beSilent_opt)
 687    !
 688    !:Purpose: Allocates the struct_gsv memory, sets horizontal and vertical 
 689    !           coordinates, sets some options and MPI distribution 
 690    !           configurations
 691    !
 692    implicit none
 693
 694    ! Arguments:
 695    type(struct_gsv),           intent(inout) :: statevector            ! statevector to be allocated
 696    integer,                    intent(in)    :: numStep                ! number of time steps
 697    type(struct_hco), pointer,  intent(in)    :: hco_ptr                ! horizontal structure
 698    type(struct_vco), pointer,  intent(in)    :: vco_ptr                ! vertical structure
 699    integer,          optional, intent(in)    :: dateStamp_opt          ! reference datestamp
 700    integer,          optional, intent(in)    :: dateStampList_opt(:)   ! explicit datestamp list
 701    logical,          optional, intent(in)    :: mpi_local_opt          ! if .false. no MPI distribution will be used 
 702    character(len=*), optional, intent(in)    :: mpi_distribution_opt   ! MPI distribution strategy in {'Tiles', 'VarsLevs', 'None'} defaults to 'Tiles'
 703    integer,          optional, intent(in)    :: horizSubSample_opt     ! horizontal subsampling factor (to get a coarser grid)
 704    character(len=*), optional, intent(in)    :: varNames_opt(:)        ! allow specification of variables
 705    integer,          optional, intent(in)    :: dataKind_opt           ! real kind (4 or 8 bytes; defaults to 8)
 706    logical,          optional, intent(in)    :: allocHeightSfc_opt     ! toggle allocation of surface height field
 707    logical,          optional, intent(in)    :: allocHeight_opt        ! force the allocation of 'Z_T' and 'Z_M'
 708    logical,          optional, intent(in)    :: allocPressure_opt      ! force the allocation of 'P_T' and 'P_M'
 709    character(len=*), optional, intent(in)    :: hInterpolateDegree_opt ! set the horizontal interpolation degree
 710    character(len=*), optional, intent(in)    :: hExtrapolateDegree_opt ! set the horizontal extrapolation degree
 711    logical,          optional, intent(in)    :: beSilent_opt           ! limit outputs to listing
 712
 713    ! Locals:
 714    integer :: ierr,iloc,varIndex,varIndex2,stepIndex,lon1,lat1,k1,kIndex,kIndex2,levUV
 715    character(len=4) :: UVname
 716    logical :: beSilent, allocPressure, allocHeight
 717    integer :: verbLevel
 718
 719    call utl_tmg_start(168, 'low-level--gsv_allocate')
 720
 721    if (.not. initialized) then
 722      call msg('gsv_allocate','gsv_setup must be called first to be able to use this module. Call it now')
 723      call gsv_setup
 724    end if
 725
 726    if (present(beSilent_opt)) then
 727      beSilent = beSilent_opt
 728    else
 729      beSilent = .true.
 730    end if
 731
 732    ! set the horizontal and vertical coordinates
 733    statevector%hco => hco_ptr
 734    statevector%vco => vco_ptr
 735
 736    if (.not.statevector%vco%initialized) then
 737       call utl_abort('statevector_allocate: VerticalCoord has not been initialized!')
 738    end if
 739
 740    if (statevector%allocated) then
 741      call msg('gsv_allocate', 'gridStateVector already allocated! Deallocating first.', mpiAll_opt=.false.)
 742      call gsv_deallocate(statevector)
 743    end if
 744
 745    if (present(dataKind_opt)) statevector%dataKind = dataKind_opt
 746
 747    if (present(varNames_opt)) then
 748      if (present(allocHeight_opt)) call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: to allocate Z_T/Z_M, set them in varNames_opt')
 749      if (present(allocPressure_opt)) call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: to allocate P_T/P_M, set them in varNames_opt')
 750    end if
 751
 752    if (present(varNames_opt)) then      
 753      statevector%varExistList(:) = .false.
 754      do varIndex2 = 1, size(varNames_opt)
 755        varIndex = vnl_varListIndex(varNames_opt(varIndex2))
 756        statevector%varExistList(varIndex) = .true.
 757      end do
 758    else
 759      ! use the global variable list and set allocHeight/allocPressure if needed
 760      statevector%varExistList(:) = varExistList(:)
 761
 762      if (present(allocHeight_opt)) then
 763        allocHeight = allocHeight_opt
 764      else
 765        if (statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('TT ')) .and. &
 766            statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('HU ')) .and. &
 767            statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('P0 '))) then
 768          allocHeight = .true.
 769        else
 770          allocHeight = .false.
 771        end if
 772      end if
 773
 774      if (present(allocPressure_opt)) then
 775        allocPressure = allocPressure_opt
 776      else
 777        if (statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('P0 '))) then
 778          allocPressure = .true.
 779        else
 780          allocPressure = .false.
 781        end if
 782      end if
 783
 784      ! add Z_T/Z_M and P_T/P_M to the varExistList
 785      if (allocHeight) then
 786        if (gsv_getNumLev(statevector,'TH') > 0) statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('Z_T ')) = .true.
 787        if (gsv_getNumLev(statevector,'MM') > 0) statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('Z_M ')) = .true.
 788      end if
 789      if (allocPressure) then
 790        if (gsv_getNumLev(statevector,'TH') > 0) statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('P_T ')) = .true.
 791        if (gsv_getNumLev(statevector,'MM') > 0) statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('P_M ')) = .true.
 792      end if
 793
 794      ! add P0LS to the varExistList if vcode=5100
 795      if (statevector%vco%vcode == 5100) then
 796        statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('P0LS')) = .true.
 797      end if
 798    end if
 799
 800    if (statevector%vco%vcode == 5100 .and. &
 801        statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('P0')) .and. &
 802        .not.statevector%varExistList(vnl_varListIndex('P0LS'))) then
 803      call msg('gsv_allocate', 'varNames_opt = '//str(varNames_opt))
 804      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: P0LS should be included in varNames_opt when vcode=5100')
 805    end if
 806
 807    if (present(horizSubSample_opt)) then
 808      ! user has chosen a coarser grid than specified in hco
 809      statevector%horizSubSample = horizSubSample_opt
 810    else
 811      ! default is no sub-sampling
 812      statevector%horizSubSample = 1
 813    end if
 814
 815    if (present(hInterpolateDegree_opt)) then
 816      ! set the horizontal interpolation degree (intentionally no default value)
 817      statevector%hInterpolateDegree = trim(hInterpolateDegree_opt)
 818    end if
 819
 820    if (present(hExtrapolateDegree_opt)) then
 821      ! set the horizontal extrapolation degree (intentionally no default value)
 822      statevector%hExtrapolateDegree = trim(hExtrapolateDegree_opt)
 823    end if
 824
 825    ! compute the number of global grid points for a given subSample level
 826    statevector%ni = ceiling(real(statevector%hco%ni,8) / real(statevector%horizSubSample,8))
 827    statevector%nj = ceiling(real(statevector%hco%nj,8) / real(statevector%horizSubSample,8))
 828
 829    if (statevector%ni * statevector%horizSubSample /= statevector%hco%ni) then
 830      call msg('gsv_allocate',' number of longitudes is not evenly divisible at this subSample level'&
 831               //' ni='//str(statevector%ni)// ', horizSubSample = '&
 832               //str(statevector%horizSubSample))
 833      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate')
 834    end if
 835
 836    if (statevector%nj * statevector%horizSubSample /= statevector%hco%nj) then
 837      call msg('gsv_allocate','number of latitudes is not evenly divisible at this subSample level'&
 838               //' nj='//str(statevector%nj)//', horizSubSample = '&
 839               //str(statevector%horizSubSample))
 840      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate')
 841    end if
 842
 843    statevector%numStep=numStep
 844
 845    if (present(mpi_local_opt)) then
 846      statevector%mpi_local = mpi_local_opt
 847    else
 848      statevector%mpi_local = .false.
 849    end if
 850
 851    if (present(mpi_distribution_opt)) then
 852      if (trim(mpi_distribution_opt) .ne. 'Tiles'    .and. &
 853          trim(mpi_distribution_opt) .ne. 'VarsLevs' .and. &
 854          trim(mpi_distribution_opt) .ne. 'None') then
 855        call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: Unknown value of mpi_distribution: ' // trim(mpi_distribution_opt))
 856      end if
 857      statevector%mpi_distribution = mpi_distribution_opt
 858    else
 859      if (statevector%mpi_local) then
 860        statevector%mpi_distribution = 'Tiles'
 861      else
 862        statevector%mpi_distribution = 'None'
 863      end if
 864    end if
 865
 866    ! determine lat/lon index ranges
 867    if (stateVector%mpi_distribution == 'Tiles') then
 868      call mmpi_setup_latbands(statevector%nj,  &
 869                               statevector%latPerPE, statevector%latPerPEmax, &
 870                               statevector%myLatBeg, statevector%myLatEnd)
 871      call mmpi_setup_lonbands(statevector%ni,  &
 872                               statevector%lonPerPE, statevector%lonPerPEmax, &
 873                               statevector%myLonBeg, statevector%myLonEnd)
 874    else
 875      statevector%latPerPE    = statevector%nj
 876      statevector%latPerPEmax = statevector%nj
 877      statevector%myLatBeg    = 1
 878      statevector%myLatEnd    = statevector%nj
 879      statevector%lonPerPE    = statevector%ni
 880      statevector%lonPerPEmax = statevector%ni
 881      statevector%myLonBeg    = 1
 882      statevector%myLonEnd    = statevector%ni
 883    end if
 884
 885    allocate(statevector%varOffset(vnl_numvarmax))
 886    statevector%varOffset(:)=0
 887    allocate(statevector%varNumLev(vnl_numvarmax))
 888    statevector%varNumLev(:)=0
 889    allocate(statevector%onPhysicsGrid(vnl_numvarmax))
 890    statevector%onPhysicsGrid(:) = .false.
 891
 892    iloc=0
 893    if (present(varNames_opt)) then
 894
 895      do varIndex2 = 1, size(varNames_opt)
 896        varIndex = vnl_varListIndex(varNames_opt(varIndex2))
 897        statevector%varOffset(varIndex)=iloc
 898        statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)=  &
 899             gsv_getNumLev(statevector, &
 900                           vnl_varLevelFromVarname(vnl_varNameList(varIndex)),  &
 901                           vnl_varNameList(varIndex))
 902        iloc = iloc + statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)
 903      end do
 904
 905    else
 906
 907      do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax3d
 908        if (statevector%varExistList(varIndex)) then
 909          statevector%varOffset(varIndex)=iloc
 910          statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)=  &
 911               gsv_getNumLev(statevector,  &
 912                             vnl_varLevelFromVarname(vnl_varNameList(varIndex)))
 913          iloc = iloc + statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)
 914        end if
 915      end do
 916      do varIndex2 = 1, vnl_numvarmax2d
 917        varIndex=varIndex2+vnl_numvarmax3d
 918        if (statevector%varExistList(varIndex)) then
 919          statevector%varOffset(varIndex)=iloc
 920          statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)=1
 921          iloc = iloc + 1
 922        end if
 923      end do
 924      do varIndex2 = 1, vnl_numvarmaxOther
 925        varIndex=varIndex2+vnl_numvarmax3d+vnl_numvarmax2d
 926        if (statevector%varExistList(varIndex)) then
 927          statevector%varOffset(varIndex)=iloc
 928          statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)=  &
 929               gsv_getNumLev(statevector,  &
 930                              vnl_varLevelFromVarname(vnl_varNameList(varIndex)), &
 931                              vnl_varNameList(varIndex))
 932          iloc = iloc + statevector%varNumLev(varIndex)
 933        end if
 934      end do
 935
 936    end if
 937
 938    if (iloc == 0) then
 939      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate:  Nothing to allocate')
 940    end if
 941
 942    statevector%nk=iloc
 943
 944    if (beSilent) then
 945      verbLevel = msg_NEVER
 946    else
 947      verbLevel = 2
 948    end if
 949    call msg('gsv_allocate', 'statevector%nk = '//str(statevector%nk)&
 950             //new_line('')//'varOffset='//str(statevector%varOffset)&
 951             //new_line('')//'varNumLev='//str(statevector%varNumLev),&
 952             verb_opt=verbLevel, mpiAll_opt=.false.)
 953
 954    ! determine range of values for the 'k' index (vars+levels)
 955    if (statevector%mpi_distribution == 'VarsLevs') then
 956      call mmpi_setup_varslevels(statevector%nk, statevector%mykBeg, &
 957                                 statevector%mykEnd, statevector%mykCount)
 958    else
 959      statevector%mykCount = statevector%nk
 960      statevector%mykBeg = 1
 961      statevector%mykEnd = statevector%nk
 962    end if
 963
 964    ! determine if a wind component exists on this mpi task
 965    statevector%UVComponentPresent = .false.
 966    statevector%myUVkCount = 0
 967    statevector%myUVkBeg = 0
 968    statevector%myUVkEnd = -1
 969    do kIndex = statevector%mykBeg, statevector%mykEnd
 970      if (gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector,kIndex) == 'UU' .or.  &
 971           gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector,kIndex) == 'VV') then
 972        statevector%UVComponentPresent = .true.
 973        if (statevector%myUVkBeg == 0) statevector%myUVkBeg = kIndex
 974        statevector%myUVkEnd = kIndex
 975        statevector%myUVkCount = statevector%myUVkCount + 1
 976      end if
 977    end do
 978
 979    ! determine if a separate complementary wind component needed, which
 980    ! is the case when mpi distribution could mean that both components 
 981    ! are not available on same mpi task, or the statevector was allocated
 982    ! with only one of the components
 983    statevector%extraUVallocated = .false.
 984    if (statevector%mpi_distribution == 'VarsLevs' .or.   &
 985         (gsv_varExist(statevector,'UU') .and. .not. gsv_varExist(statevector,'VV')) .or. &
 986         (gsv_varExist(statevector,'VV') .and. .not. gsv_varExist(statevector,'UU'))) then
 987      statevector%extraUVallocated = statevector%UVComponentPresent
 988    end if
 989
 990    if (statevector%mpi_local) then
 991      allocate(statevector%allLonBeg(mmpi_npex))
 992      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%myLonBeg,1,'mpi_integer',       &
 993                              statevector%allLonBeg,1,'mpi_integer','EW',ierr)
 994      allocate(statevector%allLonEnd(mmpi_npex))
 995      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%myLonEnd,1,'mpi_integer',       &
 996                              statevector%allLonEnd,1,'mpi_integer','EW',ierr)
 997      allocate(statevector%allLonPerPE(mmpi_npex))
 998      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%lonPerPE,1,'mpi_integer',       &
 999                              statevector%allLonPerPE,1,'mpi_integer','EW',ierr)
1000  
1001      allocate(statevector%allLatBeg(mmpi_npey))
1002      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%myLatBeg,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1003                              statevector%allLatBeg,1,'mpi_integer','NS',ierr)
1004      allocate(statevector%allLatEnd(mmpi_npey))
1005      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%myLatEnd,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1006                              statevector%allLatEnd,1,'mpi_integer','NS',ierr)
1007      allocate(statevector%allLatPerPE(mmpi_npey))
1008      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%LatPerPE,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1009                              statevector%allLatPerPE,1,'mpi_integer','NS',ierr)
1010
1011      call gsv_checkMpiDistribution(stateVector)
1012
1013      allocate(statevector%allkCount(mmpi_nprocs))
1014      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%mykCount,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1015                              statevector%allkCount,1,'mpi_integer','grid',ierr)
1016      allocate(statevector%allkBeg(mmpi_nprocs))
1017      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%mykBeg,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1018                              statevector%allkBeg,1,'mpi_integer','grid',ierr)
1019      allocate(statevector%allkEnd(mmpi_nprocs))
1020      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%mykEnd,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1021                              statevector%allkEnd,1,'mpi_integer','grid',ierr)
1022
1023      allocate(statevector%allUVkCount(mmpi_nprocs))
1024      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%myUVkCount,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1025                              statevector%allUVkCount,1,'mpi_integer','grid',ierr)
1026      allocate(statevector%allUVkBeg(mmpi_nprocs))
1027      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%myUVkBeg,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1028                              statevector%allUVkBeg,1,'mpi_integer','grid',ierr)
1029      allocate(statevector%allUVkEnd(mmpi_nprocs))
1030      CALL rpn_comm_allgather(statevector%myUVkEnd,1,'mpi_integer',       &
1031                              statevector%allUVkEnd,1,'mpi_integer','grid',ierr)
1032    end if
1033
1034    select case (ANLTIME_BIN)
1035    case ('FIRST')
1036       statevector%anltime=1
1037    case ('MIDDLE')
1038       statevector%anltime=nint((real(numStep,8)+1.0d0)/2.0d0)
1039    case ('LAST')
1040       statevector%anltime=numStep
1041    case default
1042      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: unsupported value for ANLTIME_BIN = '//trim(ANLTIME_BIN))
1043    end select
1044
1045    if (present(dateStamp_opt) .and. present(dateStampList_opt)) then
1046      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: Either dateStamp or dateStampList should be presented but not both')
1047    else if (present(dateStampList_opt)) then
1048      allocate(statevector%dateStampList(numStep))
1049      do stepIndex = 1, numStep
1050        statevector%dateStampList(stepIndex)= dateStampList_opt(stepIndex)
1051      end do
1052      statevector%dateStamp3d => statevector%dateStampList(statevector%anltime)
1053    else if (present(dateStamp_opt)) then
1054      allocate(statevector%dateStampList(numStep))
1055      if (numStep == 1) then
1056        statevector%dateStampList(1) = dateStamp_opt
1057      else
1058        call tim_getstamplist(statevector%dateStampList,numStep,dateStamp_opt)
1059      end if
1060      statevector%dateStamp3d => statevector%dateStampList(statevector%anltime)
1061    else
1062      nullify(statevector%dateStamplist)
1063    end if
1064    allocate(statevector%dateOriginList(numStep))
1065    allocate(statevector%npasList(numStep))
1066    allocate(statevector%ip2List(numStep))
1067
1068    call gsv_resetTimeParams(statevector)
1069
1070    if (statevector%dataKind == 8) then
1071      allocate(statevector%gd_r8(statevector%myLonBeg:statevector%myLonEnd,  &
1072                                 statevector%myLatBeg:statevector%myLatEnd,  &
1073                                 statevector%mykBeg:statevector%mykEnd,numStep),stat=ierr)
1074      if (statevector%UVComponentPresent) then
1075        allocate(statevector%gdUV(statevector%myUVkBeg:statevector%myUVkEnd))
1076        if (statevector%extraUVallocated) then
1077          do kIndex = statevector%myUVkBeg, statevector%myUVkEnd
1078            allocate(statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r8(statevector%myLonBeg:statevector%myLonEnd,  &
1079                                                 statevector%myLatBeg:statevector%myLatEnd,  &
1080                                                 numStep))
1081            statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r8(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
1082          end do
1083        else
1084          ! in this case, both components available on each mpi task, so just point to it
1085          do kIndex = statevector%myUVkBeg, statevector%myUVkEnd
1086            levUV = gsv_getLevFromK(statevector, kIndex)
1087            UVname = complementaryUVname(gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector,kIndex))
1088            kIndex2 = levUV + gsv_getOffsetFromVarName(statevector,UVname)
1089            lon1 = statevector%myLonBeg
1090            lat1 = statevector%myLatBeg
1091            statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r8(lon1:,lat1:,1:) => statevector%gd_r8(:,:,kIndex2,:)
1092          end do
1093        end if
1094      end if
1095    else if (statevector%dataKind == 4) then
1096      allocate(statevector%gd_r4(statevector%myLonBeg:statevector%myLonEnd,  &
1097                                 statevector%myLatBeg:statevector%myLatEnd,  &
1098                                 statevector%mykBeg:statevector%mykEnd,numStep),stat=ierr)
1099      if (statevector%UVComponentPresent) then
1100        allocate(statevector%gdUV(statevector%myUVkBeg:statevector%myUVkEnd))
1101        if (statevector%extraUVallocated) then
1102          do kIndex = statevector%myUVkBeg, statevector%myUVkEnd
1103            allocate(statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r4(statevector%myLonBeg:statevector%myLonEnd,  &
1104                                                    statevector%myLatBeg:statevector%myLatEnd,  &
1105                                                    numStep))
1106            statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r4(:,:,:) = 0.0
1107          end do
1108        else
1109          ! in this case, both components available on each mpi task, so just point to it
1110          do kIndex = statevector%myUVkBeg, statevector%myUVkEnd
1111            levUV = gsv_getLevFromK(statevector, kIndex)
1112            UVname = complementaryUVname(gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector,kIndex))
1113            kIndex2 = levUV + gsv_getOffsetFromVarName(statevector,UVname)
1114            lon1 = statevector%myLonBeg
1115            lat1 = statevector%myLatBeg
1116            statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r4(lon1:,lat1:,1:) => statevector%gd_r4(:,:,kIndex2,:)
1117          end do
1118        end if
1119      end if
1120    else
1121      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: unknown value of datakind')
1122    end if
1123    if (ierr.ne.0) then
1124      call utl_abort('gsv_allocate: Problem allocating memory! id=1 '//str(ierr))
1125    end if
1126
1127    if (present(allocHeightSfc_opt)) then
1128      if (allocHeightSfc_opt) then
1129        ! if VarsLevs, then only proc 0 allocates surface height, otherwise all procs do
1130        statevector%heightSfcPresent = .true.
1131        if ((statevector%mpi_distribution == 'VarsLevs' .and. mmpi_myid == 0) .or. &
1132             statevector%mpi_distribution /= 'VarsLevs') then
1133          allocate(statevector%HeightSfc(statevector%myLonBeg:statevector%myLonEnd,  &
1134                                     statevector%myLatBeg:statevector%myLatEnd))
1135          statevector%HeightSfc(:,:) = 0.0d0
1136        end if
1137      end if
1138    end if
1139
1140    lon1=statevector%myLonBeg
1141    lat1=statevector%myLatBeg
1142    k1=statevector%mykBeg
1143    if (statevector%dataKind == 8) then
1144      statevector%gd3d_r8(lon1:,lat1:,k1:) => statevector%gd_r8(:,:,:,statevector%anltime)
1145    else if (statevector%dataKind == 4) then
1146      statevector%gd3d_r4(lon1:,lat1:,k1:) => statevector%gd_r4(:,:,:,statevector%anltime)
1147    end if
1148
1149    statevector%addHeightSfcOffset = addHeightSfcOffset
1150
1151    statevector%allocated=.true.
1152
1153    call utl_tmg_stop(168)
1154
1155  end subroutine gsv_allocate
1156
1157  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1158  ! gsv_communicateTimeParams
1159  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1160  subroutine gsv_communicateTimeParams(statevector)
1161    !
1162    !:Purpose: Ensures all mpi tasks have certain time and other parameters
1163    !
1164    implicit none
1165
1166    ! Arguments:
1167    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector
1168
1169    ! Locals:
1170    integer :: deet, ierr
1171    integer :: ip2List(statevector%numStep), npasList(statevector%numStep)
1172    integer :: dateOriginList(statevector%numStep)
1173    logical :: onPhysicsGrid(vnl_numVarMax)
1174
1175    call rpn_comm_allreduce(statevector%deet, deet, 1,  &
1176                            'MPI_INTEGER', 'MPI_MAX', 'GRID', ierr)
1177    statevector%deet = deet
1178    call rpn_comm_allreduce(statevector%ip2List, ip2List, statevector%numStep,  &
1179                            'MPI_INTEGER', 'MPI_MAX', 'GRID', ierr)
1180    statevector%ip2List(:) = ip2List(:)
1181    call rpn_comm_allreduce(statevector%npasList, npasList, statevector%numStep,  &
1182                            'MPI_INTEGER', 'MPI_MAX', 'GRID', ierr)
1183    statevector%npasList(:) = npasList(:)
1184    call rpn_comm_allreduce(statevector%dateOriginList, dateOriginList, statevector%numStep,  &
1185                            'MPI_INTEGER', 'MPI_MAX', 'GRID', ierr)
1186    statevector%dateOriginList(:) = dateOriginList(:)
1187
1188    call rpn_comm_allreduce(statevector%onPhysicsGrid(:), onPhysicsGrid(:), size(onPhysicsGrid),  &
1189                            'MPI_LOGICAL', 'MPI_LOR', 'GRID', ierr)
1190    statevector%onPhysicsGrid(:) = onPhysicsGrid(:)
1191
1192    call msg('gsv_communicateTimeParams', 'deet = '//str(deet) &
1193         //new_line('')//'ip2List = '//str(ip2List(:)) &
1194         //new_line('')//'npasList = '//str(npasList(:)) &
1195         //new_line('')//'dateOriginList = '//str(dateOriginList(:)))
1196
1197  end subroutine gsv_communicateTimeParams

1212    statevector%npasList(:)       =  mpc_missingValue_int

1219  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1220  ! gsv_checkMpiDistribution
1221  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1222  subroutine gsv_checkMpiDistribution(stateVector)
1223    !
1224    !:Purpose: Checks the distribution of latitude and longitude gridpoints
1225    !           over the mpi tasks. If the variation in the number of grid
1226    !           points in either direction is too large, other mpi topologies
1227    !           will be suggested in the listing and the program could
1228    !           potentially abort. The printing to the listing is limited
1229    !           to only the first 5 calls.
1230    !
1231    implicit none
1232
1233    ! Arguments:
1234    type(struct_gsv), intent(in) :: statevector
1235
1236    ! Locals:
1237    integer       :: npex, npey
1238    integer       :: lonPerPEmin, lonPerPEmax, latPerPEmin, latPerPEmax
1239    integer, save :: numCalls = 0
1240
1241    ! check if distribution of gridpoints over mpi tasks is very uneven
1242    if (maxval(statevector%allLonPerPE) > 2*minval(statevector%allLonPerPE) .or. &
1243        maxval(statevector%allLatPerPE) > 2*minval(statevector%allLatPerPE)) then
1244      numCalls = numCalls + 1
1245      if (mmpi_myid == 0 .and. (numCalls <= 5)) then
1246        call msg('gsv_checkMpiDistribution', & 
1247            new_line('')//'=============================================================' &
1248          //new_line('')//'WARNING: bad choice of mpi topology!' &
1249          //new_line('')//'   mpi x, y dimensions = '//str(mmpi_npex)//', '//str(mmpi_npey) &
1250          //new_line('')//'   min(lonPerPE) = '//str(minval(statevector%allLonPerPE)) &
1251          //new_line('')//'   max(lonPerPE) = '//str(maxval(statevector%allLonPerPE)) &
1252          //new_line('')//'   min(latPerPE) = '//str(minval(statevector%allLatPerPE)) &
1253          //new_line('')//'   max(latPerPE) = '//str(maxval(statevector%allLatPerPE)) &
1254          //new_line(''), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
1255
1256        ! make suggestions for mpi x diminension
1257        if (maxval(statevector%allLonPerPE) > 2*minval(statevector%allLonPerPE)) then
1258          call msg('gsv_checkMpiDistribution', & 
1259                   'Please choose a value of mpi x dimension that gives a smaller ' &
1260                   //'difference between min and max of lonPerPE. Here are some options:', &
1261                   mpiAll_opt=.false.)
1262          do npex = 1, 2*mmpi_npex
1263            lonPerPEmin = floor(real(stateVector%ni)/real(npex))
1264            lonPerPEmax = stateVector%ni - (npex - 1) * lonPerPEmin
1265            if (lonPerPEmax < 2*lonPerPEmin) then
1266              call msg('gsv_checkMpiDistribution','mpi x dimension = '//str(npex) &
1267                   //', difference between min and max lonPerPE = ' &
1268                   //str(lonPerPEmax - lonPerPEmin), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
1269            end if
1270          end do
1271        end if
1272
1273        ! make suggestions for mpi y dimension
1274        if (maxval(statevector%allLatPerPE) > 2*minval(statevector%allLatPerPE)) then
1275          call msg('gsv_checkMpiDistribution',&
1276               'Please choose a value of mpi y dimension that gives a smaller ' &
1277               //'difference between min and max of latPerPE. Here are some options:',&
1278               mpiAll_opt=.false.)
1279          do npey = 1, 2*mmpi_npey
1280            latPerPEmin = floor(real(stateVector%nj)/real(npey))
1281            latPerPEmax = stateVector%nj - (npey - 1) * latPerPEmin
1282            if (latPerPEmax < 2*latPerPEmin) then
1283              call msg('gsv_checkMpiDistribution','mpi y dimension = '//str(npey)  &
1284                //', difference between min and max latPerPE = ' &
1285                //str(latPerPEmax - latPerPEmin), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
1286            end if
1287          end do
1288        end if
1289
1290        call msg('gsv_checkMpiDistribution', new_line('')//'=============================================================', mpiAll_opt=.false.)
1291      else
1292        ! After 5 calls, just give a short message
1293        call msg('gsv_checkMpiDistribution','WARNING: bad choice of mpi topology!', mpiAll_opt=.false.)
1294      end if
1295
1296      if (abortOnMpiImbalance) call utl_abort('gsv_checkMpiDistribution: Please choose a better mpi topology')
1297    end if
1298
1299  end subroutine gsv_checkMpiDistribution
1300    
1301  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1302  ! gsv_complementaryUVname
1303  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1304  function complementaryUVname(UV_in) result(UV_out)
1305    !
1306    !:Purpose: Returns the other wind component name
1307    !           UU -> VV, VV -> UU
1308    !
1309    implicit none
1310
1311    ! Arguments:
1312    character(len=*), intent(in)  :: UV_in
1313    character(len=4)              :: UV_out
1314
1315    ! return UU on VV input, and vice versa
1316    if (trim(UV_in) == 'UU') then
1317      UV_out = 'VV  '
1318    else if (trim(UV_in) == 'VV') then
1319      UV_out = 'UU  '
1320    else
1321      call utl_abort('complementaryUVname: invalid input, UV_in = '//trim(UV_in))
1322    end if
1323  end function complementaryUVname

1325  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1326  ! gsv_modifyDate
1327  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1328  subroutine gsv_modifyDate(statevector, dateStamp, modifyDateOrigin_opt)
1329    !
1330    !:Purpose: Modifies a statevector reference date
1331    !
1332    implicit none
1333  
1334    ! Arguments
1335    type(struct_gsv),  intent(inout) :: statevector
1336    integer,           intent(in)    :: dateStamp
1337    logical, optional, intent(in)    :: modifyDateOrigin_opt
1338
1339    if (statevector%numStep == 1) then
1340      statevector%dateStampList(1) = dateStamp
1341      if(present(modifyDateOrigin_opt)) statevector%dateOriginList(1) = dateStamp 
1342    else
1343      call tim_getstamplist(statevector%dateStampList, statevector%numStep, dateStamp)
1344      if(present(modifyDateOrigin_opt)) call tim_getstamplist(statevector%dateOriginList, statevector%numStep, dateStamp)
1345    end if
1346    statevector%dateStamp3d => statevector%dateStampList(statevector%anltime)
1347
1348  end subroutine gsv_modifyDate
