1350  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1351  ! gsv_modifyVarName
1352  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1353  subroutine gsv_modifyVarName(statevector, oldVarName, newVarName) 
1354    !
1355    !:Purpose: Replaces a variable with a variable of the same vertical level type
1356    !
1357    implicit none
1358
1359    ! Arguments:
1360    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector
1361    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: oldVarName
1362    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: newVarName
1363    
1364    ! Locals:
1365    integer :: varIndex_oldVarName, varIndex_newVarName
1366
1367    ! Test the compatibility of the modifications
1368    if (.not. gsv_varExist(statevector,oldVarName)) then
1369      call utl_abort('gsv_modifyVarName: the varName to replace does not exist '//trim(oldVarName))
1370    end if
1371    if (gsv_varExist(statevector,newVarName)) then
1372      call utl_abort('gsv_modifyVarName: the varName to add already exist '//trim(oldVarName))
1373    end if
1374    if (vnl_varLevelFromVarname(newVarName) /= vnl_varLevelFromVarname(oldVarName)) then
1375      call utl_abort('gsv_modifyVarName: the level type are different')
1376    end if
1377
1378    ! Find  varIndex_oldVarName & varIndex_newVarName
1379    varIndex_oldVarName = vnl_varListIndex(oldVarName)
1380    varIndex_newVarName = vnl_varListIndex(newVarName)
1381
1382    ! Change the ExistList
1383    statevector%varExistList(varIndex_oldVarName) = .false.
1384    statevector%varExistList(varIndex_newVarName) = .true.
1385
1386    ! Change the offset
1387    statevector%varOffset(varIndex_newVarName) = statevector%varOffset(varIndex_oldVarName)
1388    statevector%varOffset(varIndex_oldVarName) = 0
1389
1390    ! Change the number of levels
1391    statevector%varNumLev(varIndex_newVarName) = statevector%varNumLev(varIndex_oldVarName)
1392    statevector%varNumLev(varIndex_oldVarName) = 0
1393
1394  end subroutine gsv_modifyVarName
1395
1396  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1397  ! gsv_zero
1398  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1399  subroutine gsv_zero(statevector)
1400    !
1401    !:Purpose: Zeros all struct_gsv arrays
1402    !
1403    implicit none
1404
1405    ! Arguments:
1406    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector
1407
1408    ! Locals:
1409    integer :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lat1,lat2,lon1,lon2,k1,k2,k1UV,k2UV
1410
1411    if (.not.statevector%allocated) then
1412      call utl_abort('gsv_zero: gridStateVector not yet allocated')
1413    end if
1414
1415    lon1=statevector%myLonBeg
1416    lon2=statevector%myLonEnd
1417    lat1=statevector%myLatBeg
1418    lat2=statevector%myLatEnd
1419    k1=statevector%mykBeg
1420    k2=statevector%mykEnd
1421    k1UV = statevector%myUVkBeg
1422    k2UV = statevector%myUVkEnd
1423
1424    if (associated(statevector%HeightSfc)) statevector%HeightSfc(:,:) = 0.0d0
1425
1426    if (statevector%dataKind == 8) then
1427
1428      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1429      do kIndex = k1, k2
1430        do stepIndex = 1, statevector%numStep
1431          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1432            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1433              statevector%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = 0.0d0
1434            end do
1435          end do
1436        end do
1437      end do
1438      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1439
1440      if (statevector%extraUVallocated) then
1441        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1442        do kIndex = k1UV, k2UV
1443          do stepIndex = 1, statevector%numStep
1444            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1445              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1446                statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r8(lonIndex,latIndex,stepIndex) = 0.0d0
1447              end do
1448            end do
1449          end do
1450        end do
1451        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1452      end if
1453
1454    else if (statevector%dataKind == 4) then
1455
1456      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)
1457      do kIndex = k1, k2
1458        do stepIndex = 1, statevector%numStep
1459          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1460            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1461              statevector%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = 0.0
1462            end do
1463          end do
1464        end do
1465      end do
1466      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1467
1468      if (statevector%extraUVallocated) then
1469        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1470        do kIndex = k1UV, k2UV
1471          do stepIndex = 1, statevector%numStep
1472            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1473              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1474                statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r4(lonIndex,latIndex,stepIndex) = 0.0
1475              end do
1476            end do
1477          end do
1478        end do
1479        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1480      end if
1481
1482    else
1483      call utl_abort('gsv_zero: unknown value of datakind')
1484    end if
1485    
1486  end subroutine gsv_zero
1487
1488  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1489  ! gsv_add
1490  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1491  subroutine gsv_add(statevector_in,statevector_inout,scaleFactor_opt)
1492    !
1493    !:Purpose: Adds two statevectors
1494    !           statevector_inout = statevector_inout + scaleFactor_opt * statevector_in
1495    !
1496    implicit none
1497
1498    ! Arguments:
1499    type(struct_gsv),  intent(in)     :: statevector_in     ! first operand 
1500    type(struct_gsv),  intent(inout)  :: statevector_inout  ! second operand, will receive the result
1501    real(8), optional, intent(in)     :: scaleFactor_opt    ! optional scaling of the second operand prior to the addition
1502
1503    ! Locals:
1504    integer           :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2,k1,k2
1505
1506    if (.not.statevector_in%allocated) then
1507      call utl_abort('gsv_add: stateVector_in not yet allocated')
1508    end if
1509    if (.not.statevector_inout%allocated) then
1510      call utl_abort('gsv_add: stateVector_inout not yet allocated')
1511    end if
1512    if ( statevector_in%mykBeg /= statevector_inout%mykBeg .or. &
1513         statevector_in%mykEnd /= statevector_inout%mykEnd ) then
1514      call utl_abort('gsv_add: mykBeg/mykEnd of stateVector_in/inout do not match')
1515    end if
1516
1517    lon1=statevector_in%myLonBeg
1518    lon2=statevector_in%myLonEnd
1519    lat1=statevector_in%myLatBeg
1520    lat2=statevector_in%myLatEnd
1521    k1=statevector_in%mykBeg
1522    k2=statevector_in%mykEnd
1523
1524    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 8 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 8) then
1525
1526      if (present(scaleFactor_opt)) then
1527        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
1528          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1529          do kIndex = k1, k2
1530            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1531              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1532                statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
1533                     statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) +  &
1534                     scaleFactor_opt * statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
1535              end do
1536            end do
1537          end do
1538          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1539        end do
1540      else
1541        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
1542          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1543          do kIndex = k1, k2
1544            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1545              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1546                statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
1547                     statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) +  &
1548                     statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
1549              end do
1550            end do
1551          end do
1552          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1553        end do
1554      end if
1555
1556    else if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 4 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 4) then
1557
1558      if (present(scaleFactor_opt)) then
1559        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1560        do kIndex = k1, k2
1561          do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
1562            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1563              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1564                statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) +  &
1565                                          real(scaleFactor_opt,4) * statevector_in%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
1566              end do
1567            end do
1568          end do
1569        end do
1570        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1571      else
1572        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1573        do kIndex = k1, k2
1574          do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
1575            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1576              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1577                statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) +  &
1578                                                                statevector_in%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
1579              end do
1580            end do
1581          end do
1582        end do
1583        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1584      end if
1585
1586    else
1587      call utl_abort('gsv_add: Data type must be the same for both statevectors')
1588    end if
1589
1590  end subroutine gsv_add
1591
1592  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1593  ! gsv_schurProduct
1594  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1595  subroutine gsv_schurProduct(statevector_in,statevector_inout)
1596    !
1597    !:Purpose: Applies the Schur product of two statevector
1598    !           statevector_inout(i,j,k,l) = statevector_inout(i,j,k,l) * statevector_in(i,j,k,l) 
1599    !
1600    implicit none
1601
1602    ! Arguments:
1603    type(struct_gsv),  intent(in)     :: statevector_in     ! first operand 
1604    type(struct_gsv),  intent(inout)  :: statevector_inout  ! second operand, will receive the result
1605
1606    ! Locals:
1607    integer :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2,k1,k2
1608
1609    if (.not.statevector_in%allocated) then
1610      call utl_abort('gsv_schurProduct: gridStateVector_in not yet allocated')
1611    end if
1612    if (.not.statevector_inout%allocated) then
1613      call utl_abort('gsv_schurProduct: gridStateVector_inout not yet allocated')
1614    end if
1615
1616    lon1=statevector_in%myLonBeg
1617    lon2=statevector_in%myLonEnd
1618    lat1=statevector_in%myLatBeg
1619    lat2=statevector_in%myLatEnd
1620    k1=statevector_in%mykBeg
1621    k2=statevector_in%mykEnd
1622
1623    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 8 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 8) then
1624
1625      do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
1626        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1627        do kIndex = k1, k2
1628          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1629            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1630              statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
1631                   statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) *  &
1632                   statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
1633            end do
1634          end do
1635        end do
1636        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1637      end do
1638      
1639
1640    else if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 4 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 4) then
1641
1642      do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
1643        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
1644        do kIndex = k1, k2
1645          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1646            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1647              statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
1648                   statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) *  &
1649                   statevector_in%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
1650            end do
1651          end do
1652        end do
1653        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1654      end do
1655
1656    else
1657      call utl_abort('gsv_schurProduct: Data type must be the same for both statevectors')
1658    end if
1659
1660  end subroutine gsv_schurProduct
1661
1662  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1663  ! gsv_copy
1664  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1665  subroutine gsv_copy(statevector_in, statevector_out, stepIndexOut_opt, &
1666                      allowTimeMismatch_opt, allowVarMismatch_opt, &
1667                      allowVcoMismatch_opt, beSilent_opt)
1668    !
1669    !:Purpose: Copies a statevector
1670    !
1671    implicit none
1672
1673    ! Arguments:
1674    type(struct_gsv),  intent(in)    :: statevector_in
1675    type(struct_gsv),  intent(inout) :: statevector_out
1676    integer, optional, intent(in)    :: stepIndexOut_opt
1677    logical, optional, intent(in)    :: allowTimeMismatch_opt
1678    logical, optional, intent(in)    :: allowVarMismatch_opt
1679    logical, optional, intent(in)    :: allowVcoMismatch_opt
1680    logical, optional, intent(in)    :: beSilent_opt
1681
1682    ! Locals:
1683    logical            :: timeMismatch, allowVarMismatch, varMismatch, allowVcoMismatch
1684    logical            :: beSilent
1685
1686    integer :: stepIndex, lonIndex, kIndex, latIndex, levIndex, varIndex, numCommonVar 
1687    integer :: lon1, lon2, lat1, lat2, k1, k2, step1, step2, stepIn, nlev_in
1688
1689    real(4), pointer :: field_out_r4(:,:,:,:), field_in_r4(:,:,:,:)
1690    real(8), pointer :: field_out_r8(:,:,:,:), field_in_r8(:,:,:,:)
1691
1692    character(len=4), allocatable :: varNameListCommon(:)
1693    character(len=4)              :: varName
1694    character(len=10)             :: gsvCopyType 
1695    character(len=4), pointer     :: varNamesList_in(:), varNamesList_out(:)
1696
1697    if ( present(beSilent_opt) ) then
1698      beSilent = beSilent_opt
1699    else
1700      beSilent = .false.
1701    end if
1702    
1703    if ( present(allowVarMismatch_opt) ) then
1704      allowVarMismatch = allowVarMismatch_opt
1705    else
1706      allowVarMismatch = .false.
1707    end if
1708    varMismatch = .false.
1709
1710    ! asserting grid structure consistency
1711    if ( .not. hco_equal(gsv_getHco(statevector_in),gsv_getHco(statevector_out)) ) then
1712      call utl_abort('gsv_copy: horizontal structure inconsistency')
1713    end if
1714
1715    if (present(allowVcoMismatch_opt)) then
1716      allowVcoMismatch = allowVcoMismatch_opt
1717    else
1718      allowVcoMismatch = .false.
1719    end if
1720    if ( .not. vco_equal(gsv_getVco(statevector_in),gsv_getVco(statevector_out)) ) then
1721      if ( .not. allowVcoMismatch) then
1722        call utl_abort('gsv_copy: vertical structure inconsistency')
1723      end if
1724    end if
1725
1726    timeMismatch = .false.
1727    if (present(allowTimeMismatch_opt)) then
1728      if (allowTimeMismatch_opt) then
1729        if (statevector_in%numStep < statevector_out%numStep) then
1730          call utl_abort('gsv_copy: numStep_in less than numStep_out, which is not allowed')
1731        end if
1732        if (statevector_in%numStep /= statevector_out%numStep) then
1733          timeMismatch = .true.
1734        end if
1735      else
1736        if (statevector_in%numStep /= statevector_out%numStep) then
1737          call utl_abort('gsv_copy: numStep_in not equal to numStep_out')
1738        end if
1739      end if
1740    end if
1741
1742    if (present(stepIndexOut_opt) .and. present(allowTimeMismatch_opt)) then
1743      call utl_abort('gsv_copy: Cannot specify both stepIndexOut_opt ' //  &
1744                     'and allowTimeMismatch_opt in the same call')
1745    end if
1746
1747    if (.not.statevector_in%allocated) then
1748      call utl_abort('gsv_copy: gridStateVector_in not yet allocated')
1749    end if
1750    if (.not.statevector_out%allocated) then
1751      call utl_abort('gsv_copy: gridStateVector_out not yet allocated')
1752    end if
1753
1754    if (statevector_in%mpi_distribution == 'VarsLevs') allowVarMismatch = .false.
1755
1756    nullify(varNamesList_in)
1757    nullify(varNamesList_out)
1758    call gsv_varNamesList(varNamesList_in,statevector_in)
1759    call gsv_varNamesList(varNamesList_out,statevector_out)
1760
1761    if (size(varNamesList_in(:)) /= size(varNamesList_out(:))) then
1762      varMismatch = .true.
1763    else 
1764      if (all(varNamesList_in(:) == varNamesList_out(:))) then
1765        varMismatch = .false.
1766      else
1767        varMismatch = .true.
1768      end if 
1769    end if
1770    deallocate(varNamesList_out)
1771    deallocate(varNamesList_in)
1772
1773    ! if varMismatch and allowVarMismatch -> copy by varName, else copy by kIndex
1774    if (varMismatch .and. allowVarMismatch) then 
1775      gsvCopyType = 'VarName'
1776    else if (.not. varMismatch) then
1777      gsvCopyType = 'kIndex'
1778    else 
1779      call utl_abort('gsv_copy: varMismatch and allowVarMismatch do not agree! Aborting.')
1780    end if
1781
1782    call msg('gsv_copy', 'gsvCopyType='//gsvCopyType &
1783         //', timeMismatch='//str(timeMismatch) &
1784         //', varMismatch='//str(varMismatch) &
1785         //', allowVarMismatch='//str(allowVarMismatch), verb_opt=2)
1786
1787    ! build list of common variables and see if there is a mismatch
1788    allocate(varNameListCommon(vnl_numvarmax))
1789    varNameListCommon(:) = '    '
1790    if (varMismatch) then
1791      numCommonVar = 0
1792      do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
1793        varName = vnl_varNameList(varIndex)
1794        if (gsv_varExist(statevector_in,varName) .and. gsv_varExist(statevector_out,varName)) then
1795          numCommonVar = numCommonVar + 1
1796          varNameListCommon(numCommonVar) = varName 
1797        end if 
1798      end do
1799    end if
1800
1801    lon1 = statevector_in%myLonBeg
1802    lon2 = statevector_in%myLonEnd
1803    lat1 = statevector_in%myLatBeg
1804    lat2 = statevector_in%myLatEnd
1805    k1 = statevector_in%mykBeg
1806    k2 = statevector_in%mykEnd
1807    ! If stepIndexOut_opt present then copy from step 1 to stepIndexOut_opt
1808    if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1809      step1 = stepIndexOut_opt
1810      step2 = stepIndexOut_opt
1811    else
1812      step1 = 1
1813      step2 = statevector_out%numStep
1814    end if
1815
1816    ! copy over some time related parameters
1817    statevector_out%deet   = statevector_in%deet
1818    statevector_out%etiket = statevector_in%etiket
1819    do stepIndex = step1, step2
1820      if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1821        stepIn = 1
1822      else if(timeMismatch) then
1823        stepIn_Loop0: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
1824          if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
1825              statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop0
1826        end do stepIn_Loop0
1827      else
1828        stepIn = stepIndex
1829      end if
1830      statevector_out%dateOriginList(stepIndex) = statevector_in%dateOriginList(stepIn)
1831      statevector_out%npasList(stepIndex)       = statevector_in%npasList(stepIn)
1832      statevector_out%ip2List(stepIndex)        = statevector_in%ip2List(stepIn)
1833    end do
1834
1835    if (associated(statevector_in%HeightSfc) .and. associated(statevector_out%HeightSfc)) then
1836      statevector_out%HeightSfc(:,:) = statevector_in%HeightSfc(:,:)
1837    end if
1838
1839    if (statevector_out%dataKind == 8 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 8) then
1840
1841      if (trim(gsvCopyType) == 'kIndex') then
1842        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
1843        do kIndex = k1, k2
1844          do stepIndex = step1, step2
1845            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1846              stepIn = 1
1847            else if(timeMismatch) then
1848              stepIn_Loop: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
1849                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
1850                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop
1851              end do stepIn_Loop
1852            else
1853              stepIn = stepIndex
1854            end if
1855            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1856              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1857                statevector_out%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) =  &
1858                  statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIn)
1859              end do
1860            end do
1861          end do
1862        end do
1863        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1864
1865      else
1866        do varIndex = 1, numCommonVar
1867          varName = varNameListCommon(varIndex)
1868
1869          nlev_in = gsv_getNumLevFromVarName(statevector_in,varName)
1870
1871          call gsv_getField(statevector_in ,field_in_r8, varName)
1872          call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8, varName)
1873
1874          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,levIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
1875          do stepIndex = step1, step2
1876            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1877              stepIn = 1
1878            else if(timeMismatch) then
1879              stepIn_Loop2: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
1880                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
1881                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop2
1882              end do stepIn_Loop2
1883            else
1884              stepIn = stepIndex
1885            end if
1886            do levIndex = 1, nlev_in
1887              do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1888                do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1889                  field_out_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIndex) =  &
1890                    field_in_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIn)
1891                end do
1892              end do
1893            end do
1894          end do
1895          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1896
1897        end do
1898      end if
1899
1900    else if (statevector_out%dataKind == 4 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 4) then
1901
1902      if (trim(gsvCopyType) == 'kIndex') then
1903        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
1904        do kIndex = k1, k2
1905          do stepIndex = step1, step2
1906            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1907              stepIn = 1
1908            else if(timeMismatch) then
1909              stepIn_Loop3: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
1910                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
1911                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop3
1912              end do stepIn_Loop3
1913            else
1914              stepIn = stepIndex
1915            end if
1916            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1917              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1918                statevector_out%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) =  &
1919                  statevector_in%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIn)
1920              end do
1921            end do
1922          end do
1923        end do
1924        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1925
1926      else
1927        do varIndex = 1, numCommonVar
1928          varName = varNameListCommon(varIndex)
1929
1930          nlev_in = gsv_getNumLevFromVarName(statevector_in,varName)
1931
1932          call gsv_getField(statevector_in ,field_in_r4, varName)
1933          call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r4, varName)
1934
1935          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,levIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
1936          do stepIndex = step1, step2
1937            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1938              stepIn = 1
1939            else if(timeMismatch) then
1940              stepIn_Loop4: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
1941                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
1942                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop4
1943              end do stepIn_Loop4
1944            else
1945              stepIn = stepIndex
1946            end if
1947            do levIndex = 1, nlev_in
1948              do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1949                do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1950                  field_out_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIndex) =  &
1951                    field_in_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIn)
1952                end do
1953              end do
1954            end do
1955          end do
1956          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1957        end do
1958      end if
1959
1960    else if (statevector_out%dataKind == 4 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 8) then
1961
1962      if (trim(gsvCopyType) == 'kIndex') then
1963        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
1964        do kIndex = k1, k2
1965          do stepIndex = step1, step2
1966            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1967              stepIn = 1
1968            else if(timeMismatch) then
1969              stepIn_Loop5: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
1970                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
1971                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop5
1972              end do stepIn_Loop5
1973            else
1974              stepIn = stepIndex
1975            end if
1976            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
1977              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
1978                statevector_out%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) =  &
1979                  real(statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIn),4)
1980              end do
1981            end do
1982          end do
1983        end do
1984        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
1985
1986      else
1987        do varIndex = 1, numCommonVar
1988          varName = varNameListCommon(varIndex)
1989
1990          nlev_in = gsv_getNumLevFromVarName(statevector_in,varName)
1991
1992          call gsv_getField(statevector_in ,field_in_r8, varName)
1993          call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r4, varName)
1994
1995          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,levIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
1996          do stepIndex = step1, step2
1997            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
1998              stepIn = 1
1999            else if(timeMismatch) then
2000              stepIn_Loop6: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
2001                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
2002                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop6
2003              end do stepIn_Loop6
2004            else
2005              stepIn = stepIndex
2006            end if
2007            do levIndex = 1, nlev_in
2008              do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2009                do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2010                  field_out_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIndex) =  &
2011                    real(field_in_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIn),4)
2012                end do
2013              end do
2014            end do
2015          end do
2016          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2017
2018        end do
2019      end if
2020
2021    else if (statevector_out%dataKind == 8 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 4) then
2022
2023      if (trim(gsvCopyType) == 'kIndex') then
2024        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
2025        do kIndex = k1, k2
2026          do stepIndex = step1, step2
2027            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
2028              stepIn = 1
2029            else if(timeMismatch) then
2030              stepIn_Loop7: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
2031                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
2032                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop7
2033              end do stepIn_Loop7
2034            else
2035              stepIn = stepIndex
2036            end if
2037            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2038              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2039                statevector_out%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) =  &
2040                  real(statevector_in%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIn),8)
2041              end do
2042            end do
2043          end do
2044        end do
2045        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2046
2047      else
2048        do varIndex = 1, numCommonVar
2049          varName = varNameListCommon(varIndex)
2050
2051          nlev_in = gsv_getNumLevFromVarName(statevector_in,varName)
2052
2053          call gsv_getField(statevector_in ,field_in_r4, varName)
2054          call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8, varName)
2055
2056          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,levIndex,lonIndex,stepIn)
2057          do stepIndex = step1, step2
2058            if (present(stepIndexOut_opt)) then
2059              stepIn = 1
2060            else if(timeMismatch) then
2061              stepIn_Loop8: do stepIn = 1, statevector_in%numStep
2062                if (statevector_in%dateStampList(stepIn) ==  &
2063                    statevector_out%dateStampList(stepIndex)) exit stepIn_loop8
2064              end do stepIn_Loop8
2065            else
2066              stepIn = stepIndex
2067            end if
2068            do levIndex = 1, nlev_in
2069              do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2070                do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2071                  field_out_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIndex) =  &
2072                    real(field_in_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIn),8)
2073                end do
2074              end do
2075            end do
2076          end do
2077          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2078
2079        end do
2080      end if
2081
2082    else
2083      call utl_abort('gsv_copy: Unknown data types')
2084    end if
2085
2086    deallocate(varNameListCommon)
2087
2088    ! Copy mask if it exists
2089    call gsv_copyMask(statevector_in, statevector_out, beSilent_opt=beSilent)
2090
2091  end subroutine gsv_copy
2092
2093  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2094  ! gsv_copyMask
2095  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2096  subroutine gsv_copyMask(statevector_in,statevector_out,beSilent_opt)
2097    !
2098    !:Purpose: Copy ocean mask, if it exists.
2099    !
2100    implicit none
2101
2102    ! Arguments:
2103    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)     :: statevector_in
2104    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout)  :: statevector_out
2105    logical, optional, intent(in)    :: beSilent_opt
2106
2107    ! Locals:
2108    logical :: beSilent
2109
2110    if ( present(beSilent_opt) ) then
2111      beSilent = beSilent_opt
2112    else
2113      beSilent = .false.
2114    end if
2115
2116    ! Copy mask if it exists
2117    call ocm_copyMask(statevector_in%oceanMask, statevector_out%oceanMask,&
2118                      beSilent_opt=beSilent)
2119
2120  end subroutine gsv_copyMask
2121
2122  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2123  ! gsv_copy4Dto3D
2124  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2125  subroutine gsv_copy4Dto3D(statevector_in,statevector_out)
2126    !
2127    !:Purpose: Copies contents of a 4D statevector into a 3D statevector
2128    !           object by extracting the middle time step.
2129    !
2130    implicit none
2131
2132    ! Arguments:
2133    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)     :: statevector_in
2134    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout)  :: statevector_out
2135
2136    ! Locals:
2137    integer :: middleStepIndex, lonIndex, latIndex, kIndex
2138    integer :: lon1, lon2, lat1, lat2, k1, k2, numStepIn, numStepOut
2139
2140    if (.not.statevector_in%allocated) then
2141      call utl_abort('gsv_copy4Dto3D: gridStateVector_in not yet allocated')
2142    end if
2143    if (.not.statevector_out%allocated) then
2144      call utl_abort('gsv_copy4Dto3D: gridStateVector_out not yet allocated')
2145    end if
2146
2147    lon1 = statevector_in%myLonBeg
2148    lon2 = statevector_in%myLonEnd
2149    lat1 = statevector_in%myLatBeg
2150    lat2 = statevector_in%myLatEnd
2151    k1 = statevector_in%mykBeg
2152    k2 = statevector_in%mykEnd
2153    numStepIn  =  statevector_in%numStep
2154    numStepOut =  statevector_out%numStep
2155
2156    if (numStepOut /= 1) call utl_abort('gsv_copy4Dto3D: output statevector must have only 1 timestep')
2157    if (numStepIn == 1) then
2158      call msg('gsv_copy4Dto3D', 'WARNING: input statevector only has 1 timestep, will simply copy.')
2159    end if
2160    middleStepIndex = (numStepIn + 1) / 2
2161
2162    if (associated(statevector_in%HeightSfc) .and. associated(statevector_out%HeightSfc)) then
2163      statevector_out%HeightSfc(:,:) = statevector_in%HeightSfc(:,:)
2164    end if
2165
2166    if (statevector_out%dataKind == 8 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 8) then
2167
2168      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (kIndex,latIndex,lonIndex)
2169      do kIndex = k1, k2
2170        do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2171          do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2172            statevector_out%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,1) =  &
2173              statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,middleStepIndex)
2174          end do
2175        end do
2176      end do
2177      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2178
2179    else if (statevector_out%dataKind == 4 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 4) then
2180
2181      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (kIndex,latIndex,lonIndex)
2182      do kIndex = k1, k2
2183        do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2184          do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2185            statevector_out%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,1) =  &
2186              statevector_in%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,middleStepIndex)
2187          end do
2188        end do
2189      end do
2190      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2191
2192    else
2193      call utl_abort('gsv_copy4Dto3D: Data type must be the same for both statevectors')
2194    end if
2195
2196  end subroutine gsv_copy4Dto3D
2197
2198  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2199  ! gsv_copyHeightSfc
2200  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2201  subroutine gsv_copyHeightSfc(statevector_in,statevector_out)
2202    !
2203    !:Purpose: Copies HeightSfc data from one statevector to another
2204    !
2205    implicit none
2206
2207    ! Arguments:
2208    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)    :: statevector_in
2209    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_out
2210
2211    if ( .not. hco_equal(gsv_getHco(statevector_in), gsv_getHco(statevector_out))) then
2212      call utl_abort('gsv_copyHeightSfc: inconsistent horizontal structure')
2213    end if
2214    if (.not.statevector_in%allocated) then
2215      call utl_abort('gsv_copyHeightSfc: gridStateVector_in not yet allocated')
2216    end if
2217    if (.not.statevector_out%allocated) then
2218      call utl_abort('gsv_copyHeightSfc: gridStateVector_out not yet allocated')
2219    end if
2220
2221    if (.not. associated(statevector_in%HeightSfc)) then
2222      call utl_abort('gsv_copyHeightSfc: HeightSfc in gridStateVector_in not allocated')
2223    end if
2224    if (.not. associated(statevector_out%HeightSfc)) then
2225      call utl_abort('gsv_copyHeightSfc: HeightSfc in gridStateVector_out not allocated')
2226    end if
2227
2228    statevector_out%HeightSfc(:,:) = statevector_in%HeightSfc(:,:)
2229
2230  end subroutine gsv_copyHeightSfc
2231
2232  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2233  ! gsv_hPad
2234  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2235  subroutine gsv_hPad(statevector_in,statevector_out)
2236    !
2237    !:Purpose: Copies a statevector to a horizontally larger one and pad with a
2238    !           predefined value of 0 (or 1000 for 'P0'). 
2239    !
2240    implicit none
2241
2242    ! Arguments:
2243    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)     :: statevector_in
2244    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout)  :: statevector_out
2245
2246    ! Locals:
2247    integer :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex
2248    integer :: lonBeg_in, lonEnd_in, latBeg_in, latEnd_in, kBeg, kEnd
2249
2250    real(8) :: paddingValue_r8
2251    real(4) :: paddingValue_r4
2252
2253    if (.not.statevector_in%allocated) then
2254      call utl_abort('gsv_hPad: gridStateVector_in not yet allocated')
2255    end if
2256    if (.not.statevector_out%allocated) then
2257      call utl_abort('gsv_hPad: gridStateVector_out not yet allocated')
2258    end if
2259    if (statevector_in%mpi_local .or. statevector_out%mpi_local) then
2260       call utl_abort('gsv_hPad: both gridStateVectors must be NO MPI')
2261    end if
2262
2263    lonBeg_in=statevector_in%myLonBeg
2264    lonEnd_in=statevector_in%myLonEnd
2265    latBeg_in=statevector_in%myLatBeg
2266    latEnd_in=statevector_in%myLatEnd
2267    kBeg=statevector_in%mykBeg
2268    kEnd=statevector_in%mykEnd
2269
2270    if (lonBeg_in > statevector_out%myLonBeg .or. &
2271        lonEnd_in > statevector_out%myLonEnd .or. &
2272        latBeg_in > statevector_out%myLatBeg .or. &
2273        latEnd_in > statevector_out%myLatEnd) then
2274      call utl_abort('gsv_hPad: StateVector_out is SMALLER than StateVector_in')
2275    end if
2276    if (kBeg /= statevector_out%mykBeg .or. kEnd /= statevector_out%mykEnd) then
2277      call utl_abort('gsv_hPad: Vertical levels are not compatible')
2278    end if
2279
2280    ! copy over some time related parameters
2281    statevector_out%deet   = statevector_in%deet
2282    statevector_out%etiket = statevector_in%etiket
2283    do stepIndex = 1, statevector_out%numStep
2284      statevector_out%dateOriginList(stepIndex) = statevector_in%dateOriginList(stepIndex)
2285      statevector_out%npasList(stepIndex)       = statevector_in%npasList(stepIndex)
2286      statevector_out%ip2List(stepIndex)        = statevector_in%ip2List(stepIndex)
2287    end do
2288
2289    if (statevector_out%dataKind == 8 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 8) then
2290
2291      if (associated(statevector_in%HeightSfc) .and. associated(statevector_out%HeightSfc)) then
2292        statevector_out%HeightSfc(:,:) = 0.d0
2293        statevector_out%HeightSfc(lonBeg_in:lonEnd_in,latBeg_in:latEnd_in) = &
2294             statevector_in%HeightSfc(:,:)
2295      end if
2296
2297      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,paddingValue_r8)    
2298      do kIndex = kBeg, kEnd
2299        if (trim(gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector_out,kIndex)) == 'P0') then
2300          paddingValue_r8 = 1000.d0 ! 1000 hPa
2301        else
2302          paddingValue_r8 = 0.d0
2303        end if
2304        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_out%numStep
2305          statevector_out%gd_r8(:,:,kIndex,stepIndex) = paddingValue_r8
2306          do latIndex = latBeg_in, latEnd_in
2307            do lonIndex = lonBeg_in, lonEnd_in
2308              statevector_out%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2309                   statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2310            end do
2311          end do
2312        end do
2313      end do
2314      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2315
2316    else if (statevector_out%dataKind == 4 .and. statevector_in%dataKind == 4) then
2317
2318      if (associated(statevector_in%HeightSfc) .and. associated(statevector_out%HeightSfc)) then
2319        statevector_out%HeightSfc(:,:) = 0.0
2320        statevector_out%HeightSfc(lonBeg_in:lonEnd_in,latBeg_in:latEnd_in) = statevector_in%HeightSfc(:,:)
2321      end if
2322
2323      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,paddingValue_r4)    
2324      do kIndex = kBeg, kEnd
2325        if (trim(gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector_out,kIndex)) == 'P0') then
2326          paddingValue_r4 = 1000.0 ! 1000 hPa
2327        else
2328          paddingValue_r4 = 0.0
2329        end if
2330        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_out%numStep
2331          statevector_out%gd_r4(:,:,kIndex,stepIndex) = paddingValue_r4
2332          do latIndex = latBeg_in, latEnd_in
2333            do lonIndex = lonBeg_in, lonEnd_in
2334              statevector_out%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = statevector_in%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2335            end do
2336          end do
2337        end do
2338      end do
2339      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2340
2341    else
2342      call utl_abort('gsv_hPad: Data type must be the same for both statevectors')
2343    end if
2344
2345  end subroutine gsv_hPad
2346
2347  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2348  ! gsv_power
2349  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2350  subroutine gsv_power(statevector_inout,power,scaleFactor_opt)
2351    !
2352    !:Purpose: Applies the power function
2353    !           statevector_inout(i,j,k,l) = scaleFactor_opt * (statevector_inout(i,j,k,l)**power)
2354    !
2355    implicit none
2356
2357    ! Arguments:
2358    type(struct_gsv),  intent(inout)  :: statevector_inout
2359    real(8),           intent(in)     :: power
2360    real(8), optional, intent(in)     :: scaleFactor_opt    ! optional scaling applied on the power of the operand
2361
2362    ! Locals:
2363    integer :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2,k1,k2
2364
2365    if (.not.statevector_inout%allocated) then
2366      call utl_abort('gsv_power: gridStateVector_inout not yet allocated')
2367    end if
2368
2369    lon1=statevector_inout%myLonBeg
2370    lon2=statevector_inout%myLonEnd
2371    lat1=statevector_inout%myLatBeg
2372    lat2=statevector_inout%myLatEnd
2373    k1=statevector_inout%mykBeg
2374    k2=statevector_inout%mykEnd
2375
2376    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 8) then
2377
2378      if (present(scaleFactor_opt)) then
2379        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2380        do kIndex = k1, k2
2381          do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2382            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2383              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2384                statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2385                     scaleFactor_opt * (statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex))**power
2386              end do
2387            end do
2388          end do
2389        end do
2390        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2391      else
2392        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2393        do kIndex = k1, k2
2394          do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2395            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2396              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2397                statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2398                     (statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex))**power
2399              end do
2400            end do
2401          end do
2402        end do
2403        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2404      end if
2405
2406    else if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 4) then
2407
2408      if (present(scaleFactor_opt)) then
2409        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2410        do kIndex = k1, k2
2411          do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2412            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2413              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2414                statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2415                     real(scaleFactor_opt,4) * (statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex))**power
2416              end do
2417            end do
2418          end do
2419        end do
2420        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2421      else
2422        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2423        do kIndex = k1, k2
2424          do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2425            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2426              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2427                statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2428                     (statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex))**power
2429              end do
2430            end do
2431          end do
2432        end do
2433        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2434      end if
2435
2436    end if
2437
2438  end subroutine gsv_power
2439
2440  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2441  ! gsv_scale
2442  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2443  subroutine gsv_scale(statevector_inout,scaleFactor)
2444    !
2445    !:Purpose: Applies scaling factor to a statevector
2446    !           statevector_inout = scaleFactor * statevector_inout
2447    !
2448    implicit none
2449
2450    ! Arguments:
2451    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_inout
2452    real(8),          intent(in)    :: scaleFactor
2453
2454    ! Locals:
2455    integer :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2,k1,k2
2456
2457    if (.not.statevector_inout%allocated) then
2458      call utl_abort('gsv_scale: gridStateVector_inout not yet allocated')
2459    end if
2460
2461    lon1=statevector_inout%myLonBeg
2462    lon2=statevector_inout%myLonEnd
2463    lat1=statevector_inout%myLatBeg
2464    lat2=statevector_inout%myLatEnd
2465    k1=statevector_inout%mykBeg
2466    k2=statevector_inout%mykEnd
2467
2468    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 8) then
2469
2470      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2471      do kIndex = k1, k2
2472        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2473          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2474            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2475              statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2476                   scaleFactor * statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2477            end do
2478          end do
2479        end do
2480      end do
2481      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2482
2483    else
2484
2485      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2486      do kIndex = k1, k2
2487        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2488          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2489            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2490              statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2491                   real(scaleFactor,4) * statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2492            end do
2493          end do
2494        end do
2495      end do
2496      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2497
2498    end if
2499
2500  end subroutine gsv_scale
2501
2502  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2503  ! gsv_scaleVertical
2504  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2505  subroutine gsv_scaleVertical(statevector_inout,scaleFactor)
2506    !
2507    !:Purpose: Applies a specific scaling to each level
2508    !           statevector_inout(:,:,k,:) = scaleFactor(k) * statevector_inout(:,:,k,:)
2509    !
2510    implicit none
2511
2512    ! Arguments:
2513    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_inout
2514    real(8),          intent(in)    :: scaleFactor(:)
2515
2516    ! Locals:
2517    integer          :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2,k1,k2,levIndex
2518    character(len=4) :: varLevel
2519
2520    if (.not.statevector_inout%allocated) then
2521      call utl_abort('gsv_scaleVertical: gridStateVector_inout not yet allocated')
2522    end if
2523
2524    lon1=statevector_inout%myLonBeg
2525    lon2=statevector_inout%myLonEnd
2526    lat1=statevector_inout%myLatBeg
2527    lat2=statevector_inout%myLatEnd
2528    k1=statevector_inout%mykBeg
2529    k2=statevector_inout%mykEnd
2530
2531    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 8) then
2532
2533      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,levIndex,varLevel)
2534      do kIndex = k1, k2
2535        varLevel = vnl_varLevelFromVarname(gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector_inout, kIndex))
2536        if (varLevel == 'SF' .or. varLevel == 'SFMM' .or. varLevel == 'SFTH') then
2537          ! use lowest momentum level for surface variables
2538          levIndex = gsv_getNumLev(statevector_inout, 'MM')
2539        else
2540          levIndex = gsv_getLevFromK(statevector_inout, kIndex)
2541        end if
2542        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2543          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2544            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2545              statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2546                   scaleFactor(levIndex) * statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2547            end do
2548          end do
2549        end do
2550      end do
2551      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2552
2553    else
2554
2555      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,levIndex,varLevel)
2556      do kIndex = k1, k2
2557        varLevel = vnl_varLevelFromVarname(gsv_getVarNameFromK(statevector_inout, kIndex))
2558        if (varLevel == 'SF' .or. varLevel == 'SFMM' .or. varLevel == 'SFTH') then
2559          ! use lowest momentum level for surface variables
2560          levIndex = gsv_getNumLev(statevector_inout, 'MM')
2561        else
2562          levIndex = gsv_getLevFromK(statevector_inout, kIndex)
2563        end if
2564        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2565          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2566            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2567              statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2568                   real(scaleFactor(levIndex),4) * statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2569            end do
2570          end do
2571        end do
2572      end do
2573      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2574
2575    end if
2576
2577  end subroutine gsv_scaleVertical
2578
2579  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2580  ! gsv_3dto4d
2581  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2582  subroutine gsv_3dto4d(statevector_inout)
2583    !
2584    !:Purpose: Copies the 3D data array to all time steps of the 4D array of the
2585    !           same statevector
2586    !
2587    implicit none
2588
2589    ! Arguments:
2590    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_inout
2591
2592    ! Locals:
2593    integer :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2,k1,k2
2594
2595    if (.not.statevector_inout%allocated) then
2596      call utl_abort('gsv_3dto4d: statevector not yet allocated')
2597    end if
2598
2599    lon1=statevector_inout%myLonBeg
2600    lon2=statevector_inout%myLonEnd
2601    lat1=statevector_inout%myLatBeg
2602    lat2=statevector_inout%myLatEnd
2603    k1=statevector_inout%mykBeg
2604    k2=statevector_inout%mykEnd
2605
2606    if (statevector_inout%numStep.eq.1) return
2607
2608    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 8) then
2609
2610      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2611      do kIndex = k1, k2
2612        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2613          if (stepIndex.ne.statevector_inout%anltime) then
2614            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2615              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2616                statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2617                     statevector_inout%gd3d_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex)
2618              end do
2619            end do
2620          end if
2621        end do
2622      end do
2623      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2624
2625    else
2626
2627      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (stepIndex,latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)    
2628      do kIndex = k1, k2
2629        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2630          if (stepIndex.ne.statevector_inout%anltime) then
2631            do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2632              do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2633                statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) = &
2634                     statevector_inout%gd3d_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex)
2635              end do
2636            end do
2637          end if
2638        end do
2639      end do
2640      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2641
2642    end if
2643
2644  end subroutine gsv_3dto4d
2645
2646  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2647  ! gsv_3dto4dAdj
2648  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2649  subroutine gsv_3dto4dAdj(statevector_inout)
2650    !
2651    !:Purpose: Adjoint code of the 3dto4d copy to all time steps 
2652    !
2653    implicit none
2654
2655    ! Arguments:
2656    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_inout
2657
2658    ! Locals:
2659    integer :: stepIndex,lonIndex,kIndex,latIndex,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2,k1,k2
2660
2661    real(4), allocatable :: gd2d_tmp_r4(:,:)
2662    real(8), allocatable :: gd2d_tmp(:,:)
2663
2664    if (.not.statevector_inout%allocated) then
2665      call utl_abort('gsv_3dto4dAdj: statevector not yet allocated')
2666    end if
2667
2668    lon1=statevector_inout%myLonBeg
2669    lon2=statevector_inout%myLonEnd
2670    lat1=statevector_inout%myLatBeg
2671    lat2=statevector_inout%myLatEnd
2672    k1=statevector_inout%mykBeg
2673    k2=statevector_inout%mykEnd
2674
2675    if (statevector_inout%numStep.eq.1) return
2676
2677    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 8) then
2678
2679      allocate(gd2d_tmp(lon1:lon2,lat1:lat2))
2680      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex,gd2d_tmp)
2681      do kIndex = k1, k2
2682        gd2d_tmp(:,:) = 0.0d0
2683        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2684          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2685            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2686              gd2d_tmp(lonIndex,latIndex) = gd2d_tmp(lonIndex,latIndex) +   &
2687                   statevector_inout%gd_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2688            end do
2689          end do
2690        end do
2691        do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2692          do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2693            statevector_inout%gd3d_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex) = &
2694                 gd2d_tmp(lonIndex,latIndex)
2695          end do
2696        end do
2697      end do
2698      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2699      deallocate(gd2d_tmp)
2700
2701    else
2702
2703      allocate(gd2d_tmp_r4(lon1:lon2,lat1:lat2))
2704      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex,gd2d_tmp_r4)
2705      do kIndex = k1, k2
2706        gd2d_tmp_r4(:,:) = 0.0
2707        do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
2708          do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2709            do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2710              gd2d_tmp_r4(lonIndex,latIndex) = gd2d_tmp_r4(lonIndex,latIndex) +   &
2711                   statevector_inout%gd_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex)
2712            end do
2713          end do
2714        end do
2715        do latIndex = lat1, lat2
2716          do lonIndex = lon1, lon2
2717            statevector_inout%gd3d_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex) = &
2718                 gd2d_tmp_r4(lonIndex,latIndex)
2719          end do
2720        end do
2721      end do
2722      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
2723      deallocate(gd2d_tmp_r4)
2724
2725    end if
2726
2727  end subroutine gsv_3dto4dAdj
2728
2729  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2730  ! gsv_deallocate
2731  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2732  subroutine gsv_deallocate(statevector)
2733    !
2734    !:Purpose: Deallocates the struct_gsv memory structure
2735    !
2736    implicit none
2737
2738    ! Arguments:
2739    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector
2740
2741    ! Locals:
2742    integer :: ierr, kIndex
2743
2744    if (.not.statevector%allocated) then
2745      call utl_abort('gsv_deallocate: gridStateVector not yet allocated')
2746    end if
2747
2748    statevector%allocated=.false.
2749
2750    if (statevector%mpi_local) then
2751      deallocate(statevector%allLonBeg)
2752      deallocate(statevector%allLonEnd)
2753      deallocate(statevector%allLonPerPE)
2754      deallocate(statevector%allLatBeg)
2755      deallocate(statevector%allLatEnd)
2756      deallocate(statevector%allLatPerPE)
2757      deallocate(statevector%allkBeg)
2758      deallocate(statevector%allkEnd)
2759      deallocate(statevector%allkCount)
2760      deallocate(statevector%allUVkBeg)
2761      deallocate(statevector%allUVkEnd)
2762      deallocate(statevector%allUVkCount)
2763    end if
2764
2765    if (statevector%dataKind == 8) then
2766      deallocate(statevector%gd_r8,stat=ierr)
2767      nullify(statevector%gd_r8)
2768      if (statevector%UVComponentPresent) then 
2769        do kIndex = statevector%myUVkBeg, statevector%myUVkEnd
2770          if (statevector%extraUVallocated) deallocate(statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r8)
2771          nullify(statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r8)
2772        end do
2773        deallocate(statevector%gdUV)
2774        nullify(statevector%gdUV)
2775      end if
2776    else if (statevector%dataKind == 4) then
2777      deallocate(statevector%gd_r4,stat=ierr)
2778      nullify(statevector%gd_r4)
2779      if (statevector%UVComponentPresent) then 
2780        do kIndex = statevector%myUVkBeg, statevector%myUVkEnd
2781          if (statevector%extraUVallocated) deallocate(statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r4)
2782          nullify(statevector%gdUV(kIndex)%r4)
2783        end do
2784        deallocate(statevector%gdUV)
2785        nullify(statevector%gdUV)
2786      end if
2787    end if
2788    if (ierr.ne.0) then
2789      write(*,*) 'gsv_deallocate: Problem detected. IERR =',ierr
2790    end if
2791
2792    statevector%heightSfcPresent = .false.
2793    if (associated(statevector%HeightSfc)) then
2794      deallocate(statevector%HeightSfc)
2795      nullify(statevector%HeightSfc)
2796    end if
2797
2798    if (associated(statevector%dateStampList)) then
2799      deallocate(statevector%dateStampList)
2800      nullify(statevector%dateStampList)
2801    end if
2802    deallocate(statevector%dateOriginList)
2803    deallocate(statevector%npasList)
2804    deallocate(statevector%ip2List)
2805    deallocate(statevector%varOffset)
2806    deallocate(statevector%varNumLev)
2807
2808    call ocm_deallocate(statevector%oceanMask)
2809
2810  end subroutine gsv_deallocate
2811
2812  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2813  ! gsv_getField main routine and wrappers for r4 and r8
2814  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2815  subroutine gsv_getFieldWrapper_r4(statevector,field_r4,varName_opt)
2816    !
2817    !:Purpose: Returns a pointer to the 4D data array. 
2818    !           Wrapper for the kind 4 real.
2819    !
2820    implicit none
2821
2822    ! Arguments:
2823    type(struct_gsv),           intent(in)    :: statevector
2824    real(4), pointer,           intent(inout) :: field_r4(:,:,:,:)
2825    character(len=*), optional, intent(in)    :: varName_opt
2826
2827    if (statevector%dataKind /= 4) call utl_abort('gsv_getFieldWrapper_r4: wrong dataKind')
2828    call gsv_getField_r48(statevector,field_r4=field_r4,varName_opt=varName_opt)
2829
2830  end subroutine gsv_getFieldWrapper_r4

2836    !
2837    implicit none

2839    ! Arguments:

2849  subroutine gsv_getField_r48(statevector,field_r4,field_r8,varName_opt)
2850    !
2851    !:Purpose: Returns a pointer to the 4D data array. 
2852    !           Wrapper pairing the proper real data kind
2853    !
2854    implicit none
2855
2856    ! Arguments:
2857    type(struct_gsv),           intent(in)    :: statevector
2858    character(len=*), optional, intent(in)    :: varName_opt
2859    real(4), pointer, optional, intent(inout) :: field_r4(:,:,:,:)
2860    real(8), pointer, optional, intent(inout) :: field_r8(:,:,:,:)
2861
2862    ! Locals:
2863    integer                                :: ilev1, ilev2, lon1, lat1, k1
2864
2865    lon1 = statevector%myLonBeg
2866    lat1 = statevector%myLatBeg
2867    k1 = statevector%mykBeg
2868
2869    if (present(varName_opt)) then
2870      if (statevector%mpi_distribution == 'VarsLevs') then
2871        call utl_abort('gsv_getField_r48: cannot specify a varName for VarsLevs mpi distribution')
2872      end if
2873      if (gsv_varExist(statevector,varName_opt)) then
2874        ilev1 = 1 + statevector%varOffset(vnl_varListIndex(varName_opt))
2875        ilev2 = ilev1 - 1 + statevector%varNumLev(vnl_varListIndex(varName_opt))
2876        if (gsv_getDataKind(statevector) == 4) then
2877          field_r4(lon1:,lat1:,1:,1:) => statevector%gd_r4(:,:,ilev1:ilev2,:)
2878        else
2879          field_r8(lon1:,lat1:,1:,1:) => statevector%gd_r8(:,:,ilev1:ilev2,:)
2880        end if
2881      else
2882        call utl_abort('gsv_getField_r48: Unknown variable name! ' // varName_opt)
2883      end if
2884    else
2885      if (gsv_getDataKind(statevector) == 4) then
2886        field_r4(lon1:,lat1:,k1:,1:) => statevector%gd_r4(:,:,:,:)
2887      else
2888        field_r8(lon1:,lat1:,k1:,1:) => statevector%gd_r8(:,:,:,:)
2889      end if
2890    end if
2891
2892  end subroutine gsv_getField_r48
2893

2900    !           Wrapper for the kind 8 real.

2914    lat1=statevector%myLatBeg

2934        call utl_abort('gsv_getField3D_r8: Unknown variable name! ' // varName_opt)

2936    else

2939      else
2940        field3D(lon1:,lat1:,k1:) => statevector%gd3d_r8(:,:,:)

3119    implicit none
3120

3129          dateStamp=statevector%dateStampList(stepIndex_opt)

3132               //str(stepIndex_opt)//',numStep='//str(statevector%numStep))
3133        end if    
3134      else
3135        dateStamp=statevector%dateStamp3D
3136      end if
3137    else
3138      call utl_abort('gsv_getDateStamp: dateStampList was not created during allocation!')
3139    end if
3140
3141  end function gsv_getDateStamp

3195  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3196  ! gsv_transposeVarsLevsToTiles
3197  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3198  subroutine gsv_transposeVarsLevsToTiles(statevector_in, statevector_out)
3199    !
3200    !:Purpose: Transposes the data from mpi_distribution=VarsLevs to Tiles
3201    !
3202    implicit none
3203
3204    ! Arguments:
3205    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)    :: statevector_in
3206    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_out
3207
3208    ! Locals:
3209    integer :: youridx, youridy, yourid, nsize, maxkcount, ierr
3210    integer :: sendrecvKind, inKind, outKind, stepIndex
3211    integer, allocatable :: displs(:), nsizes(:)
3212    real(4), pointer     :: field_in_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:)
3213    real(8), pointer     :: field_in_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:)
3214    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_height(:,:,:), gd_recv_height(:,:)
3215    real(8), pointer     :: field_height_in_ptr(:,:), field_height_out_ptr(:,:)
3216
3217    if (statevector_in%mpi_distribution /= 'VarsLevs') then
3218      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeVarsLevsToTiles: input statevector must have VarsLevs mpi distribution') 
3219    end if
3220
3221    if (statevector_out%mpi_distribution /= 'Tiles') then
3222      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeVarsLevsToTiles: out statevector must have Tiles mpi distribution')
3223    end if
3224
3225    call utl_tmg_start(164,'low-level--gsv_varsLevsToTiles')
3226
3227    inKind = statevector_in%dataKind
3228    outKind = statevector_out%dataKind
3229    if (inKind == 4 .or. outKind == 4) then
3230      sendrecvKind = 4
3231    else
3232      sendrecvKind = 8
3233    end if
3234
3235    maxkCount = maxval(statevector_in%allkCount(:))
3236    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3237      call utl_reAllocate(gd_send_varsLevs_r4, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3238                           maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3239      call utl_reAllocate(gd_recv_varsLevs_r4, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3240                          maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3241    else
3242      call utl_reAllocate(gd_send_varsLevs_r8, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3243                          maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3244      call utl_reAllocate(gd_recv_varsLevs_r8, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3245                          maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3246    end if
3247
3248    do stepIndex = 1, statevector_out%numStep
3249
3250      if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. inKind == 4) then
3251        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r4_ptr)
3252        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3253        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3254          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3255            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3256            gd_send_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3257                                1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3258                                1:statevector_in%mykCount, yourid+1) =  &
3259              field_in_r4_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3260                              statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3261                              statevector_in%mykBeg:statevector_in%mykEnd, stepIndex)
3262          end do
3263        end do
3264        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3265      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. inKind == 8) then
3266        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r8_ptr)
3267        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3268        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3269          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3270            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3271            gd_send_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3272                                1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3273                                1:statevector_in%mykCount, yourid+1) =  &
3274              real(field_in_r8_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3275                                   statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3276                                   statevector_in%mykBeg:statevector_in%mykEnd, stepIndex),4)
3277          end do
3278        end do
3279        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3280      else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. inKind == 4) then
3281        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r4_ptr)
3282        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3283        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3284          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3285            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3286            gd_send_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3287                                1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3288                                1:statevector_in%mykCount, yourid+1) =  &
3289              real(field_in_r4_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3290                                   statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3291                                   statevector_in%mykBeg:statevector_in%mykEnd, stepIndex),8)
3292          end do
3293        end do
3294        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3295      else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. inKind == 8) then
3296        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r8_ptr)
3297        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3298        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3299          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3300            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3301            gd_send_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3302                                1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3303                                1:statevector_in%mykCount, yourid+1) =  &
3304              field_in_r8_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3305                              statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3306                              statevector_in%mykBeg:statevector_in%mykEnd, stepIndex)
3307          end do
3308        end do
3309        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3310      end if
3311
3312      nsize = statevector_out%lonPerPEmax * statevector_out%latPerPEmax * maxkCount
3313      if (mmpi_nprocs > 1) then
3314        if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3315          call rpn_comm_alltoall(gd_send_varsLevs_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
3316                                 gd_recv_varsLevs_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
3317        else
3318          call rpn_comm_alltoall(gd_send_varsLevs_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8',  &
3319                                 gd_recv_varsLevs_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8', 'grid', ierr)
3320        end if
3321      else
3322        if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3323          gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,1) = gd_send_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,1)
3324        else
3325          gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,1) = gd_send_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,1)
3326        end if
3327      end if
3328
3329      if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. outKind == 4) then
3330        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r4_ptr)
3331        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
3332        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3333          field_out_r4_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
3334                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd, &
3335                           statevector_in%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_in%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex) =   &
3336            gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
3337                                1:statevector_out%latPerPE,  &
3338                                1:statevector_in%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1)
3339        end do
3340        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3341      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. outKind == 8) then
3342        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8_ptr)
3343        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
3344        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3345          field_out_r8_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
3346                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd, &
3347                           statevector_in%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_in%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex) =   &
3348            real(gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
3349                                     1:statevector_out%latPerPE,  &
3350                                     1:statevector_in%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1),8)
3351        end do
3352        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3353      else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. outKind == 4) then
3354        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r4_ptr)
3355        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
3356        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3357          field_out_r4_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
3358                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd, &
3359                           statevector_in%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_in%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex) =   &
3360            real(gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
3361                                     1:statevector_out%latPerPE,  &
3362                                     1:statevector_in%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1),4)
3363        end do
3364        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3365      else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. outKind == 8) then
3366        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8_ptr)
3367        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
3368        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3369          field_out_r8_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
3370                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd, &
3371                           statevector_in%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_in%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex) =   &
3372            gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
3373                                1:statevector_out%latPerPE,  &
3374                                1:statevector_in%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1)
3375        end do
3376        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3377      end if
3378
3379    end do ! stepIndex
3380
3381    if (statevector_in%heightSfcPresent .and. statevector_out%heightSfcPresent) then
3382      allocate(gd_send_height(statevector_out%lonPerPEmax,statevector_out%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
3383      allocate(gd_recv_height(statevector_out%lonPerPEmax,statevector_out%latPerPEmax))
3384      gd_send_height(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
3385      gd_recv_height(:,:) = 0.0d0
3386      field_height_in_ptr => gsv_getHeightSfc(statevector_in)
3387      field_height_out_ptr => gsv_getHeightSfc(statevector_out)
3388
3389      if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
3390        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3391        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3392          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3393            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3394            gd_send_height(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3395                           1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1) =  &
3396              field_height_in_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3397                                  statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1))
3398          end do
3399        end do
3400        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3401      end if
3402
3403      nsize = statevector_out%lonPerPEmax * statevector_out%latPerPEmax
3404      allocate(displs(mmpi_nprocs))
3405      allocate(nsizes(mmpi_nprocs))
3406      do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3407        displs(yourid+1) = yourid*nsize
3408        nsizes(yourid+1) = nsize
3409      end do
3410      call rpn_comm_scatterv(gd_send_height, nsizes, displs, 'mpi_double_precision', &
3411                             gd_recv_height, nsize, 'mpi_double_precision', &
3412                             0, 'grid', ierr)
3413
3414      field_height_out_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
3415                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd) =   &
3416        gd_recv_height(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
3417                       1:statevector_out%latPerPE)
3418
3419      deallocate(displs)
3420      deallocate(nsizes)
3421      deallocate(gd_recv_height)
3422      deallocate(gd_send_height)
3423    end if
3424
3425    ! Copy over the mask, if it exists
3426    call gsv_copyMask(statevector_in, statevector_out)
3427
3428    ! Copy metadata
3429    if (associated(statevector_in%dateStampList)) statevector_out%dateStampList(:) = statevector_in%dateStampList(:)
3430    if (associated(statevector_in%dateOriginList)) statevector_out%dateOriginList(:) = statevector_in%dateOriginList(:)
3431    if (associated(statevector_in%npasList))      statevector_out%npasList(:) = statevector_in%npasList(:)
3432    if (associated(statevector_in%ip2List))       statevector_out%ip2List(:) = statevector_in%ip2List(:)
3433    statevector_out%deet = statevector_in%deet
3434    statevector_out%etiket = statevector_in%etiket
3435
3436    call utl_tmg_stop(164)
3437
3438  end subroutine gsv_transposeVarsLevsToTiles
3439
3440  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3441  ! gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs
3442  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3443  subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs(statevector_in, statevector_out, &
3444                                          beSilent_opt)
3445    !
3446    !:Purpose: Transposes the data from mpi_distribution=Tiles to VarsLevs
3447    !
3448    implicit none
3449
3450    ! Arguments:
3451    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)    :: statevector_in
3452    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_out
3453    logical, optional, intent(in)   :: beSilent_opt
3454
3455    ! Locals:
3456    integer :: youridx, youridy, yourid, nsize, maxkcount, ierr, mpiTagUU, mpiTagVV
3457    integer :: sendrecvKind, inKind, outKind, kIndexUU, kIndexVV, MpiIdUU, MpiIdVV
3458    integer :: levUV, stepIndex, numSend, numRecv
3459    integer :: requestIdSend(stateVector_out%nk), requestIdRecv(stateVector_out%nk)
3460    integer :: mpiStatuses(mpi_status_size,stateVector_out%nk)
3461    real(4), pointer     :: field_in_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:)
3462    real(8), pointer     :: field_in_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:)
3463    real(8), pointer     :: field_height_in_ptr(:,:), field_height_out_ptr(:,:)
3464    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_height(:,:), gd_recv_height(:,:,:)
3465    logical :: beSilent
3466
3467    if ( present(beSilent_opt) ) then
3468      beSilent = beSilent_opt
3469    else
3470      beSilent = .false.
3471    end if
3472    
3473    if ( .not. beSilent ) then
3474      call msg('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs','START', verb_opt=2)
3475      call msg_memUsage('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs')
3476    end if
3477
3478    if (statevector_in%mpi_distribution /= 'Tiles') then
3479      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs: input statevector must have Tiles mpi distribution') 
3480    end if
3481
3482    if (statevector_out%mpi_distribution /= 'VarsLevs') then
3483      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs: out statevector must have VarsLevs mpi distribution')
3484    end if
3485
3486    inKind = statevector_in%dataKind
3487    outKind = statevector_out%dataKind
3488    if (inKind == 4 .or. outKind == 4) then
3489      sendrecvKind = 4
3490    else
3491      sendrecvKind = 8
3492    end if
3493
3494    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3495      call utl_tmg_start(165,'low-level--gsv_tilesToVarsLevs_r4')
3496    else
3497      call utl_tmg_start(166,'low-level--gsv_tilesToVarsLevs_r8')
3498    end if
3499
3500    maxkCount = maxval(statevector_out%allkCount(:))
3501    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3502      call utl_reAllocate(gd_send_varsLevs_r4, statevector_in%lonPerPEmax, statevector_in%latPerPEmax, &
3503                          maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3504      call utl_reAllocate(gd_recv_varsLevs_r4, statevector_in%lonPerPEmax, statevector_in%latPerPEmax, &
3505                          maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3506    else
3507      call utl_reAllocate(gd_send_varsLevs_r8, statevector_in%lonPerPEmax, statevector_in%latPerPEmax, &
3508                          maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3509      call utl_reAllocate(gd_recv_varsLevs_r8, statevector_in%lonPerPEmax, statevector_in%latPerPEmax, &
3510                          maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3511    end if
3512
3513    do stepIndex = 1, statevector_in%numStep
3514
3515      if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. inKind == 8) then
3516        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r8_ptr)
3517        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
3518        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3519          gd_send_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_in%lonPerPE, &
3520                              1:statevector_in%latPerPE, &
3521                              1:statevector_out%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1) =  &
3522              field_in_r8_ptr(statevector_in%myLonBeg:statevector_in%myLonEnd, &
3523                              statevector_in%myLatBeg:statevector_in%myLatEnd, &
3524                              statevector_out%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_out%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex)
3525        end do
3526        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3527      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. inKind == 4) then
3528        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r4_ptr)
