3529        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
3530        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3531          gd_send_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_in%lonPerPE, &
3532                              1:statevector_in%latPerPE, &
3533                              1:statevector_out%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1) =  &
3534              field_in_r4_ptr(statevector_in%myLonBeg:statevector_in%myLonEnd, &
3535                              statevector_in%myLatBeg:statevector_in%myLatEnd, &
3536                              statevector_out%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_out%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex)
3537        end do
3538        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3539      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. inKind == 8) then
3540        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r8_ptr)
3541        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
3542        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
3543          gd_send_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_in%lonPerPE, &
3544                              1:statevector_in%latPerPE, &
3545                              1:statevector_out%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1) =  &
3546              real(field_in_r8_ptr(statevector_in%myLonBeg:statevector_in%myLonEnd, &
3547                                   statevector_in%myLatBeg:statevector_in%myLatEnd, &
3548                                   statevector_out%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_out%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex),4)
3549        end do
3550        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3551      else
3552        call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs: Incompatible mix of real 4 and 8 before alltoall mpi comm')
3553      end if
3554
3555      nsize = statevector_in%lonPerPEmax * statevector_in%latPerPEmax * maxkCount
3556      if (mmpi_nprocs > 1) then
3557        if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3558          call rpn_comm_alltoall(gd_send_varsLevs_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
3559                                 gd_recv_varsLevs_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
3560        else
3561          call rpn_comm_alltoall(gd_send_varsLevs_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8',  &
3562                                 gd_recv_varsLevs_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8', 'grid', ierr)
3563        end if
3564      else
3565        if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3566          gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,1) = gd_send_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,1)
3567        else
3568          gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,1) = gd_send_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,1)
3569        end if
3570      end if
3571
3572      if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. outKind == 8) then
3573        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8_ptr)
3574        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3575        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3576          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3577            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3578            field_out_r8_ptr(statevector_in%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_in%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3579                             statevector_in%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_in%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3580                             statevector_out%mykBeg:statevector_out%mykEnd, stepIndex) = &
3581                gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_in%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3582                                    1:statevector_in%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3583                                    1:statevector_out%mykCount, yourid+1)
3584          end do
3585        end do
3586        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3587      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. outKind == 4) then
3588        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r4_ptr)
3589        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3590        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3591          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3592            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3593            field_out_r4_ptr(statevector_in%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_in%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3594                             statevector_in%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_in%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3595                             statevector_out%mykBeg:statevector_out%mykEnd, stepIndex) = &
3596                gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_in%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3597                                    1:statevector_in%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3598                                    1:statevector_out%mykCount, yourid+1)
3599          end do
3600        end do
3601        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3602      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. outKind == 8) then
3603        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8_ptr)
3604        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3605        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3606          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3607            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3608            field_out_r8_ptr(statevector_in%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_in%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3609                             statevector_in%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_in%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3610                             statevector_out%mykBeg:statevector_out%mykEnd, stepIndex) = &
3611                real(gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_in%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3612                                         1:statevector_in%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3613                                         1:statevector_out%mykCount, yourid+1), 8)
3614          end do
3615        end do
3616        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3617      else
3618        call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs: Incompatible mix of real 4 and 8 after alltoall mpi comm')
3619      end if
3620
3621      ! send copy of wind component to task that has other component
3622      if (gsv_varExist(stateVector_out, 'UU') .and.  &
3623          gsv_varExist(stateVector_out, 'VV')) then
3624
3625        numSend = 0
3626        numRecv = 0
3627        LOOP_KINDEX: do kIndexUU = 1, stateVector_out%nk
3628          if (gsv_getVarNameFromK(stateVector_out, kIndexUU) /= 'UU') cycle LOOP_KINDEX
3629
3630          ! get k index for corresponding VV component
3631          levUV = gsv_getLevFromK(stateVector_out, kIndexUU)
3632          kIndexVV = levUV + gsv_getOffsetFromVarName(statevector_out,'VV')
3633
3634          ! get Mpi task id for both U and V
3635          MpiIdUU = gsv_getMpiIdFromK(statevector_out,kIndexUU)
3636          MpiIdVV = gsv_getMpiIdFromK(statevector_out,kIndexVV)
3637
3638          if (MpiIdUU == MpiIdVV .and. mmpi_myid == MpiIdUU) then
3639            if (outKind == 8) then
3640              statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r8(:, :, stepIndex) =  statevector_out%gd_r8(:, :, kIndexVV, stepIndex)
3641              statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r8(:, :, stepIndex) =  statevector_out%gd_r8(:, :, kIndexUU, stepIndex)
3642            else
3643              statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r4(:, :, stepIndex) =  statevector_out%gd_r4(:, :, kIndexVV, stepIndex)
3644              statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r4(:, :, stepIndex) =  statevector_out%gd_r4(:, :, kIndexUU, stepIndex)
3645            end if
3646            cycle LOOP_KINDEX
3647          end if
3648
3649          ! need to do mpi communication to exchange wind components
3650          nsize = statevector_out%ni * statevector_out%nj
3651          mpiTagUU = kIndexUU
3652          mpiTagVV = kIndexVV
3653          if (mmpi_myid == MpiIdUU) then ! I have UU
3654
3655            numRecv = numRecv + 1
3656            if (outKind == 8) then
3657              call mpi_irecv(statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r8(:, :, stepIndex),  &
3658                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdVV, mpiTagVV,  &
3659                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3660            else
3661              call mpi_irecv(statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r4(:, :, stepIndex),  &
3662                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdVV, mpiTagVV,  &
3663                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3664            end if
3665
3666            numSend = numSend + 1
3667            if (outKind == 8) then
3668              call mpi_isend(statevector_out%gd_r8(:, :, kIndexUU, stepIndex),  &
3669                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdVV, mpiTagUU,  &
3670                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3671            else
3672              call mpi_isend(statevector_out%gd_r4(:, :, kIndexUU, stepIndex),  &
3673                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdVV, mpiTagUU,  &
3674                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3675            end if
3676
3677          else if (mmpi_myid == MpiIdVV) then  ! I have VV
3678
3679            numRecv = numRecv + 1
3680            if (outKind == 8) then
3681              call mpi_irecv(statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r8(:, :, stepIndex),  &
3682                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdUU, mpiTagUU,  &
3683                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3684            else
3685              call mpi_irecv(statevector_out%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r4(:, :, stepIndex),  &
3686                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdUU, mpiTagUU,  &
3687                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3688            end if
3689
3690            numSend = numSend + 1
3691            if (outKind == 8) then
3692              call mpi_isend(statevector_out%gd_r8(:, :, kIndexVV, stepIndex),  &
3693                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdUU, mpiTagVV,  &
3694                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3695            else
3696              call mpi_isend(statevector_out%gd_r4(:, :, kIndexVV, stepIndex),  &
3697                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdUU, mpiTagVV,  &
3698                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3699            end if
3700
3701          end if
3702
3703        end do LOOP_KINDEX
3704
3705        if (numRecv > 0) then
3706          call mpi_waitAll(numRecv, requestIdRecv(1:numRecv), mpiStatuses(:,1:numRecv), ierr)
3707        end if
3708
3709        if (numSend > 0) then
3710          call mpi_waitAll(numSend, requestIdSend(1:numSend), mpiStatuses(:,1:numSend), ierr)
3711        end if
3712
3713      end if ! UU and VV exist
3714
3715    end do ! stepIndex
3716
3717    ! gather up surface height onto task 0
3718    if (statevector_in%heightSfcPresent .and. statevector_out%heightSfcPresent) then
3719      allocate(gd_send_height(statevector_in%lonPerPEmax,statevector_in%latPerPEmax))
3720      allocate(gd_recv_height(statevector_in%lonPerPEmax,statevector_in%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
3721      field_height_in_ptr => gsv_getHeightSfc(statevector_in)
3722      field_height_out_ptr => gsv_getHeightSfc(statevector_out)
3723
3724      gd_send_height(:,:) = 0.0D0
3725      gd_send_height(1:statevector_in%lonPerPE,1:statevector_in%latPerPE) = field_height_in_ptr(:,:)
3726
3727      nsize = statevector_in%lonPerPEmax * statevector_in%latPerPEmax
3728      call rpn_comm_gather(gd_send_height, nsize, 'mpi_double_precision',  &
3729                           gd_recv_height, nsize, 'mpi_double_precision', 0, 'grid', ierr)
3730
3731      if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
3732        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3733        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3734          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3735            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3736            field_height_out_ptr(statevector_in%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_in%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3737                             statevector_in%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_in%allLatEnd(youridy+1)) = &
3738                gd_recv_height(1:statevector_in%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3739                           1:statevector_in%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1)
3740          end do
3741        end do
3742        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3743      end if
3744
3745      deallocate(gd_send_height)
3746      deallocate(gd_recv_height)
3747    end if ! heightSfcPresent
3748
3749    ! Copy over the mask, if it exists
3750    call gsv_copyMask(statevector_in, statevector_out, beSilent_opt=beSilent)
3751    
3752    if ( .not. beSilent ) then
3753      call msg('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs','END', verb_opt=2)
3754      call msg_memUsage('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs')
3755    end if
3756
3757    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3758      call utl_tmg_stop(165)
3759    else
3760      call utl_tmg_stop(166)
3761    end if
3762
3763  end subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs
3764
3765  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3766  ! gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd
3767  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3768  subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd(statevector_in, statevector_out)
3769    !
3770    !:Purpose: Adjoint of Transpose the data from mpi_distribution=Tiles to
3771    !           VarsLevs
3772    !
3773    implicit none
3774
3775    ! Arguments:
3776    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)    :: statevector_in
3777    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: statevector_out
3778
3779    ! Locals:
3780    integer :: youridx, youridy, yourid, nsize, maxkcount, ierr, mpiIdUU, mpiIdVV
3781    integer :: sendrecvKind, inKind, outKind, kIndexUU, kIndexVV, kIndex
3782    integer :: levUV, mpiTagUU, mpiTagVV, stepIndex, numSend, numRecv
3783    integer :: requestIdSend(stateVector_in%nk), requestIdRecv(stateVector_in%nk)
3784    integer :: mpiStatuses(mpi_status_size,stateVector_in%nk)
3785    integer, allocatable :: displs(:), nsizes(:)
3786    real(4), pointer     :: field_in_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:)
3787    real(8), pointer     :: field_in_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:)
3788    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_height(:,:,:), gd_recv_height(:,:)
3789    real(8), pointer     :: field_height_in_ptr(:,:), field_height_out_ptr(:,:)
3790    real(4), allocatable :: gdUV_r4(:,:,:), gd_r4(:,:,:)
3791    real(8), allocatable :: gdUV_r8(:,:,:), gd_r8(:,:,:)
3792
3793    call utl_tmg_start(167,'low-level--gsv_tilesToVarsLevsAD')
3794
3795    if (statevector_in%mpi_distribution /= 'VarsLevs') then
3796      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd: input statevector must have VarsLevs mpi distribution') 
3797    end if
3798
3799    if (statevector_out%mpi_distribution /= 'Tiles') then
3800      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd: out statevector must have Tiles mpi distribution')
3801    end if
3802
3803    inKind = statevector_in%dataKind
3804    outKind = statevector_out%dataKind
3805    if (inKind == 4 .and. outKind == 4) then
3806      sendrecvKind = 4
3807    else if (inKind == 8 .and. outKind == 8) then
3808      sendrecvKind = 8
3809    else
3810      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd: input and output must have same dataKind')
3811    end if
3812
3813    do stepIndex = 1, statevector_out%numStep
3814
3815      ! adjoint of: send copy of wind component to task that has the other component
3816      if (gsv_varExist(stateVector_in, 'UU') .and.  &
3817          gsv_varExist(stateVector_in, 'VV')) then
3818
3819        if (statevector_in%UVComponentPresent) then
3820          if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3821            allocate(gdUV_r4(statevector_in%ni,statevector_in%nj, &
3822                             statevector_in%myUVkBeg:statevector_in%myUVkEnd))
3823            allocate(gd_r4(statevector_in%ni,statevector_in%nj, &
3824                           statevector_in%myUVkBeg:statevector_in%myUVkEnd))
3825          else
3826            allocate(gdUV_r8(statevector_in%ni,statevector_in%nj, &
3827                             statevector_in%myUVkBeg:statevector_in%myUVkEnd))
3828            allocate(gd_r8(statevector_in%ni,statevector_in%nj, &
3829                           statevector_in%myUVkBeg:statevector_in%myUVkEnd))
3830          end if
3831        end if
3832
3833        numSend = 0
3834        numRecv = 0
3835        LOOP_KINDEX: do kIndexUU = 1, stateVector_in%nk
3836          if (gsv_getVarNameFromK(stateVector_in, kIndexUU) /= 'UU') cycle LOOP_KINDEX
3837
3838          ! get k index for corresponding VV component
3839          levUV = gsv_getLevFromK(stateVector_in, kIndexUU)
3840          kIndexVV = levUV + gsv_getOffsetFromVarName(statevector_in,'VV')
3841
3842          ! get Mpi task id for both U and V
3843          MpiIdUU = gsv_getMpiIdFromK(statevector_in,kIndexUU)
3844          MpiIdVV = gsv_getMpiIdFromK(statevector_in,kIndexVV)
3845
3846          if (MpiIdUU == MpiIdVV .and.  mmpi_myid == MpiIdUU) then
3847            if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3848              gd_r4(:, :, kIndexUU) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r4(:, :, stepIndex)
3849              gd_r4(:, :, kIndexVV) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r4(:, :, stepIndex)
3850            else
3851              gd_r8(:, :, kIndexUU) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r8(:, :, stepIndex)
3852              gd_r8(:, :, kIndexVV) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r8(:, :, stepIndex)
3853            end if
3854            cycle LOOP_KINDEX
3855          end if
3856
3857          ! need to do mpi communication to exchange wind components
3858          nsize = statevector_in%ni * statevector_in%nj
3859          mpiTagUU = kIndexUU
3860          mpiTagVV = kIndexVV
3861
3862          if (mmpi_myid == MpiIdUU) then ! I have UU
3863
3864            numRecv = numRecv + 1
3865            if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3866              call mpi_irecv(gd_r4(:, :, kIndexUU),  &
3867                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdVV, mpiTagVV,  &
3868                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3869            else
3870              call mpi_irecv(gd_r8(:, :, kIndexUU),  &
3871                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdVV, mpiTagVV,  &
3872                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3873            end if
3874
3875            numSend = numSend + 1
3876            if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3877              gdUV_r4(:, :, kIndexUU) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r4(:, :, stepIndex)
3878              call mpi_isend(gdUV_r4(:, :, kIndexUU),  &
3879                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdVV, mpiTagUU,  &
3880                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3881            else
3882              gdUV_r8(:, :, kIndexUU) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexUU)%r8(:, :, stepIndex)
3883              call mpi_isend(gdUV_r8(:, :, kIndexUU),  &
3884                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdVV, mpiTagUU,  &
3885                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3886            end if
3887
3888          else if (mmpi_myid == MpiIDVV) then ! I have VV
3889
3890            numRecv = numRecv + 1
3891            if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3892              call mpi_irecv(gd_r4(:, :, kIndexVV),  &
3893                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdUU, mpiTagUU,  &
3894                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3895            else
3896              call mpi_irecv(gd_r8(:, :, kIndexVV),  &
3897                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdUU, mpiTagUU,  &
3898                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdRecv(numRecv), ierr)
3899            end if
3900
3901            numSend = numSend + 1
3902            if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3903              gdUV_r4(:, :, kIndexVV) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r4(:, :, stepIndex)
3904              call mpi_isend(gdUV_r4(:, :, kIndexVV),  &
3905                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real4, MpiIdUU, mpiTagVV,  &
3906                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3907            else
3908              gdUV_r8(:, :, kIndexVV) = statevector_in%gdUV(kIndexVV)%r8(:, :, stepIndex)
3909              call mpi_isend(gdUV_r8(:, :, kIndexVV),  &
3910                             nsize, mmpi_datyp_real8, MpiIdUU, mpiTagVV,  &
3911                             mmpi_comm_grid, requestIdSend(numSend), ierr)
3912            end if
3913
3914          end if
3915
3916        end do LOOP_KINDEX
3917
3918        if (numRecv > 0) then
3919          call mpi_waitAll(numRecv, requestIdRecv(1:numRecv), mpiStatuses(:,1:numRecv), ierr)
3920        end if
3921
3922        if (numSend > 0) then
3923          call mpi_waitAll(numSend, requestIdSend(1:numSend), mpiStatuses(:,1:numSend), ierr)
3924        end if
3925
3926        if (statevector_in%UVComponentPresent) then
3927          do kIndex = statevector_in%myUVkBeg, statevector_in%myUVkEnd
3928            if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3929              statevector_in%gd_r4(:, :, kIndex, stepIndex) =   &
3930                   statevector_in%gd_r4(:, :, kIndex, stepIndex) +  &
3931                   gd_r4(:, :, kIndex)
3932            else
3933              statevector_in%gd_r8(:, :, kIndex, stepIndex) =   &
3934                   statevector_in%gd_r8(:, :, kIndex, stepIndex) +  &
3935                   gd_r8(:, :, kIndex)
3936            end if
3937          end do
3938          if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3939            deallocate(gdUV_r4)
3940            deallocate(gd_r4)
3941          else
3942            deallocate(gdUV_r8)
3943            deallocate(gd_r8)
3944          end if
3945        end if
3946
3947      end if ! UU and VV exist
3948
3949      ! do allToAll to redistribute main variables from VarsLevs to Tiles
3950      maxkCount = maxval(statevector_in%allkCount(:))
3951      if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
3952        call utl_reAllocate(gd_send_varsLevs_r4, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3953                            maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3954        call utl_reAllocate(gd_recv_varsLevs_r4, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3955                            maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3956      else
3957        call utl_reAllocate(gd_send_varsLevs_r8, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3958                            maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3959        call utl_reAllocate(gd_recv_varsLevs_r8, statevector_out%lonPerPEmax, statevector_out%latPerPEmax, &
3960                            maxkCount, mmpi_nprocs)
3961      end if
3962
3963      if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. inKind == 4) then
3964        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r4_ptr)
3965        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3966        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3967          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3968            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3969            gd_send_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3970                                1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3971                                1:statevector_in%mykCount, yourid+1) =  &
3972              field_in_r4_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3973                              statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3974                              statevector_in%mykBeg:statevector_in%mykEnd, stepIndex)
3975          end do
3976        end do
3977        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3978      else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. inKind == 8) then
3979        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r8_ptr)
3980        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3981        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3982          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3983            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3984            gd_send_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
3985                                1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
3986                                1:statevector_in%mykCount, yourid+1) =  &
3987              field_in_r8_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
3988                              statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
3989                              statevector_in%mykBeg:statevector_in%mykEnd, stepIndex)
3990          end do
3991        end do
3992        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
3993      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. inKind == 8) then
3994        call gsv_getField(statevector_in,field_in_r8_ptr)
3995        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
3996        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
3997          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
3998            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
3999            gd_send_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
4000                                1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1),  &
4001                                1:statevector_in%mykCount, yourid+1) =  &
4002              real(field_in_r8_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
4003                                   statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1),  &
4004                                   statevector_in%mykBeg:statevector_in%mykEnd, stepIndex),4)
4005          end do
4006        end do
4007        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4008      else
4009        call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd: Incompatible mix of real 4 and 8 before alltoall mpi comm')
4010      end if
4011
4012      nsize = statevector_out%lonPerPEmax * statevector_out%latPerPEmax * maxkCount
4013      if (mmpi_nprocs > 1) then
4014        if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
4015          call rpn_comm_alltoall(gd_send_varsLevs_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
4016                                 gd_recv_varsLevs_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
4017        else
4018          call rpn_comm_alltoall(gd_send_varsLevs_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8',  &
4019                                 gd_recv_varsLevs_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8', 'grid', ierr)
4020        end if
4021      else
4022        if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
4023           gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,1) = gd_send_varsLevs_r4(:,:,:,1)
4024        else
4025           gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,1) = gd_send_varsLevs_r8(:,:,:,1)
4026        end if
4027      end if
4028
4029      if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. outKind == 4) then
4030        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r4_ptr)
4031        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
4032        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
4033          field_out_r4_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
4034                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd, &
4035                           statevector_in%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_in%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex) =   &
4036            gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
4037                                1:statevector_out%latPerPE,  &
4038                                1:statevector_in%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1)
4039        end do
4040        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4041      else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. outKind == 8) then
4042        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8_ptr)
4043        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
4044        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
4045          field_out_r8_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
4046                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd, &
4047                           statevector_in%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_in%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex) =   &
4048            gd_recv_varsLevs_r8(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
4049                                1:statevector_out%latPerPE,  &
4050                                1:statevector_in%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1)
4051        end do
4052        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4053      else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. outKind == 8) then
4054        call gsv_getField(statevector_out,field_out_r8_ptr)
4055        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(yourid)
4056        do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
4057          field_out_r8_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
4058                           statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd, &
4059                           statevector_in%allkBeg(yourid+1):statevector_in%allkEnd(yourid+1), stepIndex) =   &
4060            real(gd_recv_varsLevs_r4(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
4061                                     1:statevector_out%latPerPE,  &
4062                                     1:statevector_in%allkCount(yourid+1), yourid+1),8)
4063        end do
4064        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4065      else
4066        call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd: Incompatible mix of real 4 and 8 after alltoall mpi comm')
4067      end if
4068
4069    end do ! stepIndex
4070
4071    ! scatter surface height from task 0 to all others, 1 tile per task
4072    if (statevector_in%heightSfcPresent .and. statevector_out%heightSfcPresent) then
4073      allocate(gd_send_height(statevector_out%lonPerPEmax,statevector_out%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
4074      allocate(gd_recv_height(statevector_out%lonPerPEmax,statevector_out%latPerPEmax))
4075      gd_send_height(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
4076      gd_recv_height(:,:) = 0.0d0
4077      field_height_in_ptr => gsv_getHeightSfc(statevector_in)
4078      field_height_out_ptr => gsv_getHeightSfc(statevector_out)
4079
4080      if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
4081        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
4082        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
4083          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
4084            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
4085            gd_send_height(1:statevector_out%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
4086                       1:statevector_out%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1) =  &
4087              field_height_in_ptr(statevector_out%allLonBeg(youridx+1):statevector_out%allLonEnd(youridx+1),  &
4088                              statevector_out%allLatBeg(youridy+1):statevector_out%allLatEnd(youridy+1))
4089          end do
4090        end do
4091        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4092      end if
4093
4094      nsize = statevector_out%lonPerPEmax * statevector_out%latPerPEmax
4095      allocate(displs(mmpi_nprocs))
4096      allocate(nsizes(mmpi_nprocs))
4097      do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
4098        displs(yourid+1) = yourid*nsize
4099        nsizes(yourid+1) = nsize
4100      end do
4101      call rpn_comm_scatterv(gd_send_height, nsizes, displs, 'mpi_double_precision', &
4102                             gd_recv_height, nsize, 'mpi_double_precision', &
4103                             0, 'grid', ierr)
4104
4105      field_height_out_ptr(statevector_out%myLonBeg:statevector_out%myLonEnd, &
4106                       statevector_out%myLatBeg:statevector_out%myLatEnd) =   &
4107        gd_recv_height(1:statevector_out%lonPerPE,  &
4108                   1:statevector_out%latPerPE)
4109
4110      deallocate(displs)
4111      deallocate(nsizes)
4112      deallocate(gd_recv_height)
4113      deallocate(gd_send_height)
4114    end if
4115
4116    ! Copy over the mask, if it exists
4117    call gsv_copyMask(statevector_in, statevector_out)
4118
4119    call utl_tmg_stop(167)
4120
4121  end subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevsAd
4122
4123  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4124  ! gsv_horizSubSample
4125  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4126  subroutine gsv_horizSubSample(statevector_in,statevector_out,horizSubSample)
4127    !
4128    !:Purpose: Subsamples the horizontal statevector grid by an integral factor
4129    !           and transform accordingly the fields 
4130    !
4131    implicit none
4132
4133    ! Arguments:
4134    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)   :: statevector_in
4135    type(struct_gsv), intent(out)  :: statevector_out
4136    integer,          intent(in)   :: horizSubSample
4137
4138    ! Locals:
4139    integer             :: relativeFactor, middleStep
4140    real(8)             :: ratio_r8
4141    integer             :: stepIndex, lonIndex, latIndex, ilon_in, ilon_out, ilat_in, ilat_out
4142    integer             :: ilon_in1, ilon_in2, lonIndex_in, ilat_in1, ilat_in2, latIndex_in
4143    character(len=4), pointer :: varNames(:)
4144
4145    if (statevector_out%allocated) then
4146      call gsv_deallocate(statevector_out)
4147    end if
4148
4149    nullify(varNames)
4150    call gsv_varNamesList(varNames, statevector_in)
4151
4152    ! allocate the output statevector
4153    if (associated(statevector_in%dateStampList)) then
4154      middleStep = nint((real(statevector_in%numStep,8)+1.0d0)/2.0d0)
4155      call gsv_allocate(statevector_out,  &
4156                        statevector_in%numStep, statevector_in%hco, statevector_in%vco, &
4157                        datestamp_opt = statevector_in%dateStampList(middleStep),  &
4158                        mpi_local_opt = statevector_in%mpi_local,  &
4159                        horizSubSample_opt = horizSubSample, varNames_opt=varNames)
4160
4161    else
4162      call gsv_allocate(statevector_out,  &
4163                        statevector_in%numStep, statevector_in%hco, statevector_in%vco, &
4164                        mpi_local_opt = statevector_in%mpi_local, &
4165                        horizSubSample_opt = horizSubSample, varNames_opt=varNames)
4166    end if
4167
4168    deallocate(varNames)
4169
4170    if (statevector_out%horizSubSample == statevector_in%horizSubSample) then
4171      call msg('gsv_horizSubSample', &
4172           'gsv_horizSubSample: already at the selected subsample level: ' &
4173           //str(statevector_out%horizSubSample), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
4174      call gsv_copy(statevector_in,statevector_out)
4175      return
4176    end if
4177
4178    if (statevector_out%horizSubSample > statevector_in%horizSubSample) then
4179
4180      ! simple averaging onto a coarser grid
4181      call msg('gsv_horizSubSample', 'increasing subsample level from ' &
4182           //str(statevector_in%horizSubSample)//' to ' &
4183           //str(statevector_out%horizSubSample), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
4184
4185      ratio_r8 = real(statevector_out%horizSubSample,8)/real(statevector_in%horizSubSample,8)
4186      if (abs(ratio_r8 - real(nint(ratio_r8),8)) > 1.0d-5) then
4187        call msg('gsv_horizSubSample', &
4188                             'original subsample level='//str(statevector_in%horizSubSample) &
4189             //new_line('')//'new      subsample level='//str(statevector_out%horizSubSample))
4190        call utl_abort('gsv_horizSubSample: relative change of subsample level not an integer')
4191      end if
4192      relativeFactor = nint(ratio_r8)
4193
4194      call gsv_zero(statevector_out)
4195      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(stepIndex, latIndex, ilat_out, ilat_in1, ilat_in2, &
4196      !$OMP latIndex_in, lonIndex, ilon_out, ilon_in1, ilon_in2, lonIndex_in)
4197      do stepIndex = 1, statevector_out%numStep
4198
4199        do latIndex = 1, statevector_out%latPerPE
4200          ilat_out = latIndex + statevector_out%myLatBeg - 1
4201          ilat_in1 = relativeFactor*(latIndex-1) + statevector_in%myLatBeg
4202          ilat_in2 = ilat_in1 + relativeFactor - 1
4203          do latIndex_in = ilat_in1, ilat_in2
4204
4205            do lonIndex = 1, statevector_out%lonPerPE
4206              ilon_out = lonIndex + statevector_out%myLonBeg - 1
4207              ilon_in1 = relativeFactor*(lonIndex-1) + statevector_in%myLonBeg
4208              ilon_in2 = ilon_in1 + relativeFactor - 1
4209              do lonIndex_in = ilon_in1, ilon_in2
4210
4211                statevector_out%gd_r8(ilon_out, ilat_out, :, stepIndex) =  &
4212                  statevector_out%gd_r8(ilon_out, ilat_out, :, stepIndex) +  &
4213                  statevector_in%gd_r8(lonIndex_in, ilat_in, :, stepIndex)
4214
4215              end do ! lonIndex_in
4216            end do ! lonIndex
4217
4218          end do ! latIndex_in
4219        end do ! latIndex
4220
4221      end do ! stepIndex
4222      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO 
4223
4224    else
4225
4226      ! interpolate to a finer grid
4227      call msg('gsv_horizSubSample', 'decreasing subsample level from ' &
4228           //str(statevector_in%horizSubSample)//' to '  &
4229           //str(statevector_out%horizSubSample), mpiAll_opt=.false.)
4230
4231      ratio_r8 = real(statevector_in%horizSubSample)/real(statevector_out%horizSubSample)
4232      if (abs(ratio_r8 - real(nint(ratio_r8),8)) > 1.0d-5) then
4233        call msg('gsv_horizSubSample', &
4234                             'original subsample level='//str(statevector_in%horizSubSample) &
4235             //new_line('')//'new      subsample level='//str(statevector_out%horizSubSample))
4236        call utl_abort('gsv_horizSubSample: relative change of subsample level not an integer')
4237      end if
4238      relativeFactor = nint(ratio_r8)
4239
4240      ! copy each input grid point to multiple output grid points
4241      !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(stepIndex, latIndex, ilat_out, ilat_in, lonIndex, ilon_out, ilon_in)
4242      do stepIndex = 1, statevector_out%numStep
4243
4244        do latIndex = 1, statevector_out%latPerPE
4245          ilat_out = latIndex + statevector_out%myLatBeg - 1
4246          ilat_in  = floor(real(latIndex-1,8)/real(relativeFactor,8)) + statevector_in%myLatBeg
4247          do lonIndex = 1, statevector_out%lonPerPE
4248            ilon_out = lonIndex + statevector_in%myLonBeg - 1
4249            ilon_in  = floor(real(lonIndex-1,8)/real(relativeFactor,8)) + statevector_in%myLonBeg
4250            statevector_out%gd_r8(ilon_out, ilat_out, :, stepIndex) =  &
4251              statevector_in%gd_r8(ilon_in, ilat_in, :, stepIndex)
4252          end do ! lonIndex
4253        end do ! latIndex
4254
4255      end do ! stepIndex
4256      !$OMP END PARALLEL DO 
4257
4258    end if
4259
4260  end subroutine gsv_horizSubSample
4261
4262  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4263  ! gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs
4264  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4265  subroutine gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs(stateVector_1step_r4, &
4266                                         stateVector_VarsLevs, stepIndexBeg)
4267    !
4268    !:Purpose: Transposes the data from a timestep MPI distribution (1 timestep
4269    !           per MPI task) to the `mpi_distribution='VarsLevs'` distribution.
4270    !
4271    !:Comment: Step-wise distribution is mostly only used for file I/O.
4272    !           When in such implicit time distribution, it is necessery that
4273    !           `mpi_local=.false.` and `numStep=1`.
4274    !
4275    implicit none
4276
4277    ! Arguments:
4278    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)    :: stateVector_1step_r4
4279    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: stateVector_VarsLevs
4280    integer,          intent(in)    :: stepIndexBeg
4281
4282    ! Locals:
4283    integer :: ierr, maxkCount, numStepInput, numkToSend, stepIndexInput
4284    integer :: nsize
4285    integer :: sendsizes(mmpi_nprocs), recvsizes(mmpi_nprocs), senddispls(mmpi_nprocs), recvdispls(mmpi_nprocs)
4286    integer :: kIndex, kIndex2, levUV, procIndex, stepIndex
4287    logical :: thisProcIsAsender(mmpi_nprocs)
4288    real(4), allocatable :: gd_send_r4(:,:,:), gd_recv_r4(:,:,:)
4289    real(4), pointer     :: field_in_r4(:,:,:,:), field_out_r4(:,:,:,:)
4290
4291    call utl_tmg_start(162,'low-level--gsv_stepToVarsLevs')
4292
4293    if (statevector_VarsLevs%mpi_distribution /= 'VarsLevs') then
4294      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs: output statevector must have VarsLevs mpi distribution') 
4295    end if
4296
4297    ! do mpi transpose to get 4D stateVector into VarsLevs form
4298    call rpn_comm_barrier('GRID',ierr)
4299    call msg('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs', 'START', verb_opt=2)
4300    call msg_memUsage('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs')
4301
4302    ! first do surface height, just need to copy over on task 0, assuming task 0 read a file
4303    if (mmpi_myid == 0 .and. stateVector_VarsLevs%heightSfcPresent) then
4304      if (.not.stateVector_1step_r4%allocated) then
4305        call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs: Problem with HeightSfc')
4306      end if
4307      stateVector_VarsLevs%HeightSfc(:,:) = stateVector_1step_r4%HeightSfc(:,:)
4308    end if
4309
4310    ! determine which tasks have something to send and let everyone know
4311    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4312      thisProcIsAsender(procIndex) = .false.
4313      if (mmpi_myid == (procIndex-1) .and. stateVector_1step_r4%allocated) then
4314        thisProcIsAsender(procIndex) = .true.
4315      end if
4316      call rpn_comm_bcast(thisProcIsAsender(procIndex), 1,  &
4317                          'MPI_LOGICAL', procIndex-1, 'GRID', ierr)
4318    end do
4319
4320    numStepInput = 0
4321    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4322      if (thisProcIsAsender(procIndex)) numStepInput = numStepInput + 1
4323    end do
4324    call msg('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs', 'numStepInput = '//str(numStepInput))
4325
4326    maxkCount = maxval(stateVector_VarsLevs%allkCount(:))
4327    numkToSend = min(mmpi_nprocs,stateVector_VarsLevs%nk)
4328    allocate(gd_recv_r4(stateVector_VarsLevs%ni,stateVector_VarsLevs%nj,numStepInput))
4329    gd_recv_r4(:,:,:) = 0.0
4330    if (stateVector_1step_r4%allocated) then
4331      allocate(gd_send_r4(stateVector_VarsLevs%ni,stateVector_VarsLevs%nj,numkToSend))
4332    else
4333      allocate(gd_send_r4(1,1,1))
4334    end if
4335    gd_send_r4(:,:,:) = 0.0
4336
4337    call gsv_getField(stateVector_VarsLevs,field_out_r4)
4338
4339    ! prepare for alltoallv
4340    nsize = stateVector_VarsLevs%ni * stateVector_VarsLevs%nj
4341
4342    ! only send the data from tasks with data, same amount to all
4343    sendsizes(:) = 0
4344    if (stateVector_1step_r4%allocated) then
4345      do procIndex = 1, numkToSend
4346        sendsizes(procIndex) = nsize
4347      end do
4348    end if
4349    senddispls(1) = 0
4350    do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
4351      senddispls(procIndex) = senddispls(procIndex-1) + sendsizes(procIndex-1)
4352    end do
4353
4354    ! all tasks recv only from those with data
4355    recvsizes(:) = 0
4356    if ((1+mmpi_myid) <= numkToSend) then
4357      do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4358        if (thisProcIsAsender(procIndex)) then
4359          recvsizes(procIndex) = nsize
4360        end if
4361      end do
4362    end if
4363    recvdispls(1) = 0
4364    do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
4365      recvdispls(procIndex) = recvdispls(procIndex-1) + recvsizes(procIndex-1)
4366    end do
4367
4368    ! loop to send (at most) 1 level to (at most) all other mpi tasks
4369    do kIndex = 1, maxkCount
4370
4371      ! prepare the complete 1 timestep for sending on all tasks that read something
4372      if (stateVector_1step_r4%allocated) then
4373
4374        call gsv_getField(stateVector_1step_r4,field_in_r4)
4375        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(procIndex,kIndex2)
4376        do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4377          ! compute kIndex value being sent
4378          kIndex2 = kIndex + stateVector_VarsLevs%allkBeg(procIndex) - 1
4379          if (kIndex2 <= stateVector_VarsLevs%allkEnd(procIndex)) then
4380            if(procIndex > numkToSend) then
4381              call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs: ERROR with numkToSend? '&
4382                   //'procIndex='//str(procIndex) &
4383                   //', numkToSend = '//str(numkToSend))
4384            end if
4385            gd_send_r4(:,:,procIndex) = field_in_r4(:,:,kIndex2,1)
4386          end if
4387        end do
4388        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4389
4390      end if
4391
4392      call mpi_alltoallv(gd_send_r4, sendsizes, senddispls, mmpi_datyp_real4,  &
4393                         gd_recv_r4, recvsizes, recvdispls, mmpi_datyp_real4, mmpi_comm_grid, ierr)
4394
4395      stepIndex = stepIndexBeg - 1
4396      stepIndexInput = 0
4397      do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4398        ! skip if this task has nothing to send
4399        if (.not. thisProcIsAsender(procIndex)) cycle
4400
4401        stepIndex = stepIndex + 1
4402        if (stepIndex > stateVector_VarsLevs%numStep) then
4403          call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs: stepIndex > numStep')
4404        end if
4405
4406        ! all tasks copy the received step data into correct slot
4407        kIndex2 = kIndex + stateVector_VarsLevs%mykBeg - 1
4408        if (kIndex2 <= stateVector_VarsLevs%mykEnd) then
4409          stepIndexInput = stepIndexInput + 1
4410          field_out_r4(:,:,kIndex2,stepIndex) = gd_recv_r4(:,:,stepIndexInput)
4411        end if
4412      end do
4413
4414    end do ! kIndex
4415
4416    ! also do extra transpose for complementary wind components when wind component present
4417    ! this should really be changed to only send the data needed for UV, not total k
4418    if (gsv_varExist(stateVector_VarsLevs, 'UU') .or. gsv_varExist(stateVector_VarsLevs, 'VV')) then
4419      do kIndex = 1, maxkCount
4420
4421        ! prepare the complete 1 timestep for sending on all tasks that read something
4422        if (stateVector_1step_r4%allocated) then
4423
4424          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(procIndex,kIndex2,levUV)
4425          ! loop over all tasks we are sending to
4426          do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4427            kIndex2 = kIndex + stateVector_VarsLevs%allkBeg(procIndex) - 1
4428            if (kIndex2 <= stateVector_VarsLevs%allkEnd(procIndex) .and. &
4429                kIndex2 >= stateVector_1step_r4%myUVkBeg .and.           &
4430                kIndex2 <= stateVector_1step_r4%myUVkEnd) then
4431              gd_send_r4(:,:,procIndex) = stateVector_1step_r4%gdUV(kIndex2)%r4(:,:,1)
4432            end if
4433          end do
4434          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4435
4436        end if
4437
4438        call mpi_alltoallv(gd_send_r4, sendsizes, senddispls, mmpi_datyp_real4,  &
4439                           gd_recv_r4, recvsizes, recvdispls, mmpi_datyp_real4, mmpi_comm_grid, ierr)
4440
4441        stepIndex = stepIndexBeg - 1
4442        stepIndexInput = 0
4443        ! loop over all tasks from which we receive something
4444        do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4445          ! skip if this task did not send anything
4446          if (.not. thisProcIsAsender(procIndex)) cycle
4447
4448          stepIndex = stepIndex + 1
4449          if (stepIndex > stateVector_VarsLevs%numStep) then
4450            call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs: stepIndex > numStep')
4451          end if
4452
4453          ! all tasks copy the received step data into correct slot
4454          kIndex2 = kIndex + stateVector_VarsLevs%mykBeg - 1
4455          if (kIndex2 <= stateVector_VarsLevs%mykEnd) then
4456            stepIndexInput = stepIndexInput + 1
4457            if (kIndex2 >= stateVector_VarsLevs%myUVkBeg .and.  &
4458                kIndex2 <= stateVector_VarsLevs%myUVkEnd) then
4459              statevector_varsLevs%gdUV(kIndex2)%r4(:,:,stepIndex) = gd_recv_r4(:,:,stepIndexInput)
4460            end if
4461          end if
4462        end do
4463
4464      end do ! kIndex
4465
4466    end if ! do complementary wind component transpose
4467
4468    deallocate(gd_send_r4)
4469    deallocate(gd_recv_r4)
4470
4471    ! Copy the mask if it is present
4472    if (stateVector_1step_r4%allocated) then
4473      call gsv_copyMask(stateVector_1step_r4, stateVector_varsLevs)
4474    end if
4475    call ocm_communicateMask(stateVector_varsLevs%oceanMask)
4476
4477    call msg_memUsage('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs')
4478    call msg('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs','END', verb_opt=2)
4479
4480    call utl_tmg_stop(162)
4481
4482  end subroutine gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs
4483
4484  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4485  ! gsv_transposeStepToTiles
4486  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4487  subroutine gsv_transposeStepToTiles(stateVector_1step, stateVector_tiles, stepIndexBeg)
4488    !
4489    !:Purpose: Transposes the data from a timestep MPI distribution (1 timestep
4490    !           per MPI task) to the `mpi_distribution='Tiles'` distribution 
4491    !           (4D lat-lon tiles).
4492    !
4493    !:Comment: Step-wise distribution is mostly only used for file I/O.
4494    !           When in such implicit time distribution, it is necessery that
4495    !           `mpi_local=.false.` and `numStep=1`.
4496    !
4497    implicit none
4498
4499    ! Arguments:
4500    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)    :: stateVector_1step
4501    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout) :: stateVector_tiles
4502    integer,          intent(in)    :: stepIndexBeg
4503
4504    ! Locals:
4505    integer :: ierr, yourid, youridx, youridy, nsize, numStepInput, stepCount
4506    integer :: displs(mmpi_nprocs), nsizes(mmpi_nprocs)
4507    integer :: senddispls(mmpi_nprocs), sendsizes(mmpi_nprocs)
4508    integer :: recvdispls(mmpi_nprocs), recvsizes(mmpi_nprocs)
4509    integer :: kIndex, procIndex, stepIndex, indexBeg, indexEnd
4510    integer :: inKind, outKind, sendrecvKind, inKindLocal
4511    logical :: thisProcIsAsender(mmpi_nprocs), allZero, allZero_mpiglobal
4512    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_height(:,:,:), gd_recv_height(:,:)
4513    real(4), allocatable :: gd_send_1d_r4(:), gd_recv_3d_r4(:,:,:)
4514    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_1d_r8(:), gd_recv_3d_r8(:,:,:)
4515    real(4), pointer     :: field_in_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:)
4516    real(8), pointer     :: field_in_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:)
4517
4518    call rpn_comm_barrier('GRID',ierr)
4519
4520    call utl_tmg_start(163,'low-level--gsv_stepToTiles')
4521
4522    if (statevector_tiles%mpi_distribution /= 'Tiles') then
4523      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToTiles: output statevector must have Tiles mpi distribution')
4524    end if
4525
4526    call msg('gsv_transposeStepToTiles','START', verb_opt=2)
4527
4528    ! determine which tasks have something to send and let everyone know
4529    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4530      thisProcIsAsender(procIndex) = .false.
4531      if (mmpi_myid == (procIndex-1) .and. stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4532        thisProcIsAsender(procIndex) = .true.
4533      end if
4534      call rpn_comm_bcast(thisProcIsAsender(procIndex), 1,  &
4535                          'MPI_LOGICAL', procIndex-1, 'GRID', ierr)
4536    end do
4537
4538    ! only send the data from tasks with data, same amount to all
4539    sendsizes(:) = 0
4540    if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4541      do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
4542        do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
4543          yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
4544          nsize = stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1) * stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1)
4545          sendsizes(yourid+1) = nsize
4546        end do
4547      end do
4548    end if
4549    senddispls(:) = 0
4550    do yourid = 1, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
4551      senddispls(yourid+1) = senddispls(yourid) + sendsizes(yourid)
4552    end do
4553
4554    ! all tasks recv, but only from those with data
4555    recvsizes(:) = 0
4556    nsize = stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE * stateVector_tiles%latPerPE
4557    do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1) ! recv from this task
4558      if (thisProcIsAsender(yourid+1)) then
4559        recvsizes(yourid+1) = nsize
4560      end if
4561    end do
4562    recvdispls(:) = 0
4563    do yourid = 1, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
4564      recvdispls(yourid+1) = recvdispls(yourid) + recvsizes(yourid)
4565    end do
4566
4567    numStepInput = 0
4568    do yourid = 0, (mmpi_nprocs-1)
4569      if (thisProcIsAsender(yourid+1)) numStepInput = numStepInput + 1
4570    end do
4571
4572    if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4573      inKindLocal = stateVector_1step%dataKind
4574    else
4575      inKindLocal = -1
4576    end if
4577    call rpn_comm_allreduce(inKindLocal, inKind, 1,  &
4578                            'MPI_INTEGER', 'MPI_MAX', 'GRID', ierr)
4579    outKind = stateVector_tiles%dataKind
4580    if (inKind == 4 .or. outKind == 4) then
4581      sendrecvKind = 4
4582    else
4583      sendrecvKind = 8
4584    end if
4585
4586    ! allocate arrays used for mpi communication of 1 level/variable at a time
4587    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
4588      allocate(gd_recv_3d_r4(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,numStepInput))
4589      gd_recv_3d_r4(:,:,:) = 0.0
4590      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4591        allocate(gd_send_1d_r4(stateVector_tiles%ni*stateVector_tiles%nj))
4592      else
4593        allocate(gd_send_1d_r4(1))
4594      end if
4595      gd_send_1d_r4(:) = 0.0
4596    else
4597      allocate(gd_recv_3d_r8(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,numStepInput))
4598      gd_recv_3d_r8(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
4599      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4600        allocate(gd_send_1d_r8(stateVector_tiles%ni*stateVector_tiles%nj))
4601      else
4602        allocate(gd_send_1d_r8(1))
4603      end if
4604      gd_send_1d_r8(:) = 0.0d0
4605    end if
4606
4607    if (stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 4) then
4608      call gsv_getField(stateVector_tiles,field_out_r4_ptr)
4609    else if (stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 8) then
4610      call gsv_getField(stateVector_tiles,field_out_r8_ptr)
4611    else
4612      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToTiles: stateVector_tiles%dataKind not real 4 or 8')
4613    end if
4614
4615    kIndex_Loop: do kIndex = 1, stateVector_tiles%nk
4616
4617      ! determine if there is data to send for this kIndex
4618      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4619        if (stateVector_1step%dataKind == 4) then
4620          call gsv_getField(stateVector_1step,field_in_r4_ptr)
4621          allZero = (maxval(abs(field_in_r4_ptr(:, :, kIndex, 1))) == 0.0)
4622        else if (stateVector_1step%dataKind == 8) then
4623          call gsv_getField(stateVector_1step,field_in_r8_ptr)
4624          allZero = (maxval(abs(field_in_r8_ptr(:, :, kIndex, 1))) == 0.0D0)
4625        end if
4626      else
4627        allZero = .true.
4628      end if
4629      call rpn_comm_allReduce(allZero,allZero_mpiglobal,1,'mpi_logical','mpi_land','GRID',ierr)
4630      if (allZero_mpiglobal) then
4631        ! Field equal to zero, skipping this kIndex to save time
4632        cycle kIndex_Loop
4633      end if
4634
4635      ! prepare the complete 1 timestep for sending on all tasks that have read something
4636      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4637        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid,nsize,indexBeg,indexEnd)
4638        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
4639          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
4640            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
4641            nsize = stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1) *  &
4642                    stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1)
4643            indexBeg = senddispls(yourid+1) + 1
4644            indexEnd = senddispls(yourid+1) + nsize
4645            if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_1step%dataKind == 4) then
4646              gd_send_1d_r4(indexBeg:indexEnd) =  &
4647                        reshape(field_in_r4_ptr(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
4648                                                 stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
4649                                                 kIndex, 1), (/ nsize /))
4650            else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_1step%dataKind == 8) then
4651              gd_send_1d_r4(indexBeg:indexEnd) =  &
4652                   real(reshape(field_in_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
4653                                                  stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
4654                                                  kIndex, 1), (/ nsize /)), 4)
4655            else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. stateVector_1step%dataKind == 8) then
4656              gd_send_1d_r8(indexBeg:indexEnd) =  &
4657                        reshape(field_in_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
4658                                                 stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
4659                                                 kIndex, 1), (/ nsize /))
4660            else
4661              call utl_abort('gsv_stepToTiles: unexpected combination of real kinds')
4662            end if
4663          end do
4664        end do
4665        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4666      end if
4667
4668      if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
4669        call mpi_alltoallv(gd_send_1d_r4, sendsizes, senddispls, mmpi_datyp_real4, &
4670                           gd_recv_3d_r4, recvsizes, recvdispls, mmpi_datyp_real4, &
4671                           mmpi_comm_grid, ierr)
4672      else if (sendrecvKind == 8) then
4673        call mpi_alltoallv(gd_send_1d_r8, sendsizes, senddispls, mmpi_datyp_real8, &
4674                           gd_recv_3d_r8, recvsizes, recvdispls, mmpi_datyp_real8, &
4675                           mmpi_comm_grid, ierr)
4676      end if
4677
4678      stepIndex = stepIndexBeg - 1
4679      stepCount = 0
4680      do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4681
4682        ! skip if this task had nothing to send
4683        if (.not. thisProcIsAsender(procIndex)) cycle
4684
4685        stepCount = stepCount + 1
4686        stepIndex = stepIndex + 1
4687        if (stepIndex > stateVector_tiles%numStep) then
4688          call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToTiles: stepIndex > numStep')
4689        end if
4690        if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 4) then
4691          field_out_r4_ptr(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,  &
4692                           stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd,  &
4693                           kIndex, stepIndex) =   &
4694              gd_recv_3d_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,stepCount)
4695        else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 8) then
4696          field_out_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,  &
4697                           stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd,  &
4698                           kIndex, stepIndex) =   &
4699              real(gd_recv_3d_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,stepCount),8)
4700        else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 8) then
4701          field_out_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,  &
4702                           stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd,  &
4703                           kIndex, stepIndex) =   &
4704              gd_recv_3d_r8(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,stepCount)
4705        end if
4706
4707      end do ! procIndex
4708    end do kIndex_Loop ! kIndex
4709
4710    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
4711      deallocate(gd_recv_3d_r4)
4712      deallocate(gd_send_1d_r4)
4713    else if (sendrecvKind == 8) then
4714      deallocate(gd_recv_3d_r8)
4715      deallocate(gd_send_1d_r8)
4716    end if
4717
4718    ! now send HeightSfc from task 0 to all others
4719    if (stateVector_tiles%heightSfcPresent) then
4720
4721      allocate(gd_recv_height(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax))
4722      gd_recv_height(:,:) = 0.0d0
4723
4724      ! prepare data to send from task 0
4725      if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
4726        if (.not. stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4727          call utl_abort('gsv_transposeStepToVarsLevs: Problem with HeightSfc')
4728        end if
4729
4730        allocate(gd_send_height(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
4731        gd_send_height(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
4732
4733        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
4734        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
4735          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
4736            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
4737            gd_send_height(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
4738                    1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1) =  &
4739                real(stateVector_1step%HeightSfc(&
4740                     stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
4741                     stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1)), 8)
4742          end do
4743        end do
4744        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4745
4746      else
4747        allocate(gd_send_height(1,1,1))
4748      end if
4749
4750      ! distribute from task 0 to all tasks
4751      nsize = stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax * stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax
4752      do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4753        displs(procIndex) = (procIndex-1)*nsize
4754        nsizes(procIndex) = nsize
4755      end do
4756      call rpn_comm_scatterv(gd_send_height, nsizes, displs, 'mpi_real8', &
4757                             gd_recv_height, nsize, 'mpi_real8', &
4758                             0, 'grid', ierr)
4759
4760      stateVector_tiles%HeightSfc(&
4761                stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,    &
4762                stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd) =  &
4763          gd_recv_height(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE)
4764
4765      deallocate(gd_recv_height)
4766      deallocate(gd_send_height)
4767
4768    end if ! heightSfcPresent
4769
4770    ! Copy the mask if it is present
4771    if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4772      call gsv_copyMask(stateVector_1step, stateVector_tiles)
4773    end if
4774    call ocm_communicateMask(stateVector_tiles%oceanMask)
4775
4776    call msg('gsv_transposeStepToTiles','END', verb_opt=2)
4777
4778    call utl_tmg_stop(163)
4779
4780  end subroutine gsv_transposeStepToTiles
4781
4782  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4783  ! gsv_transposeTilesToStep
4784  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4785  subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToStep(stateVector_1step, stateVector_tiles, stepIndexBeg)
4786    !
4787    !:Purpose: Transposes the data from a `mpi_distribution='Tiles'` distribution 
4788    !           (4D lat-lon tiles) to a timestep MPI distribution (1 timestep per
4789    !           MPI task)
4790    !
4791    !:Comment: Step-wise distribution is mostly only used for file I/O.
4792    !           When in such implicit time distribution, it is necessery that
4793    !           `mpi_local=.false.` and `numStep=1`.
4794    !
4795    implicit none
4796
4797    ! Arguments:
4798    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout)  :: stateVector_1step
4799    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)     :: stateVector_tiles
4800    integer,          intent(in)     :: stepIndexBeg
4801
4802    ! Locals:
4803    integer :: ierr, yourid, youridx, youridy, nsize
4804    integer :: kIndex, procIndex, stepIndex, numStepOutput, stepCount
4805    integer :: inKind, outKind, sendrecvKind, outKindLocal
4806    logical :: thisProcIsAreceiver(mmpi_nprocs)
4807    integer :: sendsizes(mmpi_nprocs), recvsizes(mmpi_nprocs), senddispls(mmpi_nprocs), recvdispls(mmpi_nprocs)
4808    real(4), allocatable :: gd_send_r4(:,:,:), gd_recv_r4(:,:,:)
4809    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_r8(:,:,:), gd_recv_r8(:,:,:)
4810    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_height(:,:), gd_recv_height(:,:,:)
4811    real(4), pointer     :: field_in_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:)
4812    real(8), pointer     :: field_in_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:), field_out_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:)
4813
4814    if (statevector_tiles%mpi_distribution /= 'Tiles') then
4815      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToStep: input statevector must have Tiles mpi distribution')
4816    end if
4817
4818    call rpn_comm_barrier('GRID',ierr)
4819    call msg('gsv_transposeTilesToStep', 'START', verb_opt=2)
4820
4821    ! determine which tasks have something to receive and let everyone know
4822    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4823      thisProcIsAreceiver(procIndex) = .false.
4824      if (mmpi_myid == (procIndex-1) .and. stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4825        thisProcIsAreceiver(procIndex) = .true.
4826      end if
4827      call rpn_comm_bcast(thisProcIsAreceiver(procIndex), 1,  &
4828                          'MPI_LOGICAL', procIndex-1, 'GRID', ierr)
4829    end do
4830
4831    numStepOutput = 0
4832    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4833      if (thisProcIsAreceiver(procIndex)) numStepOutput = numStepOutput + 1
4834    end do
4835    call msg('gsv_transposeTilesToStep','numStepOutput = '//str(numStepOutput))
4836
4837    ! size of each message
4838    nsize = stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax * stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax
4839
4840    ! only recv the data on tasks that need data
4841    recvsizes(:) = 0
4842    if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4843      do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4844        recvsizes(procIndex) = nsize
4845      end do
4846    end if
4847    recvdispls(1) = 0
4848    do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
4849      recvdispls(procIndex) = recvdispls(procIndex-1) + recvsizes(procIndex-1)
4850    end do
4851
4852    ! all tasks send only to those that need data
4853    sendsizes(:) = 0
4854    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4855      if (thisProcIsAreceiver(procIndex)) then
4856        sendsizes(procIndex) = nsize
4857      end if
4858    end do
4859    senddispls(1) = 0
4860    do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
4861      senddispls(procIndex) = senddispls(procIndex-1) + sendsizes(procIndex-1)
4862    end do
4863
4864    if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4865      outKindLocal = stateVector_1step%dataKind
4866    else
4867      outKindLocal = -1
4868    end if
4869    call rpn_comm_allreduce(outKindLocal, outKind, 1,  &
4870                            'MPI_INTEGER', 'MPI_MAX', 'GRID', ierr)
4871    inKind = stateVector_tiles%dataKind
4872    if (inKind == 4 .or. outKind == 4) then
4873      sendrecvKind = 4
4874    else
4875      sendrecvKind = 8
4876    end if
4877
4878    ! allocate arrays used for mpi communication of 1 level/variable at a time
4879    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
4880      allocate(gd_send_r4(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax,numStepOutput))
4881      gd_send_r4(:,:,:) = 0.0
4882      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4883        allocate(gd_recv_r4(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
4884      else
4885        allocate(gd_recv_r4(1,1,1))
4886      end if
4887      gd_recv_r4(:,:,:) = 0.0
4888    else
4889      allocate(gd_send_r8(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax,numStepOutput))
4890      gd_send_r8(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
4891      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4892        allocate(gd_recv_r8(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
4893      else
4894        allocate(gd_recv_r8(1,1,1))
4895      end if
4896      gd_recv_r8(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
4897    end if
4898
4899    if (stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 4) then
4900      call gsv_getField(stateVector_tiles,field_in_r4_ptr)
4901    else
4902      call gsv_getField(stateVector_tiles,field_in_r8_ptr)
4903    end if
4904
4905    do kIndex = 1, stateVector_tiles%nk
4906
4907      ! prepare data for distribution from all tasks to only those that need it
4908      stepIndex = stepIndexBeg - 1
4909      stepCount = 0
4910
4911      do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
4912
4913        ! skip if this task has nothing to receive
4914        if (.not. thisProcIsAreceiver(procIndex)) cycle
4915
4916        stepCount = stepCount + 1
4917        stepIndex = stepIndex + 1
4918        if (stepIndex > stateVector_tiles%numStep) then
4919          call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToStep: stepIndex > numStep')
4920        end if
4921
4922        if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 4) then
4923          gd_send_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,stepCount) = &
4924               field_in_r4_ptr(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,  &
4925                               stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd,  &
4926                               kIndex, stepIndex)
4927        else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 8) then
4928          gd_send_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,stepCount) = &
4929               real(field_in_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,  &
4930                                    stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd,  &
4931                                    kIndex, stepIndex),4)
4932        else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 8) then
4933          gd_send_r8(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE,stepCount) = &
4934               field_in_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,  &
4935                               stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd,  &
4936                               kIndex, stepIndex)
4937        else
4938          call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToStep: unexpected combination of real kinds')
4939        end if
4940
4941      end do ! procIndex
4942
4943      if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
4944        call mpi_alltoallv(gd_send_r4, sendsizes, senddispls, mmpi_datyp_real4, &
4945                           gd_recv_r4, recvsizes, recvdispls, mmpi_datyp_real4, &
4946                           mmpi_comm_grid, ierr)
4947      else if (sendrecvKind == 8) then
4948        call mpi_alltoallv(gd_send_r8, sendsizes, senddispls, mmpi_datyp_real8, &
4949                           gd_recv_r8, recvsizes, recvdispls, mmpi_datyp_real8, &
4950                           mmpi_comm_grid, ierr)
4951      end if
4952
4953      ! copy over the complete 1 timestep received
4954      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
4955
4956        if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_1step%dataKind == 4) then
4957
4958          call gsv_getField(stateVector_1step,field_out_r4_ptr)
4959          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
4960          do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
4961            do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
4962              yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
4963              field_out_r4_ptr(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
4964                               stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
4965                               kIndex, 1) = &
4966                    gd_recv_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
4967                               1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1)
4968            end do
4969          end do
4970          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4971
4972        else if (sendrecvKind == 4 .and. stateVector_1step%dataKind == 8) then
4973
4974          call gsv_getField(stateVector_1step,field_out_r8_ptr)
4975          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
4976          do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
4977            do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
4978              yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
4979              field_out_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
4980                               stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
4981                               kIndex, 1) = &
4982               real(gd_recv_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
4983                               1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1), 8)
4984            end do
4985          end do
4986          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
4987
4988        else if (sendrecvKind == 8 .and. stateVector_1step%dataKind == 8) then
4989
4990          call gsv_getField(stateVector_1step,field_out_r8_ptr)
4991          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
4992          do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
4993            do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
4994              yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
4995              field_out_r8_ptr(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
4996                               stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
4997                               kIndex, 1) = &
4998                    gd_recv_r8(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
4999                               1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1)
5000            end do
5001          end do
5002          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
5003
5004        else
5005          call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToStep: unexpected combination of real kinds')
5006        end if
5007
5008      end if
5009
5010    end do ! kIndex
5011
5012    if (sendrecvKind == 4) then
5013      deallocate(gd_recv_r4)
5014      deallocate(gd_send_r4)
5015    else if (sendrecvKind == 8) then
5016      deallocate(gd_recv_r8)
5017      deallocate(gd_send_r8)
5018    end if
5019
5020    ! now gather the same HeightSfc onto each task that is a receiver
5021    if (stateVector_tiles%heightSfcPresent) then
5022
5023      allocate(gd_send_height(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax))
5024      gd_send_height(:,:) = 0.0d0
5025      if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
5026        allocate(gd_recv_height(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
5027      else
5028        allocate(gd_recv_height(1,1,1))
5029      end if
5030      gd_recv_height(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
5031
5032      ! prepare tile to send on each task
5033      gd_send_height(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE) = &
5034          stateVector_tiles%HeightSfc(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,    &
5035                                  stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd)
5036
5037      ! gather from all tasks onto each task with a receiving statevector
5038      do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
5039
5040        ! skip if this task has nothing to receive
5041        if (.not. thisProcIsAreceiver(procIndex)) cycle
5042
5043        nsize = stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax * stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax
5044        call rpn_comm_gather(gd_send_height, nsize, 'mpi_real8', &
5045                             gd_recv_height, nsize, 'mpi_real8', &
5046                             procIndex-1, 'grid', ierr)
5047
5048        ! copy over the complete 1 timestep received
5049        if (mmpi_myid == procIndex-1) then
5050          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
5051          do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
5052            do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
5053              yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
5054              stateVector_1step%HeightSfc(&
5055                   stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
5056                   stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1)) = &
5057                   gd_recv_height(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
5058                              1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1)
5059            end do
5060          end do
5061          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
5062        end if
5063
5064      end do ! procIndex
5065
5066      deallocate(gd_recv_height)
5067      deallocate(gd_send_height)
5068
5069    end if ! heightSfcPresent
5070
5071    ! Copy mask if it exists on mpi task with step data allocated
5072    if (stateVector_1step%allocated) then
5073      call gsv_copyMask(stateVector_tiles, stateVector_1step)
5074    end if
5075
5076    call msg('gsv_transposeTilesToStep', 'END', verb_opt=2)
5077
5078  end subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToStep
5079
5080  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5081  ! gsv_transposeTilesToMpiGlobal
5082  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5083  subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToMpiGlobal(stateVector_mpiGlobal, stateVector_tiles)
5084    !
5085    !:Purpose: Does MPI transpose (allGather) from `mpi_distribution='Tiles'` 
5086    !          (4D lat-lon tiles) to global 4D stateVector on each MPI task 
5087    !          where it is allocated.
5088    !
5089    implicit none
5090
5091    ! Arguments:
5092    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout)  :: stateVector_mpiGlobal
5093    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)     :: stateVector_tiles
5094
5095    ! Locals:
5096    integer :: ierr, yourid, youridx, youridy, nsize
5097    integer :: kIndex, stepIndex, numStep
5098
5099    real(4), allocatable :: gd_send_r4(:,:), gd_recv_r4(:,:,:)
5100    real(8), allocatable :: gd_send_r8(:,:), gd_recv_r8(:,:,:)
5101    real(4), pointer     :: field_out_r4(:,:,:,:), field_in_r4(:,:,:,:)
5102    real(8), pointer     :: field_out_r8(:,:,:,:), field_in_r8(:,:,:,:)
5103
5104    if (stateVector_tiles%mpi_distribution /= 'Tiles') then
5105      call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToMpiGlobal: input statevector must have Tiles mpi distribution')
5106    end if
5107
5108    if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%allocated) then
5109      if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%numStep /= stateVector_tiles%numStep) then
5110        call utl_abort('gsv_transposeTilesToMpiGlobal: input and output ' // &
5111                       'stateVectors must have same numStep')
5112      end if
5113    end if
5114
5115    numStep = stateVector_tiles%numStep
5116
5117    call rpn_comm_barrier('GRID',ierr)
5118    call msg('gsv_transposeTilesToMpiGlobal', 'START', verb_opt=2)
5119
5120    ! size of each message
5121    nsize = stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax * stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax
5122
5123    ! allocate arrays used for mpi communication of 1 level/variable at a time
5124    allocate(gd_send_r4(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,  &
5125                        stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax))
5126    gd_send_r4(:,:) = 0.0
5127    allocate(gd_recv_r4(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,  &
5128                        stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax, mmpi_nprocs))
5129    gd_recv_r4(:,:,:) = 0.0
5130
5131    if (stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 4) then
5132      call gsv_getField(stateVector_tiles,field_in_r4)
5133    else
5134      call gsv_getField(stateVector_tiles,field_in_r8)
5135    end if
5136    if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%allocated) then
5137      if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%dataKind == 4) then
5138        call gsv_getField(stateVector_mpiGlobal,field_out_r4)
5139      else
5140        call gsv_getField(stateVector_mpiGlobal,field_out_r8)
5141      end if
5142    end if
5143
5144    ! do allGather for 1 2D field/stepIndex at a time
5145    do stepIndex = 1, numStep
5146      do kIndex = 1, stateVector_tiles%nk
5147        if (stateVector_tiles%dataKind == 4) then
5148          gd_send_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE) =  &
5149               field_in_r4(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,  &
5150                           stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd,  &
5151                           kIndex, stepIndex)
5152        else
5153          gd_send_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE) =      &
5154               real(field_in_r8(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd, &
5155                                stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd, &
5156                                kIndex, stepIndex), 4)
5157        end if
5158
5159        call rpn_comm_allgather(gd_send_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
5160                                gd_recv_r4, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
5161
5162        ! copy over the complete 2D field for 1 stepIndex received
5163        if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%allocated) then
5164
5165          !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
5166          do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
5167            do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
5168              yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
5169              if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%dataKind == 4) then
5170                field_out_r4(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
