5171                             stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
5172                             kIndex, stepIndex) = &
5173                     gd_recv_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
5174                                1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1)
5175              else
5176                field_out_r8(stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
5177                             stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1), &
5178                             kIndex, stepIndex) = &
5179                     real(gd_recv_r4(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
5180                                      1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1), 4)
5181              end if
5182            end do
5183          end do
5184          !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
5185
5186        end if
5187
5188      end do ! kIndex
5189    end do ! stepIndex
5190
5191    deallocate(gd_recv_r4)
5192    deallocate(gd_send_r4)
5193
5194    ! now gather the same HeightSfc onto each task that is a receiver
5195    if (stateVector_tiles%heightSfcPresent) then
5196
5197      allocate(gd_send_r8(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax))
5198      gd_send_r8(:,:) = 0.0d0
5199      allocate(gd_recv_r8(stateVector_tiles%lonPerPEmax,stateVector_tiles%latPerPEmax,mmpi_nprocs))
5200      gd_recv_r8(:,:,:) = 0.0d0
5201
5202      ! prepare tile to send on each task
5203      gd_send_r8(1:stateVector_tiles%lonPerPE,1:stateVector_tiles%latPerPE) = &
5204          stateVector_tiles%HeightSfc(stateVector_tiles%myLonBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLonEnd,    &
5205                                      stateVector_tiles%myLatBeg:stateVector_tiles%myLatEnd)
5206
5207      call rpn_comm_allGather(gd_send_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8',  &
5208                              gd_recv_r8, nsize, 'mpi_real8', 'grid', ierr)
5209
5210      if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%allocated) then
5211
5212        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE(youridy,youridx,yourid)
5213        do youridy = 0, (mmpi_npey-1)
5214          do youridx = 0, (mmpi_npex-1)
5215            yourid = youridx + youridy*mmpi_npex
5216            stateVector_mpiGlobal%HeightSfc(&
5217                   stateVector_tiles%allLonBeg(youridx+1):stateVector_tiles%allLonEnd(youridx+1), &
5218                   stateVector_tiles%allLatBeg(youridy+1):stateVector_tiles%allLatEnd(youridy+1)) = &
5219                   gd_recv_r8(1:stateVector_tiles%allLonPerPE(youridx+1),  &
5220                              1:stateVector_tiles%allLatPerPE(youridy+1), yourid+1)
5221          end do
5222        end do
5223        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
5224
5225      end if
5226
5227      deallocate(gd_recv_r8)
5228      deallocate(gd_send_r8)
5229
5230    end if ! heightSfcPresent
5231
5232    ! Copy over the mask, if it exists
5233    if (stateVector_mpiGlobal%allocated) then
5234      call gsv_copyMask(stateVector_tiles, stateVector_mpiGlobal)
5235    end if
5236
5237    call msg('gsv_transposeTilesToMpiGlobal', 'END', verb_opt=2)
5238
5239  end subroutine gsv_transposeTilesToMpiGlobal

5241  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5242  ! gsv_varKindExist
5243  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5244  function gsv_varKindExist(varKind) result(KindFound)
5245    !
5246    !:Purpose: To check whether any of the variables to be assimilated
5247    !           (i.e. specified in the namelist NAMSTATE) are part of the
5248    !           specified variable kind
5249    !
5250    implicit none
5251
5252    ! Arguments:
5253    character(len=*), intent(in) :: varKind    ! Variable kind (e.g. MT or CH)
5254    logical                      :: KindFound  ! Logical indicating whether var kind found 
5255
5256    ! Locals:
5257    integer :: varIndex
5258
5259    KindFound = .false.
5260
5261    VARLIST: do varIndex = 1, vnl_numvarmax
5262       if (gsv_varExist(varName=vnl_varNameList(varIndex))) then
5263          if (vnl_varKindFromVarname(vnl_varNameList(varIndex)).eq.varKind) then
5264             KindFound = .true.
5265             exit VARLIST 
5266          end if
5267       end if
5268    end do VARLIST
5269
5270  end function gsv_varKindExist
5271
5272  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5273  ! gsv_dotProduct
5274  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5275  subroutine gsv_dotProduct(stateVector_a,stateVector_b,dotsum)
5276    !
5277    !:Purpose: Computes the dot product of two statevectors
5278    !
5279    implicit none
5280
5281    ! Arguments:
5282    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)  :: stateVector_a,stateVector_b
5283    real(8),          intent(out) :: dotsum
5284
5285    ! Locals:
5286    integer          :: jstep,jlon,jlev,jlat,lon1,lon2,lat1,lat2
5287    integer          :: k1,k2
5288
5289    if (.not.stateVector_a%allocated) then
5290      call utl_abort('gsv_dotProduct: gridStateVector_in not yet allocated')
5291    end if
5292    if (.not.statevector_b%allocated) then
5293      call utl_abort('gsv_dotProduct: gridStateVector_inout not yet allocated')
5294    end if
5295
5296    lon1 = stateVector_a%myLonBeg
5297    lon2 = stateVector_a%myLonEnd
5298    lat1 = stateVector_a%myLatBeg
5299    lat2 = stateVector_a%myLatEnd
5300    k1 = stateVector_a%mykBeg
5301    k2 = stateVector_a%mykEnd
5302
5303    dotsum = 0.0D0
5304    do jstep = 1, stateVector_a%numStep
5305      do jlev = k1,k2
5306        do jlat = lat1, lat2
5307          do jlon = lon1, lon2
5308            dotsum = dotsum + stateVector_a%gd_r8(jlon,jlat,jlev,jstep) * &
5309                              stateVector_b%gd_r8(jlon,jlat,jlev,jstep)
5310          end do 
5311        end do
5312      end do
5313    end do
5314
5315    call mmpi_allreduce_sumreal8scalar(dotsum,'grid')
5316
5317  end subroutine gsv_dotProduct
5318
5319  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5320  ! gsv_field3d_hbilin
5321  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5322  subroutine gsv_field3d_hbilin(field,nlong,nlat,nlev,xlong,xlat,vlev, &
5323                                fieldout,nlongout,nlatout,nlevout,xlongout, &
5324                                xlatout,vlevout)
5325    !
5326    !:Purpose: Horizontal bilinear interpolation from a 3D regular gridded field
5327    !           to another 3D regular gridded field.
5328    !
5329    !           This version can be used with fields that are not part of the
5330    !           background state, such as climatologies.
5331    !
5332    !           This version does not depend on gridstatevector data
5333    !           types/structures.
5334    !
5335    implicit none
5336
5337    ! Arguments:
5338    real(8), intent(in) :: field(nlong,nlat,nlev) ! 3D field
5339    integer, intent(in) :: nlong ! number of latitudes
5340    integer, intent(in) :: nlat  ! number of longitudes
5341    integer, intent(in) :: nlev  ! number of vertical levels
5342    real(8), intent(in) :: xlong(nlong) ! longitudes (radians)
5343    real(8), intent(in) :: xlat(nlat)   ! latitudes (radians)
5344    real(8), intent(in) :: vlev(nlev)   ! vertical levels of input field (in pressure)
5345    real(8), intent(out) :: fieldout(nlongout,nlatout,nlevout) ! 3D field
5346    integer, intent(in) :: nlongout ! number or latitudes
5347    integer, intent(in) :: nlatout  ! number of target longitudes
5348    integer, intent(in) :: nlevout  ! Number of target vertical levels
5349    real(8), intent(in) :: xlongout(nlongout) ! target longitudes (radians) 
5350    real(8), intent(in) :: xlatout(nlatout)   ! target of target latitudes (radians)
5351    real(8), intent(in) :: vlevout(nlevout)   ! Target vertical levels (in pressure)
5352
5353    ! Locals:
5354    real(8) :: lnvlev(nlev),lnvlevout(nlevout),plong2
5355    integer :: ilev,ilon,ilat,ilatp1,i,j,ilongout,ilatout
5356    logical :: same_vlev
5357
5358    real(8) :: DLDX, DLDY, DLDP, DLW1, DLW2, DLW3, DLW4
5359
5360    ! Check if vertical interpolation needed
5361    if (nlev /= nlevout) then
5362      same_vlev = .false.
5363    else
5364      if (any(abs(vlev-vlevout) > 0.01*vlev)) then
5365        same_vlev = .false.
5366      else
5367        same_vlev = .true.
5368      end if
5369    end if 
5370    
5371    ! Find near lat/long grid points
5372    
5373    do ilongout = 1, nlongout
5374
5375      if (nlongout > 1) then    
5376        plong2 = xlongout(ilongout)
5377        if (plong2 < 0.0) plong2 = 2.D0*mpc_pi_r8 + plong2
5378        do ilon = 2,nlong
5379          if  (xlong(ilon-1) < xlong(ilon)) then
5380            if (plong2 >= xlong(ilon-1) .and. plong2 <= xlong(ilon)) exit
5381          else 
5382            ! Assumes this is a transition between 360 to 0 (if it exists). Skip over.
5383          end if
5384        end do
5385        ilon = ilon-1
5386      else
5387        ilon = 1
5388      end if
5389      
5390      do ilatout = 1, nlatout
5391         
5392        do ilat = 2, nlat
5393          if (xlatout(ilatout) <= xlat(ilat)) exit
5394        end do
5395        ilat = min(ilat-1,nlat)
5396        ilatp1 = min(ilat+1,nlat)
5397    
5398        ! Set lat/long interpolation weights
5399    
5400        if (nlongout > 1) then
5401          DLDX = (xlongout(ilongout) - xlong(ilon))/(xlong(ilon+1)-xlong(ilon))
5402          if (ilat < nlat) then
5403            DLDY = (xlatout(ilatout) - xlat(ilat))/(xlat(ilat+1)-xlat(ilat))
5404          else
5405            DLDY = (xlatout(ilatout) - xlat(ilat))/(xlat(ilat)-xlat(ilat-1))
5406          end if
5407
5408          DLW1 = (1.d0-DLDX) * (1.d0-DLDY)
5409          DLW2 =       DLDX  * (1.d0-DLDY)
5410          DLW3 = (1.d0-DLDX) *       DLDY
5411          DLW4 =       DLDX  *       DLDY
5412        else
5413          if (ilat < nlat) then
5414            DLDY = (xlatout(ilatout) - xlat(ilat))/(xlat(ilat+1)-xlat(ilat))
5415          else
5416            DLDY = (xlatout(ilatout) - xlat(ilat))/(xlat(ilat)-xlat(ilat-1))
5417          end if
5418
5419          DLW1 = (1.d0-DLDY)
5420          DLW3 = DLDY        
5421        end if
5422        
5423        ! Set vertical interpolation weights (assumes pressure vertical coordinate)
5424    
5425        if (.not.same_vlev) then
5426          lnvlevout(:) = log(vlevout(:))    
5427          lnvlev(:) = log(vlev(:))    
5428          
5429          ilev = 1
5430          do i = 1, nlevout
5431            do j = ilev, nlev          
5432               if (lnvlevout(i) < lnvlev(j)) exit    ! assumes both lnvlevout and lnvlev increase with increasing index value
5433            end do
5434            ilev = j-1
5435            if (ilev < 1) then
5436               ilev = 1
5437            else if (ilev >= nlev) then
5438               ilev = nlev-1
5439            end if
5440       
5441            DLDP = (lnvlev(ilev+1)-lnvlevout(i))/(lnvlev(ilev+1)-lnvlev(ilev))
5442            
5443            fieldout(ilongout,ilatout,i) = DLDP* (DLW1 * field(ilon,ilat,ilev) &
5444                           + DLW2 * field(ilon+1,ilat,ilev) &
5445                           + DLW3 * field(ilon,ilatp1,ilev) &
5446                           + DLW4 * field(ilon+1,ilatp1,ilev)) &
5447             + (1.d0-DLDP)* (DLW1 * field(ilon,ilat,ilev+1) &
5448                           + DLW2 * field(ilon+1,ilat,ilev+1) &
5449                           + DLW3 * field(ilon,ilatp1,ilev+1) &
5450                           + DLW4 * field(ilon+1,ilatp1,ilev+1))                               
5451          end do
5452        else if (nlongout > 1) then
5453          do ilev = 1, nlevout           
5454            fieldout(ilongout,ilatout,ilev) = DLW1 * field(ilon,ilat,ilev) &
5455                           + DLW2 * field(ilon+1,ilat,ilev) &
5456                           + DLW3 * field(ilon,ilatp1,ilev) &
5457                           + DLW4 * field(ilon+1,ilatp1,ilev)
5458          end do
5459        else 
5460          do ilev = 1, nlevout           
5461            fieldout(ilongout,ilatout,ilev) = DLW1 * field(ilon,ilat,ilev) &
5462                           + DLW3 * field(ilon,ilatp1,ilev) 
5463          end do
5464        end if 
5465      end do
5466    end do
5467        
5468  end subroutine gsv_field3d_hbilin   
5469
5470  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5471  ! gsv_smoothHorizontal
5472  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5473  subroutine gsv_smoothHorizontal(stateVector_inout, horizontalScale, maskNegatives_opt, &
5474       varName_opt, binInteger_opt, binReal_opt, binRealThreshold_opt)
5475    !
5476    !:Purpose: To apply a horizontal smoothing to all of the fields according
5477    !           to the specified horizontal length scale
5478    !
5479    implicit none
5480
5481    ! Arguments:
5482    type(struct_gsv), target,   intent(inout) :: stateVector_inout
5483    real(8),                    intent(in)    :: horizontalScale
5484    logical, optional,          intent(in)    :: maskNegatives_opt
5485    character(len=*), optional, intent(in)    :: varName_opt
5486    real(4), optional, pointer, intent(in)    :: binInteger_opt(:,:,:)
5487    real(8), optional, pointer, intent(in)    :: binReal_opt(:,:)
5488    real(8), optional,          intent(in)    :: binRealThreshold_opt
5489
5490    ! Locals:
5491    type(struct_gsv), pointer :: stateVector
5492    type(struct_gsv), target  :: stateVector_varsLevs
5493
5494    integer :: latIndex, lonIndex, stepIndex, kIndex
5495    integer :: latIndex2, lonIndex2, maxDeltaIndex, count
5496    integer :: latBeg, latEnd, lonBeg, lonEnd
5497    integer :: myBinInteger
5498
5499    real(8), allocatable :: smoothedField(:,:)
5500    real(8) :: lat1_r8, lon1_r8, lat2_r8, lon2_r8, distance
5501    real(8) :: binRealThreshold, myBinReal
5502
5503    real(4), pointer :: binInteger(:,:,:)
5504    real(8), pointer :: binReal(:,:)
5505
5506    logical :: maskNegatives, binIntegerTest, binRealTest
5507    
5508    call utl_tmg_start(169, 'low-level--gsv_smoothHorizontal')
5509
5510    if (horizontalScale <= 0.0d0) then
5511      call msg('gsv_smoothHorizontal', 'specified scale <= 0, returning')
5512      return
5513    end if
5514
5515    if (present(binInteger_opt)) then
5516      binIntegerTest= .true.
5517      binInteger => binInteger_opt
5518    else
5519      binIntegerTest = .false.
5520    end if
5521
5522    if (present(binReal_opt)) then
5523      binRealTest= .true.
5524      binReal => binReal_opt
5525      if (present(binRealThreshold_opt)) then
5526        binRealThreshold = binRealThreshold_opt
5527      else
5528        call utl_abort('gsv_smoothHorizontal: a binRealThreshold_opt value must be provided with binReal_opt')
5529      end if
5530    else
5531      binRealTest = .false.
5532    end if
5533
5534    if (stateVector_inout%mpi_distribution /= 'VarsLevs' .and. stateVector_inout%mpi_local) then
5535    
5536      call gsv_allocate(statevector_varsLevs, statevector_inout%numStep, statevector_inout%hco, &
5537                        statevector_inout%vco, dataKind_opt=statevector_inout%dataKind,         &
5538                        mpi_local_opt=.true., mpi_distribution_opt='VarsLevs', &
5539                        allocHeight_opt=.false., allocPressure_opt=.false.)
5540      call gsv_transposeTilesToVarsLevs(statevector_inout, statevector_varsLevs)
5541      stateVector => stateVector_varsLevs
5542      
5543    else
5544    
5545      stateVector => stateVector_inout
5546      
5547    end if
5548
5549    if (present(maskNegatives_opt)) then
5550      maskNegatives = maskNegatives_opt
5551    else
5552      maskNegatives = .false.
5553    end if
5554
5555    allocate(smoothedField(stateVector%ni,stateVector%nj))
5556
5557    ! figure out the maximum possible number of grid points to search
5558    if (stateVector%hco%dlat > 0.0d0) then
5559      maxDeltaIndex = ceiling(1.5d0 * horizontalScale / (ec_ra * max(stateVector%hco%dlat,stateVector%hco%dlon)))
5560      write(*,*) 'gsv_smoothHorizontal: maxDistance, maxDeltaIndex = ', horizontalScale / 1000.0d0, 'km', &
5561           maxDeltaIndex, max(stateVector%hco%dlat,stateVector%hco%dlon)
5562    else if(stateVector%hco%dlat == 0.0d0) then
5563      maxDeltaIndex = ceiling(1.5d0 * horizontalScale / statevector%hco%minGridSpacing)
5564      write(*,*) 'gsv_smoothHorizontal: maxDistance: ', horizontalScale / 1000.0d0, ' km,', &
5565           ' maxDeltaIndex: ', maxDeltaIndex, ', minGridSpacing: ', statevector%hco%minGridSpacing
5566    else
5567      call utl_abort('gsv_smoothHorizontal: cannot compute a value for maxDeltaIndex')
5568    end if
5569
5570    ! apply a simple footprint operator type of averaging within specified radius
5571    do stepIndex = 1, stateVector%numStep
5572      do kIndex = stateVector%mykBeg, stateVector%mykEnd
5573      
5574        if (present(varName_opt)) then
5575          if (gsv_getVarNameFromK(stateVector,kIndex) /= trim(varName_opt)) cycle
5576        end if
5577	
5578        smoothedField(:,:) = 0.0d0
5579        do latIndex = 1, stateVector%nj
5580          do lonIndex = 1, stateVector%ni
5581	  
5582            lat1_r8 = stateVector%hco%lat2d_4(lonIndex,latIndex)
5583            lon1_r8 = stateVector%hco%lon2d_4(lonIndex,latIndex)
5584            count = 0
5585            latBeg = max(1, latIndex - maxDeltaIndex)
5586            latEnd = min(stateVector%nj, latIndex + maxDeltaIndex)
5587            lonBeg = max(1, lonIndex - maxDeltaIndex)
5588            lonEnd = min(stateVector%ni, lonIndex + maxDeltaIndex)
5589            if (binIntegerTest) then
5590              myBinInteger = int(binInteger(lonIndex,latIndex,1)) 
5591            end if
5592            
5593	    if (binRealTest) then
5594              myBinReal = binReal(lonIndex,latIndex)
5595            end if
5596	    
5597            do latIndex2 = latBeg, latEnd
5598              do lonIndex2 = lonBeg, lonEnd
5599
5600                ! skip negative value if it should be masked
5601                if (maskNegatives .and. stateVector%dataKind == 8) then
5602                  if (stateVector%gd_r8(lonIndex2,latIndex2,kIndex,stepIndex) < 0.0d0) cycle
5603                else if (maskNegatives .and. statevector%dataKind == 4) then
5604                  if (stateVector%gd_r4(lonIndex2,latIndex2,kIndex,stepIndex) < 0.0) cycle
5605                end if
5606
5607                ! skip value if it is beyond the specified distance
5608                lat2_r8 = stateVector%hco%lat2d_4(lonIndex2,latIndex2)
5609                lon2_r8 = stateVector%hco%lon2d_4(lonIndex2,latIndex2)
5610                distance = phf_calcDistanceFast(lat2_r8, lon2_r8, lat1_r8, lon1_r8)
5611                if (distance > horizontalScale) cycle
5612
5613                ! skip value if it lie in a different bin
5614                if (binIntegerTest) then
5615                  if (int(binInteger(lonIndex2,latIndex2,1)) /=  myBinInteger .or. & 
5616                      int(binInteger(lonIndex2,latIndex2,1)) == -1) cycle
5617                end if
5618		
5619                if (binRealTest) then
5620                  if (abs(binReal(lonIndex2,latIndex2) - myBinReal) > binRealThreshold) cycle
5621                end if
5622
5623                count = count + 1
5624                if (stateVector%dataKind == 8) then
5625                  smoothedField(lonIndex,latIndex) = smoothedField(lonIndex,latIndex) + &
5626                                                     stateVector%gd_r8(lonIndex2,latIndex2,kIndex,stepIndex)
5627                else
5628                  smoothedField(lonIndex,latIndex) = smoothedField(lonIndex,latIndex) + &
5629                                                     real(stateVector%gd_r4(lonIndex2,latIndex2,kIndex,stepIndex),8)
5630                end if
5631            
5632	      end do
5633            end do
5634            
5635	    if (count > 0) then
5636              smoothedField(lonIndex,latIndex) = smoothedField(lonIndex,latIndex) / real(count,8)
5637            else
5638              if (maskNegatives) smoothedField(lonIndex,latIndex) = mpc_missingValue_r8
5639            end if
5640	    
5641          end do
5642        end do
5643	
5644        if (stateVector%dataKind == 8) then
5645          stateVector%gd_r8(:,:,kIndex,stepIndex) = smoothedField(:,:)
5646        else
5647          stateVector%gd_r4(:,:,kIndex,stepIndex) = real(smoothedField(:,:),4)
5648        end if
5649      end do
5650    end do
5651
5652    deallocate(smoothedField)
5653
5654    if (stateVector_inout%mpi_distribution /= 'VarsLevs' .and. stateVector_inout%mpi_local) then
5655      call gsv_transposeVarsLevsToTiles(statevector_varsLevs, statevector_inout)
5656      call gsv_deallocate(statevector_varsLevs)
5657    end if
5658    
5659    call utl_tmg_stop(169)
5660
5661  end subroutine gsv_smoothHorizontal
5662

5664  ! gsv_getInfo
5665  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5666  ! DBGmad : TODO use a `gsv_str()` string representation?
5667  subroutine gsv_getInfo(stateVector, message)
5668    !:Purpose: Writes out grid state vector parameters
5669    !
5670    implicit none
5671
5672    ! Arguments:
5673    type(struct_gsv), intent(in) :: stateVector
5674    character(len=*) :: message
5675
5676    write(*,*)
5677    write(*,*) message
5678    write(*,*) '------------------- START -------------------'
5679    write(*,*) 'heightSfcPresent = ',stateVector%heightSfcPresent
5680    write(*,*) 'UVComponentPresent = ',stateVector%UVComponentPresent
5681    write(*,*) 'extraUVallocated = ',stateVector%extraUVallocated
5682    write(*,*) 'myUVkBeg = ',stateVector%myUVkBeg
5683    write(*,*) 'myUVkEnd = ',stateVector%myUVkEnd
5684    write(*,*) 'myUVkCount = ',stateVector%myUVkCount
5685    write(*,*) 'dataKind = ',stateVector%dataKind
5686    write(*,*) 'ni = ',stateVector%ni
5687    write(*,*) 'nj = ',stateVector%nj
5688    write(*,*) 'nk = ',stateVector%nk
5689    write(*,*) 'numStep = ',stateVector%numStep
5690    write(*,*) 'anltime = ',stateVector%anltime
5691    write(*,*) 'latPerPE = ',stateVector%latPerPE
5692    write(*,*) 'latPerPEmax = ',stateVector%latPerPEmax
5693    write(*,*) 'myLatBeg = ',stateVector%myLatBeg
5694    write(*,*) 'myLatEnd = ',stateVector%myLatEnd
5695    write(*,*) 'lonPerPE = ',stateVector%lonPerPE
5696    write(*,*) 'lonPerPEmax = ',stateVector%lonPerPEmax
5697    write(*,*) 'myLonBeg = ',stateVector%myLonBeg
5698    write(*,*) 'myLonEnd = ',stateVector%myLonEnd
5699    write(*,*) 'mykCount = ',stateVector%mykCount
5700    write(*,*) 'mykBeg = ',stateVector%mykBeg
5701    write(*,*) 'mykEnd = ',stateVector%mykEnd
5702    if (associated(stateVector%allLatBeg)) write(*,*) 'allLatBeg = ',stateVector%allLatBeg
5703    if (associated(stateVector%allLatEnd)) write(*,*) 'allLatEnd = ',stateVector%allLatEnd
5704    if (associated(stateVector%allLatPerPE)) write(*,*) 'allLatPerPE = ',stateVector%allLatPerPE
5705    if (associated(stateVector%allLonBeg)) write(*,*) 'allLonBeg = ',stateVector%allLonBeg
5706    if (associated(stateVector%allLonEnd)) write(*,*) 'allLonEnd = ',stateVector%allLonEnd
5707    if (associated(stateVector%allLonPerPE)) write(*,*) 'allLonPerPE = ',stateVector%allLonPerPE
5708    if (associated(stateVector%allkCount)) write(*,*) 'allkCount = ',stateVector%allkCount
5709    if (associated(stateVector%allkBeg)) write(*,*) 'allkBeg = ',stateVector%allkBeg
5710    if (associated(stateVector%allkEnd)) write(*,*) 'allkEnd = ',stateVector%mykEnd
5711    if (associated(stateVector%allUVkCount)) write(*,*) 'allUVkCount = ',stateVector%allUVkCount
5712    if (associated(stateVector%allUVkBeg)) write(*,*) 'allUVkBeg = ',stateVector%allUVkBeg
5713    if (associated(stateVector%allUVkEnd)) write(*,*) 'allUVkEnd = ',stateVector%myUVkEnd
5714    if (associated(stateVector%dateStampList)) write(*,*) 'dateStampList = ',stateVector%dateStampList
5715    if (associated(stateVector%dateStamp3d)) write(*,*) 'dateStamp3d = ',stateVector%dateStamp3d
5716    if (associated(stateVector%dateOriginList)) write(*,*) 'dateOriginList = ',stateVector%dateOriginList
5717    if (associated(stateVector%npasList)) write(*,*) 'npasList = ',stateVector%npasList
5718    if (associated(stateVector%ip2List)) write(*,*) 'ip2List = ',stateVector%ip2List
5719    write(*,*) 'deet = ',stateVector%deet
5720    write(*,*) 'etiket = ',stateVector%etiket
5721    write(*,*) 'allocated = ',stateVector%allocated
5722    if (associated(stateVector%varOffset)) write(*,*) 'varOffset = ',stateVector%varOffset
5723    if (associated(stateVector%varNumLev)) write(*,*) 'varNumLev = ',stateVector%varNumLev
5724    write(*,*) 'mpi_local = ',stateVector%mpi_local
5725    write(*,*) 'mpi_distribution = ',stateVector%mpi_distribution
5726    write(*,*) 'horizSubSample = ',stateVector%horizSubSample
5727    write(*,*) 'varExistList = ',stateVector%varExistList
5728    write(*,*) 'hInterpolateDegree = ',stateVector%hInterpolateDegree
5729    write(*,*) 'hExtrapolateDegree = ',stateVector%hExtrapolateDegree
5730    write(*,*) 'addHeightSfcOffset = ',stateVector%addHeightSfcOffset
5731    write(*,*) '-------------------- END --------------------'
5732
5733  end subroutine gsv_getInfo

5735  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5736  ! gsv_applyMaskLAM
5737  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5738  subroutine gsv_applyMaskLAM(statevector_inout, maskLAM)
5739    !:Purpose: To apply a mask to a state vector for LAM grid
5740    !
5741    implicit none
5742
5743    ! Arguments
5744    type(struct_gsv), intent(inout)  :: statevector_inout
5745    type(struct_gsv), intent(in)     :: maskLAM
5746
5747    ! Locals
5748    real(4), pointer :: increment_r4(:,:,:,:)
5749    real(8), pointer :: increment_r8(:,:,:,:)
5750    real(pre_incrReal), pointer :: analIncMask(:,:,:)
5751    integer :: latIndex, kIndex, lonIndex, stepIndex
5752
5753    call msg('gsv_applyMaskLAM','START', verb_opt=2)
5754    
5755    call gsv_getField(maskLAM,analIncMask)
5756
5757    if (statevector_inout%dataKind == 4) then
5758      ! apply mask using increment_r4
5759      call gsv_getField(statevector_inout,increment_r4)
5760      do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
5761        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)
5762        do kIndex = 1, statevector_inout%nk
5763          do latIndex =  statevector_inout%myLatBeg,  statevector_inout%myLatEnd
5764            do lonIndex =  statevector_inout%myLonBeg,  statevector_inout%myLonEnd
5765              increment_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) =      &
5766                   increment_r4(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) * &
5767                   analIncMask(lonIndex,latIndex,1)
5768            end do
5769          end do
5770        end do
5771        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
5772      end do
5773    else
5774      ! apply mask using increment_r8
5775      call gsv_getField(statevector_inout,increment_r8)
5776      do stepIndex = 1, statevector_inout%numStep
5777        !$OMP PARALLEL DO PRIVATE (latIndex,kIndex,lonIndex)
5778        do kIndex = 1, statevector_inout%nk
5779          do latIndex =  statevector_inout%myLatBeg,  statevector_inout%myLatEnd
5780            do lonIndex =  statevector_inout%myLonBeg,  statevector_inout%myLonEnd
5781              increment_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) =      &
5782                   increment_r8(lonIndex,latIndex,kIndex,stepIndex) * &
5783                   analIncMask(lonIndex,latIndex,1)
5784            end do
5785          end do
5786        end do
5787        !$OMP END PARALLEL DO
5788      end do
5789    end if
5790
5791    call msg('gsv_applyMaskLAM','END', verb_opt=2)
5792
5793  end subroutine gsv_applyMaskLAM
5794
5795  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5796  ! gsv_containsNonZeroValues
5797  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5798  function gsv_containsNonZeroValues(stateVector) result(stateVectorHasNonZeroValue)
5799    !:Purpose: To check if stateVector has any non-zero value.
5800    !
5801    implicit none
5802
5803    ! Arguments
5804    type(struct_gsv), intent(in) :: stateVector
5805    logical                      :: stateVectorHasNonZeroValue
5806
5807    ! Locals
5808    real(4), pointer             :: field_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:)
5809    real(8), pointer             :: field_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:)
5810    logical                      :: allZero, allZero_mpiglobal
5811    integer                      :: ierr
5812
5813    if (.not. stateVector%allocated) then
5814      stateVectorHasNonZeroValue = .false.
5815      return
5816    end if
5817
5818    if (stateVector%dataKind == 4) then
5819      call gsv_getField(stateVector,field_r4_ptr)
5820      allZero = (maxval(abs(field_r4_ptr(:,:,:,:))) == 0.0)
5821    else if (stateVector%dataKind == 8) then
5822      call gsv_getField(stateVector,field_r8_ptr)
5823      allZero = (maxval(abs(field_r8_ptr(:,:,:,:))) == 0.0D0)
5824    end if
5825
5826    call rpn_comm_allReduce(allZero,allZero_mpiglobal,1,'mpi_logical','mpi_land','GRID',ierr)
5827    stateVectorHasNonZeroValue = .not. allZero_mpiglobal
5828
5829  end function gsv_containsNonZeroValues
5830
5831end module gridStateVector_mod
